Review Title: I ordered a cake for my boyfriend’s…
Review Text: I ordered a cake for my boyfriend’s birthday for the second year in a row and it did not disappoint! Thank you so much for putting so much time and effort into the delicious cake. You can tell a lot of good quality ingredients and love goes into baking. Thank you for being fantastic at what you do!

Review Title: One of the best cake shops in London
Review Text: Had to get a cake last minute in London, amazing customer service because they answered my email right away, didn’t charge me any extra and I got it the next day! We got the Sicilian lemon, and the cake was not only one of the prettiest cakes I’ve ever seen, it was absolutely delicious - my boyfriend and I couldn’t stop eating it. Even the packaging was gorgeous, I ordered a gift note with it (you can get like happy birthdays, thank yous etc) and I got the most beautifully hand-written note on gorgeous card (very jealous of their handwriting!). If I ever need a cake in London again, they’re going to be my first choice. For the price, in London, I don’t think you can get better.
Response Text: Wow, thank you so so much for this wonderful review! Thrilled to hear this and I've passed your feedback on to the team. We look forward to baking again for you soon. Best wishes, Elizabeth

Review Text: The highlight of my wedding! I have a couple of food intolerances and the EK Bakery team made the cake of our dreams with the best-tasting ingredients. I am so so happy with their coordination with me before my wedding, and they were just so kind and helpful with all my questions. I cannot recommend them more.
Response Text: Dear Priscila, a joy to read this and to receive your beautiful thank you note! Delighted we could be a part of your special day. Thank you, Elizabeth

Review Text: Ordered a birthday cake for a friend and it was amazing! Honestly one of the best cakes I’ve had. Wished I would have found you sooner so you could have done our wedding cake! Superb customer service as well, I had an additional request and you were so accommodating. Will certainly order again. Thank you so much!
Response Text: Wow, thank you so much Michelle! Delighted to read this and I'll pass on your feedback to the rest of the team. Sad we couldn't make your wedding cake but perhaps an anniversary cake?! We look forward to baking again for you in the future. Best wishes, Elizabeth

Review Title: Ordered cake from India for London!
Review Text: We ordered this cake from India for my brother-in-law’s birthday in London. It was delivered on time and in perfect shape. The delivery was very professional with the person in charge calling and confirming the address and the time and handing it over with care. The birthday boy was delighted with the service and also the flavour of the cake and its taste!

Hi Nikhil,

Thank you for taking the time to leave this review. We are delighted to read your brother-in-law enjoyed the cake! I will pass on your glowing feedback to the team, thank you!

Review Text: The chocolate brownies came within 2 days of dispatch and were absolutely delicious! The were rich and decadent with a great texture. I’m a big dessert person and this was by far my favourite brownie. The packaging was also excellent. Will definitely be a returning customer.

Review Text: It was my 1st purchase & i was in Singapore ordering brownies in UK! It was like shooting in the dark, wasn't very sure what will happen after I've purchased BUT EK Bakery was a gem! I got the delivery mixed up, but they got it all sorted out for me in a snap of a finger! My brownies reached it's surprised recipient right on time! (And I was 8-hours ahead!). Amazing lovely helpful people at EK Bakery.. They get my very much recommendations
Response Text: Thank you so much for sharing this review, I'll pass your feedback onto the team. Always happy to accommodate last minute requests or changes wherever possible

Review Text: Beautiful options for those who need gluten free and vegan options combined (gluten free and lacto free diets). Tastes homemade but also luxurious with the finest ingredients and care put in to each slice.

Review Text:
Excellent company who were proactive with communication and make picking up the cake easy.

The cake was fantastic with many people who tried it saying it was the best they had ever tried (this was the standard chocolate cake). The large size ensured that there was plenty for 40 people to have a slice.

Thanks so much Tom, I will pass on your feedback to the rest of the team. Delighted to hear that you all enjoyed our double chocolate cake. It's had some rigorous recipe testing so it's always a thrill to hear that this has paid off.

Elizabeth

cake was delivered on time, and it was delicious - everybody was asking about where we got it from.
10/10 , will come back to EK bakery next time I need a cake for party ! thank you

Review Title: The Best Baker that Ever Lived.
Review Text: I wish there were more stars available. Everything about EK Bakery is incredible, and I will forever be loyal to them. I have tasted a lot of brownies in my life, I have months without tasting Elizabeth's delights, and every time I order them again, I remember that hers are the best brownies on this earth - no exaggeration at all. The talent extends far beyond brownies too - if you've not tasted her blondies you also haven't lived, and likewise with any other baked goods that come out of that kitchen. I discovered EK Bakery many moons ago (pre pandemic maybe?) after asking her to custom bake me a Cherry Bakewell peanut butter brownie, and my all time fave, a Marmite Caramel Brownie. Since then I have asked for many a strange flavour combination, and she has yet to disappoint, allowing me to bend the rules on more than one occasion, and baking the weirdest of concoctions at my request. Thank you, Elizabeth - and you merry band of bakers. You make my baked goods dreams come true, and I salute you for it. Long may EK Bakery continue, and maybe one day I will cross the threshold in person. Until then, please continue to send me your chocolatey delights. They never fail to make me a very happy human!
Response Text: Ohh you are the sweetest, thank you so so much

Review Title: First time ordering and it was fantastic
Review Text: It was my first time ordering from them after finding out about them on the internet. The order was for a gift so I wanted to make sure that both the quality of the cakes the delivery would be promising. And they were. The recipients were happy and from the pictures they sent me, the cakes looked gorgeous. Would happily order from EK Bakery again.
The ordering and collection process was easy. Customer service was proactive, prompt and clear. I ordered a chocolate sesame cake that was loved by the whole family for both the look and taste!

Review Title: cake was overall good but very small…
Review Text: cake was overall good but very small for the price and fell apart when slicing unfortunately
Response Text:
Hi Emily,

Many thanks for taking the time to leave a review. We offer cakes in multiple sizes and the mini size you had is our smallest one. It serves 2-6 people, depending on your portion preferences.

Additionally, we recommend storing the cake in the fridge and removing it around 1-2 hours before serving. The cake tastes best at room temperature but the refrigeration beforehand enables easy slicing and ensures a clean slice.

We'd love for you to try another cake with us, I'll follow up over email too.

Thanks and best wishes, Elizabeth

Review Text: Incredible cakes and amazing customer service. I was looking for a fast turn around for a birthday cake and boy they delivered. The cake looked stunning and tasted even better ??

We baked and dispatched your brownies with First Class shipping on the day of baking but there was a delay within the Royal Mail postal system. It's extremely rare and I'm sorry it occurred with your brownies. Thanks for flagging this with us on email, we sent you a replacement box and upgraded the shipping to 24H Tracked, sent these on 5th September and you received them on 6th September. Best wishes, Elizabeth

Review Title: Cake arrived and had been delivered…
Review Text:
Cake arrived and had been delivered upside down, due to this all the toppings were rolling aeound the box and cake was not in a pretty state. This was for my daughters 13th birthday so i was very dissapointed. Photographs taken and I emailed the company and no response. I had to purchase another cake that was intact. 10days later and still no response to my email so I sent another. I waited a further 2 days before throwing the smashed cake away as it was beginning to smell as the cream had turned. I had to open a case on PayPal for this company to respond. Disgusting service.
They responded to my review stating they did not receive my previous emails and the cake last for 7 days. They also asked me to email them in order to issue a refund. I have emailed again and forwarded the previous 2 emails I sent and again no response. I would also like to confirm the smashed cake was 12days old before I throw it away as they had not replied to me. Poor service and awful cake
Response Text: Hi Emily, All of our cakes do not need refrigeration and do not go off until at least 7 days after delivery, We have not received any emails regarding this please email sales@dessertsdeliveredbakery.co.uk so we can offer a refund on this matter. thanks

Lovely selection of cakes delivered in great condition with excellent customer service! I ordered birthday cake but picked the wrong delivery date (a week late!!) by accident. When I realised I contacted Desserts Delivered and asks if they could get it to me any sooner as I was going to miss the birthday. Even though it was my error they sorted it and had it at my door by 12 noon the next day. I was so grateful, thanks to Adrian and the team :) Will definitely be shopping here again.

I ordered a cake and topper to be delivered for my daughter’s birthday lunch to a restaurant. I clearly stated the date and time for delivery, which was accepted on the website. On the day of the delivery I received a message from the courier stating it would be 4 hours later. I contacted the company and they said there was nothing they could do and have refused to provide a refund. Terrible service.
Response Text: No where on our website does it let you pick a delivery time, this has never been an option and never will as we use a courier, Once an order leaves us and is delivered we are unable to refund. We only guarantee a delivery Day and NOT A DELIVERY TIM. this is clearly stated when ordering.

Review Text: I got my husband's birthday cake from here last month and was overwhelmed with how lovely it was. Everything was spot on from the ordering process right through to delivery and it tasted as amazing as it looked. I would definitely order from here again

Review Title: An amazing place to order the perfect cake!
Review Text: I came across this website on google and was attracted to ordering from here as it seemed appealing. Also, I found exactly what I was looking for. My cakes were delivered to me on the day I wanted them.  The old skool cake was amazingly soft and delicious, will definitely want to order this again! The Sebastian cheesecake was also good. The only slight disappointment I had was that they were frozen but it wasn’t a big issue as we were not in a rush to eat straight away! It overall, it was a delightful experience of ordering cakes!

THE BEST COOKIES EVER! I gor the cookie share box and from start to finish everything was perfect packaged the best (no broken cookies lol) all wrapped and fresh the cookie share box comes with the most delicious soft chunky cookies ever not only that you get cookie dipping sauces honestly mouth watering these cookies would be perfect for any occasion or a great treat for a cookie lover or like me (for my self haha) soo good ??

Ordered 6x cheesecakes thanks to a voucher from hubby & the kids received for Mother’s Day. Perfect size for sharing or for yourself for full on gluttony, would order again. Only feedback is the price to post a gift voucher, it’s one set price but to then pay price again when ordering stung a little.
Response Text: Thank you for the great review! We take great pride and joy knowing we have satisfied another happy customer!

Review Text:
Horrible experience ordering a cake. The cake arrived upside down and very damaged. I emailed them and had a disrespectful email experience with the company manager.
I do not recommend this company because of their disrespectful treatment of customers, terrible delivery, and the discrepancy between what you order and what will actually arrive.
The photos on the website are not the same as the cake that will arrive. If you decide to order a cake from them, take screenshots of everything you see on the website, especially the description of the cake. I ordered The Red Velvet Cookie & Cream Cake and on the website it was listed with two types of cookies on top, but it arrived with only an Oreo cookie on top. I asked why and the manager told me to read the description, which allegedly stated that the cake would only have Oreo cookies. At the same time, on the day I ordered the cake, there was nothing about the absence of red cookies on it! So take screenshots of the cake description before ordering.

The company replied that they offered a refund. I agreed! I received an email that I was refunded 15 pounds. I did not receive the money on my card! And do you seriously think that 15 pounds is a normal refund amount for a ruined cake that does not match what I ordered? I paid £40 for the cake and £9 for delivery! I would have attached a photo if there was such an opportunity here.

And I repeat once again, the problem is not only the discrepancy between the photo and what I received, but first of all, the fact that the cake arrived almost DESTROYED!!!

I do not recommend this company!
Response Text: Customer complained saying the cake is not as described, however the description clearly states what toppings this cake has, we offered a refund but no reply.

Review Text: I liked the website it was very easy to use.  I ordered a birthday cake (Ferrero Roche) for my grandaughter's birthday, however due to circumstances I needed to bring forward the delivery date. I contacted the company, not really thinking they could accomodate my request at short notice but I received a timely response that said 'yes, we will deliver this the next day'.  The cake arrived well packaged.  The cake itself was extremely delicious and I would order from Your Desserts again.  Superior quality cake and very good customer service - well beyond my expectations.

Ordered the Creme egg cake for my daughters 13th birthday. Delivered on time and definitely had the wow factor in appearance! Didn't dissapoint on taste either absolutely delicious! Nice texture too,so kept well(not that we had it for that long) didnt go dry at all. Cant wait for the next family birthday so I can order another cake. Highly recommend.

We had it on day 4 after delivery and it was still super moist and amazing. Ordered two years in a row for my daughters birthday as she loved it so much (and her friends told her they wanted the same one next year)!! Highly recommend. Great value considering the cost of other cakes.

Review Text: Excellent customer service. I got confused with my date of delivery and they made sure that the cake arrived on time. The cake itself is looking good and I will be ordering another one in January for her oreo mad sister.

I ordered a the cookies and cream cake for the first time and it was a great success! The cake arrived on time and was well wrapped to avoid any damage. The cake was delicious and went down a treat so would definitely order again - Thank you for making my son’s birthday party even better by the lovely cake!

I was impressed with the website setup and the amount of information, photos of products and ease of use of the website.  A very efficient ordering service.  I chose the 6 mini selection cheesecakes which I thought were a great idea to send to my son for his birthday, giving him the option to try different flavours.  He absolutely loved them (and shared them with his girlfriend).  They both confirmed the cheesecakes tasted wonderful and were of great quality. They also enjoyed having a variety to choose from. He loves cooking and is a huge foodie fan so he was clearly very impressed with them!  I was pleased that they managed to deliver them on his birthday around lunchtime so perfect timing! I would not hesitate to use the company again.  Thank you!
Fab company , ordered a Creme egg cake for my partners boyfriend on Thursday to arrive on Saturday! Very tasty-will definitely order from them again x

I ordered a cake for my daughter’s birthday on 8th May for delivery on 17th. The cake was delayed and didn’t arrive until the day after. When I chased customer service for an update I was told the cake wouldn’t be delivered until 20th due to DPDs error and due to GDPR I’d have to chase DPD myself. Later they sent me an email confirming they hadn’t sent my item to DPD until the day I’d requested delivery and it was on a next day delivery service. When the cake arrived it was damaged. I requested a refund which they agreed to after seeing my pictures of £10. My advise would be to go elsewhere. There was never a straight answer from customer services. They seemed to say anything to get themselves off the hook including trying to throw DPD under the bus for their mistake.
Response Text: This was delivered and proof was shown by DPD. Customer would need to contact them regarding it or the police if it was stolen. As a good will gesture we did refund the customer. We find it very disturbing that trustpilot allows people to publish such lies and defamation.

Review Title: I have used this company twice now and…
Review Text:

Review Title: My Experience with Desserts Deliverd Bakery
Review Text: Last year when I was searching for a cheesecake order for my family member I search it on Google, which is how I came across Desserts Delivered Bakery. As I explored the website I saw great options of what I wanted to buy for my family member and I liked the design of the products that they make which is the cakes and the cheesecakes. Its professional as it has a description of the ingredients  used and gives out many options for the customers to choose from. When I chose the 6 cheesecakes, it had the options that my family member would like and she enjoyed them. This year I've decided to order from again but instead the 6 cake slices which was wonderful. I would highly recommend ordering from desserts delivered as they have great options and I'll happily order again next year.

Review Title: I am extremely disappointed with the…
Review Text:
I am extremely disappointed with the experience.

Firstly, three of the cheesecakes arrived completely out of shape, looking more like a mess than a dessert. It's clear that no care was taken in the packaging or handling of these items. To make matters worse, one of the cheesecakes was the incorrect flavor, which was frustrating since I had specifically chosen the varieties I wanted.

Additionally, there was no consistency between the base and the cheesecake topping. Some had overly thick bases, while others barely had any at all. The toppings were similarly inconsistent, with some being sparse and others overwhelming.

This order was meant to be a gift, but it was so embarrassing and insulting that I couldn't present it to the recipient. The quality and presentation were far below what I expected, and it completely ruined the occasion.

To top it off, dealing with Adrian from customer service was a nightmare. He takes no care in his emails or customer satisfaction and seems to only care about money. His lack of professionalism and disregard for customer concerns only added to my frustration.

I won't be ordering from here again, and I wouldn't recommend their service to anyone looking for a reliable cheesecake delivery.

Review Title: This company is absolutely a shambles - save your money!
Review Text:
This company is absolutely a shambles. Please order at your own risk!

I was sent the wrong cake for my little brothers birthday, it was delivered in bad condition (icing had melted and cake was lopsided, not to mention that it was NOT the cake I ordered and paid £43 for).

I emailed them as soon as it arrived. They ignored my emails and did not respond hence why I had to open a dispute on PayPal! I even messaged them on Instagram and even that was ignored.

They then refused to give me a refund via PayPal and had the cheek to ask me to return the cake which is a perishable item in order to get my refund, a cake that was 2.5 weeks old, icing half melted off. That cake went in the bin! If they had responded to my email in the first instance maybe I would’ve been able to do this but no, they chose to ignore me. They also tried to insult me further by saying I shouldn’t be allowed to keep the cake for free - maybe the company shouldn’t be allowed to send out the wrong cakes to customers and try and steal customers money?!!!!!!

To summarise, they did not deliver what I had paid for and their response has been atrocious, I have not even received an apology yet for them sending me the wrong item which is shocking. I understand mistakes can happen but they have not even taken accountability or wanted to rectify this error on their behalf.

Just don’t order from this phoney company, save yourself a headache and you’re better off buying a supermarket cake - at least they won’t try and con you!
Response Text: Minor damage on cake paypal seen this and agreed not to refund, please see our reviews we have 95% positive feedback and are a highly rated food company, We are a very fair and reputable business and do not appreciate people trying to rip of a small family business, good try though! Thanks  UPDATE: we asked customer for order number and proof of this order which was ignored. Trustpilot what a shambles your website is, allowing people to post fake reviews.

Review Text:

What if she was allergic to almonds??
She's also vegetarian, so can't actually eat the cupcakes she's been sent

The card I paid for wasn't actually a card
It's just a message scribbled in ugly font on the top of the box.

Appalling service if you ask me
Response Text: Customer was informed of missing items and sent an alternative and refunded.

Review Text:
I ordered a carrot cake for fathers day. The website states it arrives frozen and in a strong corrugated box, with dry ice, foam and protective brackets.

I got a smushed defrosted carrot cake in a cheap shoe box stuffed into a DPD bag.

I gave the business every opportunity to put it right but their Sales and Customer Services Manager (who will no doubt reply to this review with more lies) refused to follow the law, even when I explained it to him in great detail. I wanted to return the cake for a replacement or refund but they refused to cover the costs of the return, even though it's their legal duty to do so.

In order to get your money back follow these instructions:
1. Contact Desserts Delivered and ask them to organise the return of the damaged item for a refund, this is their legal duty but they will deny it (and may even accuse you of blackmail LOL)
2.Contact Citizens Advice by phone or online form and say Desserts Delivered have delivered goods that are not satisfactory and you are exercising your short term right to reject.
They will send you a template letter to send to Desserts Delivered.
3.Send that and if they again refuse to refund you you can claim the money back from the bank.

I have also asked Citzens Advice to make Trading Standards aware, feel free to add your own experiences when you contact Citizens Advice. I have been given a case number.

My advice, avoid this company like the plague. What you see on the website is not what you will receive! The recent 1 star reviews and the business response to them tell you everything you need to know.

EDITED TO ADD: You can see exactly what I mean about customer service in the reply. I haven’t mentioned the taste of the cake anywhere because the cake is uneaten, still damaged, in its box. They have admitted that they are happy to break the law and get away with it because they have a “close relationship” with trading standards. Do not buy from them, there are so many other good cake delivery companies!!
Response Text: We have a 95% positive rating on trustpilot and other revie platforms, We have hundreds of repeat customers. We work very closely with trading standards and are doing nothing which a small business should not. Just because a customer does not like the taste of one of our cakes and eats it unfortunately we are not liable to refund, With food everyone has different tastes and not everyone is going to enjoy a certain product, If you go to McDonalds eat a burger and say you didn't enjoy it are you entitled to a full refund? Unfortunately not . We a re a small business not a charity and this cake is enjoyed and loved by 99% of our customers, No rules have been broken here and no laws, we have been trading for 12 years and are one of the leading cake delivery services online. Thanks

Review Title: AVOID THIS “COMPANY” AT ALL COSTS SAVE YOUR MONEY AND GONELSE WHERE
Review Text:
Absolutely shocking customer service from this company!! AVOID AT ALL COST
ordered a carrot cake for Mother’s Day and it arrived battered,mis shapped,finger prodded mess! Emailed them didn’t get an email back till Tuesday from the Friday was told because it was edible I couldn’t have a refund? In what way was it edible?who would eat somthing that turned up like it did and not knowing who had touched it because it was clear has day someone had,I asked to speak to the manager in the email to be told he was the manager which was more alarming that he was giving off this information telling a customer to eat the carrot cake! Erm health and safety issues right there raise a red flag! He has now ignored my last email so here is my honest review and advise others not to purchase from him,I will now post on my other platforms shouting out the service and quality I received with all pictures and correspondence
Get better service and quality from a Aldi bought cake in my opinion
Reply
You knew very well I still have the mess,I refused to pay out of my own pocket for your **** returned,refusing full refund and asking a customer to still eat it in that way is pure filth!!
Response Text: From the photos the cake looked like it had minor cracks in the icing, we did offer a partial refund for this but customer wanted a full refund, we asked to return as per our terms but customer seems to not have the cake any more?

Review Text: Sent the wrong cake. My daughter will be really disappointed on her birthday tomorrow (no time to put this right). Never again!
Response Text: Hi we ran out of the cake you ordered and called you 4 times, we could not get through so replaced with a more or less identical cake, We never like to leave customers without a cake in case it is for a special occasion. All cakes are back in stock now.

Excellent, delicious cake , I ordered the pick your own cake slices, every flavor was delicious tasty and fresh, fast delivery would definitely order again .

Cake arrived in a bit of a mess...

Clearly ended up upside down in transit, top was flattened and all the biscoff biscuits were a soggy mess.

Chocolate drips broken, and looked total mess.

Didn't have anytime to wait for another so bought a pack of biscoff and spent about an hour trying to make the top look half decent.

Customer service offered £5 for my troubles.

Told them to keep it, as that didn't even cover the delivery cost!!

Rubbish cakes and even worse customer service.

Had a reply saying 1 bit of chocolate broken, the top was flattened. Pity I can't post images.

Update, desserts delivered have tried on two occasions to remove this review, 2nd time denying ever supplying me.

If a company goes this far trying to stop negative reviews the score on here is a total fabrication of reality.

Had I not had an order number, copy of the receipt and an email thread from Charlie in customer services it probably would and still could be taken down.

Bad form Desserts Delivered, own up to the truth and accept criticism.

Also blocked me on Instagram now... clearly do not like anyone having a bad experience so they just ignore them and block them....
Response Text: The cake literally had one bit of chocolate broken, We feel £5 was more than generous for this

Review Title: If only there was a zero rating
Review Text:
If only there was a zero rating. Seriously do not waste your money!! Such a shame I couldn’t add a picture of the shambles of the cake I received. I Ordered the new Biscoff cake. It looked nothing like their website picture. No toffee drip, no white chocolate buttons, no crushed Biscoff crumb at the bottom. Cheap, nasty buttercream, tasteless cake. It went in the bin. I also ordered candles as an add on, they never arrived.
Customer services a joke. Charlie told me they had tried to call me to say they couldn’t make the ordered cake. I have no missed calls. He then said I’d requested a cheaper version and they’d upgraded my order. I sent him a copy of my invoice where it clearly states i ordered and paid for the deluxe version. I asked him to send a replacement, he said he would if I sent the received cake back. I agreed. Since then nothing despite sending several emails,… do not waste your money!!

In response to your reply. The cake looked nothing like the brochure and my photo clearly showed this. No toffee drip, no white chocolate decoration, no biscuit crumb at the bottom and no candles I’d paid extra for!!
Response Text: The cake looked exactly how it did online and we also receive a photo from you to show this?

Review Title: Terrible customer service and poor product
Review Text:
A Biscoff cake ordered for my son's 18th Birthday. When we opened the cake (on his birthday) the wrong cake was in the box that we had no alternative to use because we had no time to source an alternative cake.
When I contacted the 'Charlie' at the company he/she told me that they had "run out of Biscoff cakes so had decided to send us an alternative cake'!
I had assumed that an honest mistake had been made but to hear that the company had taken the decision to send a random cake with NO effort to contact me and ask if I would like to cancel the order or receive a different cake was really disappointing.
The company was un apologetic and said that they would only refund the order if I sent back the cake (at my expense) un used. This was obviously impossible as we did not have time to source another cake which the company would have known.

The actual cake that arrived was very unattractive and completely unsuitable for my son's 18th. It was covered in neon orange and over sweet (more suited to 5 year old).

I am seriously disappointed with the lack of customer service and disappointing product that arrived and would definitely not recommend this company based on our experience.
Response Text: We tried to call you before we sent this cake and replaced when we could not get in touch as we never like to leave a customer without, we sent a more expensive cake

Review Text:
Awful customer service!

Ordered a 6 box of brownies as a secret Santa present. But was sent some miniature brownies which is not what I ordered. Tried to contact them and it took ages for them to respond and the response was that they tried to call me. I had no missed calls or a voicemail. Their response has now been for me to send the brownies back for a refund, 2 weeks after they were delivered to me. Why should I have to pay to send an item back I did not order and why would they want brownies back that they can not resell. Also when I looked at the brownies they looked so dry. Will not be using this service ever again, such a disappointment.


Update.

Hahaha what a joke they are saying refund given and issue resolved. Well that's a lie I've not received any refund. Avoid this company they are liars.
Response Text: Refund issued to customer and resolved.

Review Text: 3rd time I have ordered , as always the cake was delivered on time , the cake was delicious and I made a mistake with the address , I emailed Charlie at customer services and it was rectified straight away with excellent communication .
The cake was wonderful! High quality and perfect sizes
The cake was really lovely and well presented. The cake had an great texture and taste. It was well packaged and was delivered on time

Review Title: DONT USE THEM IF YOU WANT YOUR CAKE TO ARRIVE
Review Text:
Ordered a cake and cupcakes yesterday for delivery today. My sons 18th is tomorrow, Saturday. Today the cupcakes have arrived. NO CAKE. Yesterday I also needed to change the order. Telephoned. Was told to email. Have now emailed 4 times. No reply. Have telephoned again 3 times. No reply. What am I supposed to do now? Shocking service.

Update: see their rather snippy reply. Interesting that they reply to this review but have yet to fulfill their promise to reply within 5 hours to an email - 24 hours and counting. Also, I have only received information from the courier regarding ONE parcel, not two, so even now I am not convinced that the cake will arrive. On top of that, the cupcakes arrived in an enormous polystyrene box easily big enough to fit the cake- not great in terms of carbon footprint to send two packages. And never mind you can’t reach them by phone at all either- it just rings out.

New update - still no email, call, delivery…

Latest update - 21 Sept- the cake never did arrive, my autistic son was very upset, and I have yet to receive a proper apology or refund.

New update 21 Sept - just went on to Instagram and found this message from them - I’ll let you judge for yourselves the professionalism of this company!

Your language is disgusting we won’t reply to you learn how to talk to people you rude little girl
Response Text: Two parcels were sent one is on the way, you would know this if you just contacted DHL rather than leaving a negative review?

Review Title: Poor quality cakes, shoddy service, selling product they don’t have
Review Text:
The cakes advertised are not of the quality delivered and certainly not premium cakes. Better off with a supermarket or something you’ve seen before. Sent the wrong cake and then told that they tried to call me. No email sent, their number is not on their website so I can’t even validate that they rang me and doesn’t justify that I got sent a cake which I had not ordered and they should not take orders or advertise product they don’t have- that’s the definition of a scam. Cake that arrived had cheap broken biscuits and some weird looking smearing on the box and packaging- very messy. Unprofessional when contacted to check why I’d been sent the wrong cake. Refused to send a returns slip even though this is what they say on their website. Refused to refund the shipping I had to pay to ship the return and despite DPD notifying them of the delivery coming they didn’t bother to change it to a delivery that would suit them so it was delivered next door and they claim they don’t have it. Don’t buy and save yourself the headache. Should have trusted my instinct when I saw some of the images with wonky cakes.

Following my review the company flagged my review to be taken down despite not responding to the proof of returns I sent them. They asked for an order number to back my review. I provided this and they continued to flag the review as false. I have now had to send the email exchange to TrustPilot. No professional business deals with customers in that way. I find it questionable that they have that many positive reviews as my experience is uncannily similar to a lot of the one star reviews that I hadn’t even read until I started the refund process. What an unnecessary headache.
Response Text: We are not a scam we are a reputable company and have many happy customers, you demanded a refund for a product you received but refused to send it back as you clearly enjoyed it. Unfortunately we are a business not a charity and can’t just send free items to people and refund them. Good try though. Thanks Thanks

Review Title: I ordered a cake for my son’s…
Review Text: I ordered a cake for my son’s birthday22nd of December and was at work and specifically told there driver to deliver at a neighbours house which they didn’t they left it on my front door step and took a picture of proof when I got home no cake was there and dessert’s bakery are very u helpful and asked me to contact the delivery company when contacting them they said it was down to desserts bakery they have been extremely unhelpful and rude £55 lost and a cake for my son’s birthday. It’s absolutely disgusting and everyone should know not to order from them as they just dump ur cake on your door step and come back with no help but to contact the driver company it should b down to them im such a angry customer as it’s been nearly a month now and nothing! Bad company bad buisness go elsewhere people!!!! I’ve also just read that a refund was issued and a new cake which is such a lie not true at all they are covering there buisness absolute liars!!!!!
Response Text: Refund and new cake was issued

Review Text:
Like Imogen below, I have also had an issue with delivery (first missed agreed date and then non-delivery), and been refused a refund.

They also told me they have proof it was delivered - which may be correct, but it was not delivered to me. I have spoken with DPD who, after investigating, have confirmed the cake was delivered to wrong address and as it is perishable goods, they can not do anything about this. Screenshots of this conversation with DPD were sent to company as proof.

I have explained to the company my contract is with them and not DPD, so it is up to them to refund me and take it up with DPD themselves. This absurd company is having none of it though; their emails are rude and curt. I’m pretty sure it’s just one person who runs the company who doesn’t know what they are doing, cos all emails sound the same childish, and clueless tone.

Anyway, I have given them until Thursday to issue the refund before I request a chargeback via Bank, and then a Small Claim if that isn’t successful. I will update this review then to let everyone know if they refunded or not.

I’m sure the cake maker will be on here soon to respond to this in the same manner they responded to Imogen below. I know what they said to Imogen is lies, cos it’s the same lies they are telling me, so take it with a pinch of salt, and just avoid this clown company.

UPDATE (04.04.24): I have heard nothing back from the company since, and received no refund. I have just lodged the dispute with my bank to request a chargeback (this was really simple to do in my banking app (Monzo); so if you’ve also been ripped off by this company (or any other) - please consider this process too!)

Will update again in due course.

UPDATE 2 04.04.23: Less than 90 minutes after starting the dispute with my bank, I have received a full refund via the dispute.

UPDATE 05.04.23: In response to the cake maker - I did not receive the cake, and the refund was issued by chargeback, not voluntarily ??.
Response Text: Customer received cake and has also been refunded in full.

Review Title: You're not guaranteed to get what you order and they don't tell you what was delivered instead.
Review Text:
Ordered cookie pies for my son. He received brownies. How can a company, that states on their website that they bake fresh daily, not have the items in stock, that they know they have orders to fulfill?
If they had contacted me I wouldn't have chosen brownies, but its a poor service when they just send whatever they have in stock.

My son enjoyed the brownies, but he regularly makes brownies himself. The cookie pies were a special treat.

Their initial response was to ask for proof as they didn't seem to know what had been supplied. Their next was to briefly apologise and tell me the cookie pies were out of stock. The next reply was to state they had supplied more expensive brownies- when in fact they were the same price.
I think their sales and customer services manager, Charlie, needs to attend training to teach him how to write emails and how to respond to complaints. Letting customers know when they can't supply an item would be a good idea too!

His last ditch offer was an offer to supply more brownies but it was a very insincere response and I didn't want more brownies!!
'If you want i will send him some brownies free o charge for the issues?' was all he wrote.

Definitely won't be using this company again. They obviously don't value their customers.
Update:
Still not received any cookie pies and haven't received a second lot of brownies as I didn't want brownies delivered. Don't think they know what they're doing, plus their grammar on this reply is appalling!
Response Text: We sent you two lots for if brownies free of charge. Not sure what more we can do here?

Review Text: Delivered on time . Cakes were lovely . Will be ordering again
Prompt delivery excellent customer service will defiantly use again highly recommend

We ordered 2 of the chocolate rainbow cakes for our child's birthday from Desserts Delivered. The website says the size is 7" and what we received is 6" in diameter. After raising this with them they said the cakes height should be 7" and not the diameter. So I measured the height and it was 4" cake and 1.5 additional inch for the rainbow topper.

Now I fully expect some approximation as these are hand made cakes but both the ones I ordered have the same measurements (6" x 4" - 5.5" including decoration) which is not as advertised on the site so can't be a mistake.
This is misinformation on the site and at £40 per cake...

I raised all this and sent them photo evidence. No partial compensation was offered. Only a full refund if I returned both cakes at my expense. They did not mention if they would cover shipping. What I wanted was a nominal refund (£10 or £11) as a gesture but they said no to that suggestion. As the party was the next day and no time to order cakes from elsewhere, there was no choice but to use the cakes.

The money isn't the big thing. Its the several emails with their team and them not admitting to the size discrepancies even after I sent photos. At the end of the day it impacts your children's birthday.


** Added after their reply ***
What I asked for was a nominal refund total of £10 for the mis-selling of the sizes of 2 cakes as a gesture but they rejected that. The sizes displayed on the site did not match what was sent at all. They said I had to return the birthday cake to get any refund at all. That is not practical a day before the birthday when it's too late to order another cake from somewhere else. What would have been great is to provide the sizes stated. I provided photo evidence of the actual sizes. I also have the email chain backing up the above.
Response Text: The sizes, weight and servings are clerly displayed online and were the exact measurements sent, Customer seeking refund but still happy to eat and keep the cakes after full refund was offered.

Review Text: AVOID this company!! I ordered a cake weeks in advance for my daughter’s birthday, it arrived on the 12th  as planned, as soon as I opened it, I noticed the decorations had fell off & smashed to bits, the top of the cake was all cracked down to the sponge and several dents on the side. I get this was obviously done in transit, so I emailed desserts delivered bakery straight away to inform them & sent several photos(shame I can’t upload them on here) to show how bad the damage was, the famous ‘Charlie’ who’s name seems to pop up on here with all the bad reviews, responded to say “would I like some money back?” So obviously I said yes, as i was now going to have to go out an spend even more money on things to try and cover All the damage & try & some how make it presentable for the birthday party in less than 24 hours time! Once i agreed to the part refund, Charlie then ignored my reply and said I need to send more pictures, but this time from afar?? As if the several close up photos he had wernt bad enough! I sent him more photos of the damage, and I got a response ending the conversation saying he will pass my complaint on to DPD! So I responded asking what is going on with my refund he offered, to which Charlie then back tracked and said I wasn’t getting a refund unless I return the damaged cake ..out of my OWN pocket!  I explained I didn’t want a full refund, and I have said this over and over again via email, and that it was too late to return it as the party was the following day and I wouldn’t be paying more money to return something that was damaged by someone else! Since then Charlie has proceeded to ignore the majority of my emails, refused to give any partial refund even though it was him who originally offered one, and told me I won’t be getting a refund unless I pay for it to be returned, because “that isn’t how a buisness works”! Basically rude,patronising, unprofessional with zero customer service skills! I have informed them of the law regarding consumer rights and they have yet again chose to ignore my email. So I am now having to take it further. Avoid this place ,  the size of their T&Cs it’s a massive red flag!  The long list of mistakes/bad reviews/ trying to get the bad reviews taken down, along with poor service on here alone, speaks volumes! Give your money to a reputable professional company.They are trying to get my review taken down now, speaks volumes about these people! Their reply saying Iv been sent a partial refund is absolutely NOT TRUE!
Response Text: Partial refund was sent to customer.

Review Text: Absolutely shocking customer service from this company half my order missing emailed them promised to resend items three days later still no delivery blaming shipping company for loosing them on both occasions avoid this company and order elsewhere
Response Text: Proof was sent to customer as this was delivered and customer was looking for some freebies, good try though!

Review Text: I ordered a cake for my Son's 10th Birthday with a selected delivery day of Friday, I then received a notification from DHL saying the driver had been delayed and was unable to deliver the cake, and after a few messages to DHL the cake finally arrived on the Monday a day after my son's Birthday, Charlie at Dessert's Delivered Bakery Customer Service was superb through all of this and even though it wasn't there fault issued a full refund, I'm told the cake was absolutely delicious even though it was a bit worse for wear when it arrived due to DHL delivering it 3 days late but I would have absolutely no hesitation in ordering from them again, thankyou again Dessert's Delivered Bakery and especially Charlie for your superb handling of this !
Superb all round experience. Delivery was first class and cheesecakes were absolutely delightful. Would definitely recommend
WRONG CAKE delivered. Very disappointed as first time ordering.

Excellent service
Arrived in perfect condition and tasted delicious.
Will definitely be ordering again.
Excellent service, on time delivery and it was really delicious

Excellent service . . . Great presentation . . . Cannot be faulted & would definitely recommend

13/09

Review Title: I ordered an Oreo cake for my daughters…
Review Text: I ordered an Oreo cake for my daughters birthday, delivery for the day before so it’s still fresh, I ordered a 7” cake and the cake is 5.5” across and 5.5” in height. It’s tiny! Having now seen the reviews this seems to be a common occurrence. Will not be ordering again.
Response Text: The cake sizes are approximate as shown online, The cakea are around 7-8" in height not diameter.

Review Text:
They delivered the wrong cake which was £10 cheaper than the one I ordered and I when I contacted them I never received any response. This was the 28th July when I sent my initial email. Numerous chasers over email, Facebook and Instagram and I never received a response. Final chaser on 7th September and they just refunded me the £10, but still no response back.

Just seen their response - they refunded the money as soon as I said I’m going to leave a bad review. Why did it take from the 28th July on my first email to the 7th September to do that? I wish I could post screenshots of the 5 emails I sent, 2 Instagram messages and multiple Facebook messages, so the fact they said they tried to contact me is a complete lie because they never did or respond to me messaging them.
Response Text: We refunded the difference for the cheaper cake as we could not get in touch to offer a replacement to the customer. Customer was happy with this not sure why they have left a negative review

Review Text: I ordered the mint aero cake and when it got delivered it had got squashed in transit. I contacted the team and they sent me another cake of my choice to replace the squashed one.. A very professional and friendly service and absolutely gorgeous cakes….. inside and out !!!!order something you won’t regret it!! 10/10 well done Deserts delivered Bakery xx

I ordered cupcakes for my husbands birthday where they were delivered but unfortunately they were inedible on delivery due to them being in transit all day in the hot weather. When my husband opened the package there was only 1 small pack of dry ice in there which wasn’t enough to keep them at the correct temperature for the journey. Unfortunately we had to throw the cupcakes away as they were not edible due to the heat which made the topping melt ! I emailed desserts delivered straight away to explain that I was not happy with my delivery and wanted a full refund for the cakes we could not enjoy, however the sales/customer service manager told me the cupcakes were fine and that I won’t be getting a refund unless I returned the cupcakes !! Which for one would have been at my cost of sending them back causing me to waste more money on something I had already paid for and was unhappy with plus I had thrown them in the bin which I explained. I was then met with a few more rude emails stating that I was lying and trying to rip off a small family business. To be honest I’ve never experienced bad customer service like this I was in shock that now it remains that I’m more unhappy with the way I have been treated as a customer than the cupcakes themselves. If you work in customer service like I do you make sure your customers come first and you do what you can to make them happy. Not one apology or offer to replace the cupcakes nothing but rude emails which I still have and will keep. I feel whilst this business clearly has some amazing feedback from happy customers they also need to deal with the unhappy ones with a good customer attitude and try to help to make there experience better. I did email them this and said that had they of done something to help or apologised or something I would of been a returning customer where I would order more cupcakes however I was met with a rude reply saying oh well I’m sure we will cope without you as a customer. It’s a shame that this has happened and it has left me very upset more so with the response from this company than the cupcakes themselves. Absolutely disgraceful behaviour and customer service non existent!!
Response Text: From the images shown the cupcakes are not melted and fine to eat, They do not need to be "frozen"

Review Text: I paid £47 for a cake serving 14 people it turned up and was tiny . I complained . They were not interested until I wrote a review . Because I think their cakes are sub standard for the money . Manager said take your review down we will give you a refund . No refund and awful customer service . Please don’t buy from this company. I bought a cake from cake box cheaper and double the size. I never at any point said I loved their cakes all lies . I just like value for money . Of course I wanted a partial refund I paid £47 for a £15 cake . Not trying to ruin a business . Just don’t want anyone else ripped off
Response Text: Joanne loved our cakes just like all of the other positive reviews we have here, Its a shame some people will try to rip off a small business for financial gain!

We have got a cake from Desserts Delivered for my last two birthdays and it's always been the biscoff cake.

First time ordering from this company as was looking for cup cakes as a leaving gift. Receiver loved the cakes, arrived in time on the day requested.  Will order from them again.

Review Text: Great service, very quick turnaround and cake tasted amazing! Definitely will be coming back!

Review Title: Lovely cake delivered on time and well…

Quick delivery with regular updates progress. Biscoff biscuits are my wife’s favourite, so I ordered the Biscoff cake. It was absolutely lush. One of the best cakes I’ve had.
Thank you DDB!!!!

Ordered a box of 6 mini cheesecakes for my birthday - BIscoff and White Chocolate ones were great, the oreo ones had turned so were inedible.
I raised it with their team on the 27/7 - have chased 3 times and finally got a response today from their sales and customer service manager offering me some discount on future orders but no specification of how much. Not good enough really given I spent £30 and a 3rd of the order was not edible. Pretty sure I would have a case with trading standards for them not providing goods as paid for - instead I'll just leave reviews everywhere I can in the hope they see them. Overall - good product offering but the very poor customer service lets them done - I shouldn't have had to chase a 'customer service manager' 3 times to get a response to my complaint. Shame, as I won't be ordering again.
REPLY: At NO point did the company ask me to return the products - I would have been happy to do so. The oreo cookie ones tasted 'fizzy' like food does when it has turned. The fact they have responded to this review but not direct to me via email says everything I need to know.
Response Text: All of our cheesecakes are made fresh to order, we have sold millions over the last 5 years we have never had a complaint of any products being "inedible" we asked buyer to return but they declined,

Review Text:
The cake is delicious and arrived in perfect Condition. Very well-packed and insulated.

Will definitely be ordering more cakes. ??

Reviewer Name: serengirl what's up I'm a jake pauler
Review Text: My Cake was delivered with care and when i was told it would be, it was fresh,,tasty and still eatable 5 days later. Thanks for the cake we loved it…

Amazing Bakery!  We have tried many flavours now and nothing, not one cake, has disappointed.  We are looking forward to our next one!  The ordering system is so easy, they are reasonable and the delivery well rehearsed.  The packaging is brilliant, we have had many cakes now and they have all arrived in tact, quite amazing!  The look and taste are like no other. The variety allows a different cake most of the time and as I said we are getting through the range! This company was used as no other bakery could supply a 21st cake on New Year's Eve, they could and did!  I will use time and time again and have no hesitation in recommending them.

Ordered the Lindt Deluxe Chocolate Cake for my daughter’s birthday. Arrived exactly when it was meant to and beautifully packed. The cake looked amazing and my daughter said it was the best chocolate cake she had ever tasted. She said she even dreamed about it!

Cake was fine, a bit dry but ok. I ordered two fountain candles with the cake but these were not included, I am now trying to chase up a refund for these candles but I am being ignored. Absolutely appalling customer service, it’s been over a week since the delivery and nobody is helping me.

Ordered on the 27th July lovely chocolate and mint cake, for Saturday 29th July husbands birthday also ordered 14" gold J baklon and blue sparkles. Received message at 7.40am on Saturday saying won't be delivered until Monday. Spent all Saturday morning rushing to shops to replace everything, no one responded via email or phone. So now its Monday 31st and waiting for delivery so I can reject it and also started PayPal dispute...fir my money back ......use at your own risk delivery not guranteed
Response Text: this was refunded as the courier was delayed with the order

Review Text: Fantastic treats. We all have our own favourite treat and highly recommend.

Review Title: Cookies and cream cake! Very tasty!
Review Text: First time ordering cake online… will order again. Can be delivered next day or date of your choosing which is very helpful. Cake was securely packaged and delivered with no damage. Daughter very pleased with it, everyone at party was complimentary to the flavour, moistness and look of the cake and amazed that it was ordered online and delivered in one piece.
Arrived the next morning. Haven’t tried the cake as it’s a gift, although it looks incredible. Packaging is also very nice. Thank you!

Cake arrived looked like the box had been dropped one one corner, opened the cake up and was so disappointed to see the cake and the ice packs it had been packed with was completely thawed. I tried to salvage the cake as much as possible, however as the cake was thawed the bag that was placed over the cake was stuck to the frosting, so when I took it off it came off with the bag, the chocolate drip was cracked and broken and I was just utterly gutted as, had it not been shipped so poorly it would have been a beautiful cake. We didn’t end up presenting this cake for the birthday party as it just looked too messy and lop sided really unfortunate as it was a yummy cake ????

Review Text: I made a confirmed order on 7th July for a friend’s birthday on 11th July. After a few delays it arrived and the cheesecakes were described as “beautiful and delicious”. Review Text: This is my third delivery from Desserts delivered bakery, each cake has always been amazing in quality, look and most definitely taste! The first time I ordered from here was December 2019 and the quality hasn't changed once. The delivery is fantastic as every cake comes frozen so they don't budge. I've found it better to order for two days before you need it just incase there's ever a day's delay. Overall, I'd 100% recommend buying any cake from here, you won't be disappointed, especially with the butter cream ones!!!

Tried to get in touch but no number for them, only an email address, as I wanted  this corrected today for tomorrow. Totally  messed up and spoilt a part of my daughters 18th, as I will never get a cake now. Expect full refund and collection of the cake.  absolutely unacceptable!!

Ordered for my sons 2nd birthday. It was one of many cakes as this was his first real birthday party after spending over a Yr in hospital. Excellent delivery service

Review Title: Peanut butter cake was essentially a chocolate cake
Review Text: We ordered a peanut butter chocolate cake as my daughter is a big fan of Reeses. The cake was, as described a chocolate cake but (unlike the description) didn’t taste also of peanut butter. The icing was vanilla and there were some Reese’s style cups on top. Overall a nice chocolate cake but not what we expected. Delivery and packaging were very good.

Shame, the cake would have been lovely had it not been delivered at 7.30pm and left outside all night and  cracked and ruined. These are issues with the delivery company and not the baker but when raised with Desserts Delivered the lack of service was very apparent. Told they will investigate with courier, chased 4 times in 3 weeks THEN told to return if wished a refund (after 3 weeks?), it was already in the bin by then. Also told that they guarantee only the delivery date but it was delivered at night after I waited in all day (I am expected to wait in on a Friday evening too- beyond business hours). NO understanding that their responsibility is to hold the courier to account (cake showed as signed for, but I had no idea it was there and did not sign for it). Had to replace the cake in a mad rush. Im sure it would be fine if the courier did their job but if you do need the help of Desserts Delivered then forget it, offered the postage refund but I preferred to share my feedback so that others don't waste their money. I didn't consider the damage to be minor, left out all night in the frost. I also didn't consider being repeatedly blanked good service, but then perhaps Im fussy. Shame to have to argue with them but they seem to think Im trying to get a free cake and miss the point that the cake was not as I paid for and had to be replaced.
Response Text:
Hi Lindsay, The cake was delivered on the date you picked, No answer at the door so the courier left in a safe place, The cake had a minor crack in it, We did offer a partial refund but you declined and also a full refund when returning the unwanted item.
We always try to deliver on the date the customer asks which we did on this occasion and try to help customers in every way as you can see from 95% of our reviews, Thanks

Review Text: Some 3 weeks before my wife's 40th birthday and I hadn't sorted a cake. After looking online I found Desserts delivered bakery. I'll be honest, the main selling point for me was the designated delivery date. No chancing it a few days before and hoping. Now the amazing bit. The cake! We had the Jammy Dodger cake, and in the words of my wife. 'The best birthday cake she had ever eaten. We are looking for excuses to buy another one already.
First time ordered from Desserts Delivered Bakery for my son’s birthday. The Red Velvet cake was so delicious and fresh. Packaging was amazing came with pretty cake box. Highly recommended :)

The cake was delicious as always... my only gripe is that you have to pay to put a message with the cake. The sales manager has previously said they were looking into this but no change as yet. Having paid £12.95 for a Saturday delivery I would have thought a simple message to say who it is from should be free !!!
I ordered the lotus biscoff cake and everyone LOVED it! The cake was moist and buttercream smooth and not to sweet.

Shocking service!! Stay well away.. Ordered a cake with a card and candles on 30th May for a Birthday which is on the 4th June. They guaranteed delivery for the 3rd June and just had an email stating the delivery will now be 5th June. No good what so ever. Will never use this company again. Can’t be trusted with their guaranteed delivery dates!

UPDATE 3RD JUNE
I just received an email stating I should have ordered the cake atleast a day before it’s needed to avoid the cake not arriving. Obviously they can’t read either, I ordered the cake 3 days prior!!!!!!! And they won’t refund me unless I take this review down. This company is an absolute joke lol….

REPLY…

You have already sent me an email stating I will only get a refund if I take this review down regardless whether the cake is returned or not?? The cake arrived in the end, damaged, squashed plus the pop up card which arrived which was suppose to have a hand written note that I typed on your website page?? Card arrived with no note hand written, completely blank?? Your company is a joke. Will never use you again… Total waste of money..
Response Text: The cake was delivered with a slight delay, if you are not happy please return for a refund - Please see our reviews we have many great reviews

Review Text: Thesw cupcakes are absolutely amazing. They are so sofr an so full of flavour. Have ordered twice and will order again. Good customer service and good communication.

I ordered a cake on Thursday for delivery on the 27th May! I emailed to confirm the delivery date would actually be the delivery date as the confirmation email of my order was a little confusing. I got a reply to say yes the delivery would definitely be on the 27th. However DHL sent a email to say there had been an update with delivery and it would not be delivered today 27th my sons 11 birthday! Instead it would be with us on the next working day which is Tuesday(due to bank holiday) which is no good and the cake will have been decorated and spoilt by then. No reply from the email this morning or telephone from either the cake company or DHL £52 wasted.

Update 28th May.
Had a email saying they would only refund me, if I removed the review on trust pilot as it’s defamation… and that I should have perhaps ordered it with more notice. Well, I have a paper trail specifically asking if the cake would be delivered on time, and Martin, sales manager you said yes it would be! Funny how you didn’t reply to phone calls and emails yesterday. Yet you fully responded when I put a review on here. Martin darling, I’m suggesting that you should consider, perhaps some Continued Professional Development (CPD), such as a customer service course? I’m sure holding customers refunds to ransom over trust pilot reviews definitely won’t be anywhere in the course materials.
May 30th Update
Since putting this review on here the company said I had lied about turn of unfortunate events and flagged my review to trust pilot. I gladly gave them requested evidence. Also DHL tried to deliver the cake today (30th) of which I refused, they tried to hand it to me upside down, clearly the box was marked this way up with directional arrows pointing upwards - delivery drivers reply was “oh yeah didn’t see that there”. I have been offered a refund, for which I am yet to see, and refused the offer to keep the cake.
Don’t order from this company as they dispute everything you say and call you a liar. Can’t comment on the cake which is a shame really.
06.06.23. Update
Although company states I’ve been refunded I will let you know when the funds reach my account.still no refund now they are point blank refusing . Disgusting never will recommend stay away from these cowboys ruined a birthday.
Response Text: Cuatomer refunded in full

Review Title: Ordered a Ferraro rocher cake for my…

Ok so on YT I follow a company and their subscribers send gifts which the work men enjoy but I know the lady who drops in weekends for a little work gets none, so, me been a kind olden I decided to send her a gift. Now I know nothing about lady gifts so me mate google was used and this company popped up, decided to look into it. Went on the website and I liked what I seen so decided on a gift of delicate fairy cakes, easy to order and pay for and continued. I had the email telling me when the courier would collect and deliver and true to the email they was delivered on time. The company I sent them to puts out videos on YT and I watched the lady open the box, it was well packed with dry ice I think it was to keep the cakes cool, her face was pure delight, said its made her week and she adored the cakes.
And on that I give this company 5 stars and will use again in the future. Thank you!

Extremely poor customer service and a plethora of excuses with no action or delivery refund after the cake was not delivered to my address. They admitted they were having problems with the delivery in email exchanges before ignoring multiple requests for a refund of just £6.99 for the delivery, a service I did not receive. The only option they gave was to return the cake 3 weeks later for a full refund only after I escalated the claim to PayPal. The cake was fine but they do not care if you have any problems after you pay them.

I had to collect the cake from a post office over 10 miles away, there are 3 post offices within 2 miles of my location.

Hi Matt
Are you going to be home this week we want to send one of our reps to speak in person regarding your lies on trust pilot. We find this highly offensive and want to speak about this asap
