Response Text: This was delivered hence why you did not get the refund off paypal. Enjoy the cake - we would never pay anyone to remove a review this is ridiculous. Thanks

Review Title: It was great ordered a waffle and one…
Review Text: It was great ordered a waffle and one scoop of ice cream but the ice cream was rather pricy and it wasn’t even one scoop more like half a scoop it came fast but charged me over priced by £2 absolute scam you dint get a lot for your money
Response Text: we dont sell ice creams?

Review Title: Delicious! The cakes are as described
Review Text:
The cakes are as described, a great size and packaged well so you don't need to worry about delivery.
Everyone comments on how delicious the cake is!!
Absolutely thrilled with my daughters 30th birthday cake.  Ordering, delivery and eating was flawless.  Everyone savoured each mouthful. Thank you

Ordered a lotus biscoff cake from this company and it came well packaged. The customer service was great, the company always replied quickly on any questions I had. The cake arrived on time and was absolutely delicious! I will definitely be ordering again

Review Title: Ordered my best friend a birthday cake…
Review Text: Ordered my best friend a birthday cake and it was absolutely amazing ?? packaged perfectly aswell

Review Title: Failed to deliver the product 3 separate times!
Review Text:
Failed to deliver the cheesecakes I ordered for a birthday 3 times. First time was for a birthday which was missed - they blamed the courier despite the courier emailing me an update the day before stating they hadn’t received the item for delivery. I was told it would then be the Monday - again this was missed. We agreed a further date (6 days after the birthday this was for) and it still didn’t arrive - the excuse this time was that I hadn’t confirmed I wanted it delivered on that date. My opinion is that as we were having an email discussion about finally getting the product I’d paid delivered this was very heavily implied but apparently not as I didn’t end my final email with, ‘yes please deliver on Thursday’. Even if I give the benefit of the doubt shouldn’t they have been chasing up to ensure their 2 previous mistakes were rectified?
Terrible customer service (Martin gave no apologies or acknowledgment of the poor service and was sometimes emailing at 1am - maybe they are too busy to manage properly? The approach appears to be to make you feel like you’re going mad and to lie in the emails however I did get a full refund when I requested this which seems better than others have had.
Ridiculous company who can’t fulfil what they agree to do - deliver cakes on time or at 2 further dates - please avoid avoid avoid!
***addition since adding this review - this company are trying to claim this review is not genuine. They are either complete liars or ridiculously useless! I provided the extra info requested and a simple search of my email address would have shown 20+ emails I sent to them to still not receive the cheesecakes!? I’ve now had to submit photographic evidence to trust pilot of the order as the company don’t believe it is genuine even though they responded to the review saying I’d been refunded!? As I said what a ridiculous company! Much faster on here than via email and maybe spending time owning up to mistakes and sorting them rather than denying reviews might improve the company outcomes - just a suggestion!
Response Text: You were refunded in full, not sure what more we could have done here, our courier let us down which does not happen alot hence our excellent ration on trustpilot

Review Text: Ordered a cake last minute. It came within a couple of days,on time and as requested. The quality was fantastic, the cake looked fab,tasted fab and was demolished in minutes. The cake board was a little flimsy and therefore I replaced it with another but apart from that it was perfect. I'll definitely be ordering again.
Lovely cheesecakes delivered for my workplace

Ordered two weeks in advance to be delivered a day before a birthday and arrived on time,  well packaged. Cake looked a little small in the box but actually was perfect for 16 of us and was delicious. Would recommend
Ordered the cake on a Friday for the following Friday. Tracking details sent on the Thursday. One hour time slot given. Cake arrived well packaged and well presented. Thanks so much!

Website is well organised and full of information regarding each cake and also placing an order was quick and easy.
The cake arrived intact and looked amazing as it was incredibly well packaged.
Tasted absolutely gorgeous and lasted well, definitely recommended for a special occasion cake.
Ordered mini cheescakes for friends birthday , arrived when said and i'm told they were absolutely delicious

What a lovely cake, it tasted so soft and fresh, by far one of the best cakes I have ever eaten. I ordered it to be delivered 1 day before the event as I know what shipping company’s are like and it arrived on the correct day. The cake looked exactly like the one pictured and it was packaged up good so didn’t spoil. I presume they bake it a few days before shipping so I was a bit sceptical whether it would be hard, but it wasn’t. I did look a bit small but it was just enough & filled for the 10 people that ate it.  I will definitely be ordering again if I need a cake for an event.
Great way to order and get a special celebration cake. The cake tasted delicious, best cake I’ve had. My family loved it and as a result some have placed an order themself .
Excellent cake that was delivered right on time for my dad's birthday. Very pleased and wouldn't hesitate to use this company again - highly recommend.

I ordered a cake for my partners 50th , I ordered before reading reviews on here and honestly I was scared after, however the date came and the cake actually came on time and not even a scratch, I was shocked considering the distance from Newcastle hub to reading , it was packaged so well and the freezer packs were still frozen , the cake itself tasted amazing ?? I will definitely order again

Review Title: Delicious and affordable cakes and accessories
Review Text:
I have ordered cakes a couple of times from this company and have never regretted it. It's pocket friendly.
Ordering online line cannot be easy, you choose what you like with ease and will be delivered promptly, well-packaged with no breakage or mess.
You can't miss this. Am still coming back to order more.
Thank you.

Review Title: My Daughters Special Birthday  service the cake was so well
Review Text:
Excellent service the cake was so well packed and delivered with care.
The cake was stunning and everyone thought it was delicious to eat. Well done! Desserts Delivered Bakery!

Review Title: One star is even too much for this…
Review Text:
One star is even too much for this absolutely shocking, dishonest, useless excuse of a company. DO NOT ORDER.
The company not only didn’t make the cake in time they then LIED and said there was issues with Parcel force and it wasn’t their problem. After stating they’d posted the cake too late anyway, and I wanted a refund they said they couldn’t due to it being perishable. On their website it states you can have a refund up to 30 days. First load of waffle.
They then offered me 50% back. I didn’t want the cake the party had been and I was then £25 out of pocket for a cake that had been “in the post” for 5 days!!!
After many emails back and forth they reluctantly said to post back.
£10 postage, a photo at the post office, proof of postage and confirmation that it HAD been delivered to their depot, the pathetic excuse of a sales manager Martin, then lied yet again, and said it hadn’t been delivered.
Luckily I paid through PayPal, raised the dispute and they had to pay me back.
DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!!! Save yourself the hassle, go to M&S and get a scrummy cake off the shelf and make it your own!
Scammers don’t win!
Response Text: `We sent the cake with our new courier and they had some delays, we have no reason to lie about deliveries. We offered customer a refund and paypal does not refund when we confirmed it was delivered. We refunded this person in full

Review Text:
Update**
The cake was not fine, it was delivered upside down. There was also missing and incorrect items in my order. Customer service dude (most likely the owner) very funny though. Messaging me @ midnight on a Saturday and emailing to say even though he already said he’d actioned the refund that he wouldn’t now because of my review lol I paid by credit card so the bank will sort that for me & email trail is comedy to be shared. But really appreciate all the extra attention from ‘Martin’.

Cake delivered upside down the day before the party and destroyed. Not able to speak to anyone on the phone, customer service (Martin) was useless. The cake was not fit for use and they were only willing to give a 50% refund (which they are delaying processing whilst arguing over email) stating that to get a full refund I would need to pay to send the cake back special delivery (in a cost of living crisis when I now have to go and source a new cake the day before my wife’s 30th birthday). Save yourself the hassle!
Response Text: The cake was actually delivered fine and the customer received the wrong cake, as a genuine human error we offered 50% refund or 100% refund if the cake was returned. Thanks

Review Title: This was the third cake ordered from Desserts Delivered
Review Text: This was the third cake ordered from this company. Ordered for my sister's birthday on Thursday.. I am in Sheffield, she is in Scotland. Previous courier was DPD but this time it was Parcelforce. What a shambles. The cake got as far as Chorley and when I contacted Parcelforce was told that because of the Easter bank holiday it wouldnt be delivered until Tuesday. No one knew why it was delayed. I then contacted the cake company. They were marvelous. Kept in contact with me, even emailing as late as midnight on the Thursday. The cake was delivered on the Friday. It was in immaculate condition and my sister sent me pictures to prove it. She was thrilled to bits. Thank you Martin at Desserts Delivered, who also tells me that they will be going back to using DPD for deliveries. I'll be using you again. Your cakes are fantastic. x

FINAL UPDATE: I was finally offered a full refund after I called out the lies and poor service here on Trustpilot and you will see above my review has been verified after providing all the evidence to Trustpilot. Needless to say I have NOT received the refund which was offered on condition of removing this review. Good news I raised a dispute with American Express and they have credited my account after I supplied them the evidence.

READ THE GENUINE POOR REVIEWS BEFORE USING THIS COMPANY!!

UPDATED: Desserts Delivered Bakery really don’t like real customer experiences to become public. Trustpilot Content Integrity have been in touch as DDB have challenged my review, I have supplied all supporting documents which will verify my review. I have also provided all email correspondence which also prove that at no time was I offered a partial refund instead I was offered 50% off a future purchase, knowing full well I would never order from this company again. I was told that my email would be passed to the complaints department, they must be inundated as I’m still awaiting a response. The cake was awful and the service is even worse! END OF UPDATE.

Selected the new Biscoff cake for a birthday party, it was well packaged but the cake itself was packed in a plastic bag. The bag was welded to the caramel drizzle so when removing it most of the caramel ended up staying in the bag, the cake looks a mess and I’m really disappointed, I contacted company and sent pictures who offered 50% off next purchase!! I will not be using them again considering the cost of cake and delivery, really wish I’d taken the time to use a local bakery.
Response Text: Full refund offered, Hope you enjoyed the cake. Thanks we have many great reviews with an EXCELLENT ration on trust pilot.

Review Text:
Delivered on special day,
Looked fabulous
Tasted fabulous
And will be ordering for most special occasions now that arise
Used this company for my wife’s 30th birthday cake. Delivered on time, cake was delicious and looked great! Would definitely recommend!

Similar issue to another customer. The wrong cake was delivered which I didn't realise until my friend sent a photo. The thought behind the cake was largely linked to the type of cake I was sending so the intent was essentially lost. Really poor customer service. They just kept telling me that they tried to call me. I had no missed calls on my phone so I know they didn't. The response I got was constantly "we did not want to leave anyone without a cake", which is fair enough but no acknowledgement that they hadn't tried to contact me. I can't comment on the quality of the cake so I won't give any reviews on that (I'm sure they're lovely cakes) but really disappointed with the customer service.
Response Text: HI we always try to call the number provided as we never want to leave anyone without a cake, we hope you enjoyed the replacement cake.

Review Text: My daughter's 21st Birthday cake was amazing. Fast delivery times. Soft, fluffy sponge, yummy icing and the Ferrero chocs were a great touch. Tasted amazing, will definitely order cakes again from Desserts Delivered!

Review Title: Cake was delivered on time and very…
Review Text: Cake was delivered on time and very beautifully packaged and designed ??
Cake was delivered on time and tasted amazing! Ordered for my daughter's 14th birthday and she absolutely enjoyed it, so did everyone else. I would definitely recommend and order from them again.

We love their cakes , always arrive carefully packed and chilled. The cakes are beautifully decorated and delicious. I like that having ordered on line always arrives at time requested.
My daughters favourite is the mixed slice gateau , she can choose all the cakes she loves . Looking forward to our next delivery.

Delicious tasting cake that looked gorgeous and exactly like it did on the website.
I had left my order until the last minute but still managed to get the cake in time for my daughter’s party.
Easily did a party size of 12.

I loved my lindor chocolate cake from cakes delivered bakery! Not only did it taste amazing but the design of the cake was so nice! I have ordered another in the white chocolate lindor flavour cake for my husbands birthday, excited to try! Definitely recommend this company for anyone looking for a good quality celebration cake! :)
My cake was tasty,soft and sweet I love my Ferrero Rocher birthday cake. This is my fourth purchase to this cake shop Thank you.

Review Title: 7 Hours late and cake left in the rain…
Review Text:
7 Hours late and cake left in the rain all day ( at back door of 179 and were at 197 ). Parcelforce also getting a poor review. Avoid online deliveries. They assured us cake packing was waterproof ( probably splash proof ) but left all day in elements and a particularly rainy day.

Cake ruined and had to buy replacement the next day and the cake missed party anyway.

Passed buck to Parcelforce who finally found it ( too late ). Wont online a cake again. Disaster …

Your reply sums the experience up really .. thats a lie as he didn't know where it was. Parcelforce delivery person went to recover it at the end of his shift.He didn't call at house .. he admitted he got the ‘numbers mixed up’ …It was at 179 … not 197 all day. He didn’t call at our house until 645PM.He dropped it at wrong house at 12.05PM ..Which is why he had to go and recover it 6 hours later as data protection prevents them releasing addresses (they send a picture) they also cant text or call drivers during shifts according to their customer teams who said he never should of left it . Ive sent proof including your replies to Trust Pilot. Including your emails .. where it shows the events Ive described with security footage.

Offered to refund from Martin … but only if I removed the review. Please shop elsewhere for your occasions cant be trusted and looking at reviews I am not alone..


Mark Jones Order #71252 30/03/23
Response Text: The courier did clearly advise where the parcel was left, they tried to deliver to your address but no answer and they are instructed to leave in a safe place or with a neighbour, Hope you enjoyed the cake like our other customers!

Review Title: A wonderful cookies and cream cake for a 21st birthday surprise

Absolutely beautiful cake which was fresh and tasted amazing. I have used this company several times now and every time the cake is brilliant. Always delivered on time. Love the great age toppers as well to complement the cake. Would highly recommend.
Excellent service delivered on time lovely cake definitely use them again ????

I bought these as a treat for my sister, and what a treat! She chose the mini selection. Ordering was easy, was kept up-to-date with the order process and delivery. Goods arrived on time and well-packed. She's tried the raspberry and white chocolate one and was extremely impressed with it. Will have to get some for myself now.

Review Title: Amazing cake My cake was absolutely delicious & my…
Review Text: My cake was absolutely delicious & my friends & family enjoyed it too. The site was easy to use with a nice selection to choose from. The service was reliable & was delivered exactly as instructed.

Review Title: Absolutely the worst cake I tried ever…
Review Text: Absolutely the worst cake I tried ever , I am very upset it was my husband birthday , served to the guests after trying one bite I took the cake from everyone and throw it in to the bin , looks nice but the cream inside tasted like some cheap butter , don’t recommend this cakes
Response Text: Our customers are very happy with our cakes and buttercream, please see our reviews. Thanks

Review Text:
Update: Flagging this review as fake and deleting social media reviews.... shame on you.... awful service. I'm speaking with trading standards. Expect a letter and action.

Very disappointing... my wife ordered a cake for my birthday but the cake didn't arrive on time despite the next day delivery promise and the wrong cake arrived.

When she emailed to complain about the wrong cake they told her they had tried to contact her however this was untrue, she had also emailed whilst waiting for the cake so there was plenty of opportunity to communicate with her...

She is upset as the cake was for my birthday and the one that arrived was the wrong flavour.. (hazelnut) she knows I hate hazelnut so I couldn't even pretend for her to feel better.

It wasn't eaten and Martin lied regarding contact and no refunds offered.

Terrible response.... no further business from me

Also flagging my review as a fake experience. This is how you fail at customer service and make customers so insane with anger they take to social media to spread the news about just how badly they are treated.

Also you need to read your terms and conditions... full refund refused unless we send back the old dry cake at our own expense?

Cake is in the bin... it was a week before you replied to the complaint.... You know full well any sensible person won't be sending back perishable items at their own expense to claw back a perfectly reasonable request for a refund. I will just dedicate my life to reminding people not buy your products.... watch this space....

Martin the customer service agent clearly needs to learn the basics of customer service....
Response Text: As per our terms and conditions, if a cake is for some reason out of stock we do replace with the most equivalent. Our cakes are very rarely out of stock but this is clearly advised online before the purchase, If you require a full refund you must return the "unwanted" "uneaten" product. Thanks

Review Title: I purchased a cake for my sisters…
Review Text: I purchased a cake for my sisters birthday and it was absolutely amazing ! It was packaged beautifully when it arrived and she said it tasted absolutely amazing and it was super moist she was made up ! Thank you so much guys will defo use again !!

Desserts Delivered is an exceptional company. So refreshing to find. I was googling a cheesecake recipe, for a dinner party when their advert popped up. They looked so pretty. I decided it was better to offer a choice, so I ordered from them. I was delighted to see I could select a delivery date. That distressed things! They arrived on time In extremely good packaging. They were really pretty, larger than I thought. Some of use could only eat half! They were all delicious. An excellent find. I would highly recommend.

Sent the wrong cake, no contact phone number. Totally ruined the birthday cake surprise. Lied about trying to contact me by phone - no missed calls, no messages, no voicemail, no proof of trying to contact and I was working from home the entire week so would have seen any calls immediately. Didn’t try to contact by email despite having a week to communicate. (But numerous emails once the wrong cake arrived!) I won’t be buying from this company again. Too expensive and not the product I ordered. Waste of money and time. Dishonesty from customer service. Total rubbish.

And to make things worse, this company flags reviews as fake in order to have them removed from Trust Pilot so I wonder how many other people have had similar experiences and have had their reviews removed (as not followed up).
Response Text: We tried to call you 3 times, we never want to leave a customer without a cake and on this occasion we ran out of this flavour, We have offered a refund. Thanks

Review Text: Very happy with the quality of the service and food delivered. This was my first time ordering from Desserts Delivered Bakery. I ordered a mixed box of cupcakes for my husbands birthday. They arrived on time and so well packaged. The cupcakes were also very tasty, I definitely recommend this company.

I ordered a cake from Desserts Delivered Bakery for my daughter’s 30th birthday and it didn’t disappoint!  It was a fabulous cake, exactly as it appeared on the website. Ordering was very easy and when I contacted them with a query, they answered very quickly. Everyone commented on the cake and how lovely it was and the taste was amazing!  It was delivered by Parcelforce and I was really impressed with how it was wrapped!  I can’t recommend this company highly enough!
This was the 3rd order I've made and once again it was great. Delivery was quick, well packaged and the cake was really good too. Would definitely recommend

The cheesecakes were incredible. I ordered these for my boyfriend as cheesecake is his favourite dessert! Was so amazed when I found this site! They food was delivered frozen and in perfect condition :)

Review Title: First time ordering and will be…
Review Text: First time ordering and will be ordering again:) absolutely beautiful cake came in fantastic packaging and delivered early on my selected date:) everyone as complemented how lovely it is and people also asking where I got it from aswell.so thanks for making my sons 18th birthday cake brilliant x

I purchased the cake a few weeks ago to be delivered today for my partners birthday and we were shocked at how well presented the cake was. It looks stunning, it seems as if it is great quality too. We haven't tried it yet as its for tomorrow but I did try some buttercream from the plastic wrap around the cake and it tastes heavenly ??. I would highly recommend this bakery and WILL be using then again in the near future.

This was my 1st (and won't be my last) time ordering from Desserts Delivered Bakery, I ordered a Ferrero Roche cake, looked just as fabulous as it did in the picture! Tastes amazing too, beautifully presented in the box and delivered as stated. I had a very happy 8 year old xx

Review Title: Nice cake, poor AF customer service
Review Text:
Terrible customer service (if that's what you want to call it) sent me a wrong item so had to go out at the last minute to replace it. Read my messages and didn't bother to respond. Utterly useless and won't ever be using again.

21/02 - Still waiting for this refund I've been promised for the last 2 weeks almost ??. It's quite clear that Martin doesn't give a toss unless you remove any negative reviews. Worst businessman I've had the misfortune of dealing with. Complete waste of a thousand acres and that's a whole lotta space.

The refund isn't over the cake...Deary me, you lot really are useless.
Response Text: You would need to return the cake for a full refund we are as business, if a customer decides to eat and enjoy our cakes we do not refund unfortunately.

Review Text: The Cream egg cake is amazing, arrived on time for my boyfriends birthday, it looked and tasted so good. Can't wait to try another cake!! X

My second time using this company and I was not disappointed and will keep using them in the future. I love that I was able to order a birthday cake for my brother. Review Title: I ordered a box of cupcakes to be…

I placed the order at 2pm in the afternoon and they were delivered the following morning. Excellent service and my son and his friend said they were really tasty and from the photo he sent me, they looked amazing too.

My daughter bought these for me for my birthday instead of a cake. They look amazing and I was excited to try each one. However they all taste exactly the same, basic vanilla cheesecake? Can't see the point in ordering flavoured cheesecakes that just look the part, but don't taste any different to each other. Must say very disappointed and annoyed my daughter spent so much money for these vanilla cheesecakes that tasted no different to supermarket ones...
Response Text: All of the cheesecakes have different ingredients that reflect the flavour picked

Review Text: These desserts are absolutely delicious. They look exactly as described and taste yummy too. I usually order them for the day before the event as they come frozen and need time to sit for a while but you could eat them after an hour or two. When I experienced an unfortunate squashed delivery, I was refunded immediately and offered money off my next order. This has only happened once, and I’ve ordered on lots of occasions. Definitely recommend if you want a wow cake!

Absolutely delicious cake!!! A must order the service is fantastic I’ve ordered a few times and never feel disappointed. It’s my favourite place to order from. Quick easy delivery always tastes fresh the sponge is always lovely and flavours that leave you wanting more. Definitely recommend!!!

Review Title: Just ordered for 3rd time my boys love…

Desserts delivered bakery were sooo good. The cake arrived professionally boxed and in great condition. The presentation of the cake was perfect. The cake was divine. Everyone commented one of the best cakes they have eaten ! Thankyou

Absolutely beautiful cakes.  I have ordered multiple times and each one is both a work of art and delicious in equal measure.  Importantly, 100% reliable delivery - always delivered on the date I requested.  I won’t go anywhere else.

Nx
Wow! What a lovely cake. Excellent customer service from ordering to delivery. Will definitely be ordering from here again.

Review Title: I order a a school cake for £20 and I…

Review Title: Try them, they will NOT disappoint
Review Text:
Absolutely delicious and the best decision to use! I needed a cake at short notice and no one local could fulfil. I found Desserts Delivered on the web, checked out some reviews and thought they sounded good. I was NOT disappointed! The cake arrived within 48 hours from ordering, extremely well packaged in a chill bag and well padded out.
The cake itself was absolutely delicious; it was slightly smaller than I thought it was goin to be, in diameter, but it was a lot taller than I expected and very substantial.
It was just a really beautiful and tasty cake; gorgeous icing and a lovely light sponge.
I would most definitely use Desserts Delivered again and would highly recommend them if you're looking for something scrumptious and at short notice!

Ordered a cake with a variety of flavours for my partners birthday.
Absolutely delicious! She said best cake she has ever had, would most definitely buy from you again.
Order arrived exactly when it should have, thank you so much.

It tasted great, in fact my mother was lucky to get any I definitely ate more than half of it and it looked amazing. Mum loved it and am likely to use this company for every cake day from now on, thank you "Deserts Delivery Bakery".

Review Title: I have ordered several cakes from here…

Won’t be using again.
Response Text: Due to postal strikes there was some delay with this order but it was delivered in the end. Apologies

Review Text: Ordered a cake 15th December for 20th knowing about the delays so that’s why I ordered 5 days early for my sons 13th birthday the cake didn’t come on the selected day 20th sent them an  email  and they said it was delivered to another address and I assured them I hadn’t received it! Then they said it would come 21st which was his bday so as long as it got there that day! They said it would still didn’t arrive emailed again and said they got mixed up with order number! So my son was left with no cake for his birthday! Then said it was due to arrive 22nd  and still waiting  today 23rd December! No apologies to say sorry I haven’t had the cake or haven’t even offered a refund! I will not be ordering from these again and will certainly not be recommending them to anyone!
Response Text: This cake was delivered

Review Text:
Very good experience,
The website was easy to use and the delivery time was very quick
And the cake was extremely well packaged and arrived without any damage, then there was the the taste….out and out one of the best cakes we have had.
Will definitely be using them again!!!

Cake didn’t turn up on time. Company hid behind T&Cs and won’t issue even any part of a refund even though cake arrived late and was four days old by arrival. Dishonest, profiteering bakery. Do not use, Now looking at ingredients would also be worried about eating the cakes. Don’t waste your money or ruin your health.
Response Text: Cake was delayed by one day, Please see the news royal mail strikes have caused a delay. You were clearly aware of this before ordering as it is advertised. Ingredients? Just the same as any other cake you would buy?

Review Title: One of the nicest cakes I've had.
Review Text: Ordered a beautiful biscoff cake for my daughter's 16th. I loved that the sponge wasn't sweet, which undercut the sweet buttercream, making the flavour beautifully balanced. 10/10

Review Title: The most elegant cake we have ever seen.
Review Text: Because we had never seen cake presented in such a delightful way, we stood in awe of the cake for a while. It was my birthday cake, and the presentation was very elegant. The taste was very exquisite when we eventually sliced into it. Everyone claimed they had never had cake like this. They kept returning for more. I was overjoyed with the flavours I picked because they worked so beautifully together. My family has determined that going forward, will be our top option for cakes. I'm really happy I ordered my birthday cake from Desserts Bakery.
Response Text: Thanks for the amazing review, it is much appreciated!

Review Text: Great delivery on time, great service, cake was delivered on time as next day delivery, you can tell they put care in to how they packaged the cake, it was packed safe and very well, as for the cake itself the taste was amazing, I ordered the chocolate Nutella ferrero rocher cake for my sister's birthday, amazing cake, good quality and value for the money you pay, I will certainly order a cake from here again for sure on the next occasion

Avoid like the plague! Ordered a cake a week ago, paid £6.99 delivery fee for the cake to be delivered on our daughters birthday. We received an email stating DPD are on strike (utter lies) to try and enforce their ambiguous Ts&Cs. DPD are not on strike, they’re experiencing delays due to Xmas deliveries and Royal Mail disruptions. That’s nothing to do with us or them for that matter, as their delivery partner isn’t Royal Mail. They possibly have the worst customer service I’ve ever encountered. They’ve stated in a previous post that 99.9% of their deliveries on delivered on time. You know what they should do with the other 0.1% of orders that aren’t delivered on time? Refund the customer to avoid this hassle, it’ll barely make an impact on their overall profit margin. They’ll actually be able to claim compensation of £25 from DPD for missed delivery. But they won’t tell you this. Absolutely disgusting customer service. Once again, avoid this company.

UPDATE 10TH DECEMBER

THEY’VE STATED BELOW THAT THE CAKE WAS DELIVERED, AND AS OF 16.00, IT HASN’T!!! THREE DAYS LATE!!! THEY SENT THE CAKE ON THE 7TH…THIS CAKE ISNT GOING TO BE VERY FRESH IS IT? ANY DECENT COMPANY WOULD REFUND. THIS ISN'T A DECENT COMPANY. STEER CLEAR. OH…AND THEY THREATENED TO SEND SOMEONE TO OUR HOUSE…UNBELIEVABLE
Response Text: This order was delivered and as you can see by the UK news couriers are on strike causing delays with some parcels by 1 day across the UK. This is clearly explained to customers We even refunded the customer as a good will gesture

Review Text: Wonderful rich,moist chocolate sponge; beautifully presented. I will definitely use them for future cakes.

This is a very easy option to get delivered to your home. Top quality ingredients used for a great price.

The cakes are beautifully designed and presented, fresh and moist everything you expect from a homemade cake, professionally made.

Super delicious, very sweet a little goes a long way , full on flavour. Totally recommend this company.

This a tough one ! I bought the lidnt white chocolate cake and the Hazelnut truffle cake. The white chocolate one was just under baked. The icing was on point, decoration was great, that packaging was second to none. It was just the cake was really under baked. BUT !!! The hazelnut one was perfect, sponge was light and fluffy, decoration was just as good as the picture. The family destroyed that cake like Gunther from Charlie and the chocolate factory. This is how I know the under bake cake was a one off. Yes I was disappointed as I paid decent money for it but the Hazelnut one was great.

Ordered a cake on Thursday 1 Dec 2022 arrived on 3rd Dec 2022 .
Cake arrived packaged well .
The cake itself was delicious , fresh and a great price. We purchased a cake topper and numbered sparklers
to add a little bit of bling.
Highly recommend and I will be coming back for seconds .
Lovely cake! Super delicious
Top quality cakes with a fantastic range. Amazing taste and excellent service

DO NOT order

I will never order again

Myself and family have ordered before many times without issues

On this occasion I placed an order on 23.11.22 for the ferrero and creme egg, I received on 26.11.22

Both cakes were inedible

The buttercream tasted greasy and of just raw butter making the cakes inedible

We contacted customer service and received a reply from Martin , the replies are the most absurd replies ever received from any company e.g. he point blank refused to acknowledge the issue stating that they had had thousands of orders this week and since they had (apparently) received no complaints I must therefore be in accurate and he could do nothing about it. He also said I would have to return the cake in full for a refund which makes no sense

I would have returned the cake as it is with a few bites taken out of it but he refused

The replies are strange making me question that this is really someone of managerial status

I have reported the company to my bank and advise everyone here to always pay with a credit card so you can claim against such fraudulent behaviour

I have also reported them to trading standards
Response Text: We send hundreds of cakes a day, every cake comes with a batch code underneath the board, we checked the batch called every customer to check the quality of the cake to which all confirmed the cake was upto our very high standards. We still offered to resend the cakes free of charge as part of a good will gesture.

Review Text:
My cake was not delivered and when I contacted customer service they apologised for the error and stated my order had been cancelled by them by accident. I was told the order would be sent for the next day, this was then again not delivered, ruining an 80th Birthday party and resulting in a quick supermarket dash for an emergency replacement. I asked to speak to the owner about the appalling management of my order and was told by Martin (Customer Services) that the owner is far too busy to receive emails. I thought they might be interested to know in the failings of their team. DO NOT TRUST YOUR CAKE WILL BE DELIVERED WHEN YOU ARE TOLD IT WILL BE!

Edit: Desserts Delivered tried to have this review deleted but Trust Pilot were provided with all the email evidence. Contrary to their response below the cake was never delivered.
Response Text: This was eventually delivered.

Review Text: I bought 6 mini cheesecakes for my boyfriend for his birthday. They were beautiful. Well packaged and I ordered 2 weeks in advance. Will defo be ordering fro them again xx
Beautiful fresh cake , slightly smaller than expected.   Well packed arrived on time will definitely reorder

Excellent customer service, cakes beautifully and safely packaged, arrived exactly when promised, cake looked and tasted fantastic. The cake topper added the final touch. Everyone was impressed and we will definitely be ordering again.

Review Title: This cake was a birthday present
Review Text: This cake was a birthday present for my son who lives in Bristol.  This is the second time that I have used this company.  The cakes aren’t huge but the recipients both loved them.

Review Title: Absolutely delicious cakes so fresh and…
Review Text: Absolutely delicious cakes so fresh and light and the service is excellent, well impressed with the delivery service and how the cakes are packaged

Review Title: Cake arrived with courier upside down…
Review Text:
Cake arrived with courier upside down in box clearly labelled to be carried other way. Followed instructions to defrost cake for 21st birthday. Biscuits on top were broken, unlike picture of cake. Biscuits soft when defrosted. Would have made sense to let customer unwrap and add biscuits with candles etc… sponge was very dense and not great tasting, almost seemed too moist. Really disappointing… customer service told me perfectly edible like that. Only cut two slices and threw cake. Had to buy another flavour cake from shop which was a shame as it was an important birthday with family round to celebrate. Requested refund and no response??

Update: response to soggy inedible cake is poor at best!
Hi Emma
Unfortunately we can not refund, i am the manager in charge, we a are a food business and if someone does not like the taste of a cake we can not refund as not everyone has the same taste pallet. Apologies


Martin - Sales & Customer Service Manager
Response Text: We have passed this on to management

Review Title: Cake was awesome came in time for…
Review Text: Cake was awesome came in time for aunties birthday seemed to go down a treat got the 10 layer fudge cake everyone enjoyed it

Review Title: Ordered so many cakes from here in the…
Review Text: Ordered so many cakes from here in the past, and they were amazing, but not for a while. Had one today and its nothing like they used to be. It used to be fresh butter cream - this tasted artificial, the sponge was dry whereas it used to be so soft and fresh. Sooooo disappointed. Hope its not a permanent change. Please go back to original recipe
Response Text: The cakes have been the same recipe for a few years, next time try not to refrigerate and leave the cake out as our cakes do not need refrigeration.

Review Text:
Do not order from this company, I tried to go to a small business rather than a big supermarket chain but the cake I received was soggy and inedible.

Contacted the customer services email as stated online if there were any satisfaction issues but was told that the cake needed to be untouched for a refund which doesn’t make sense! Only 2 slices had been cut and the rest has gone to waste. No phone number given when requested to discuss further and no alternative options offered to rectify the problem.

So angry and disappointed at the service given (and it was the manager which doesn’t bode well!)

R.e the response received from the company following my review which goes to show the rudeness and the manner of communication I was met with. I stated politely that the cake had 2 small slices cut to find it was not edible and offered to return it. I didn’t want a free cake, just A cake that could be enjoyed for a birthday. Even have a photo of it in the food bin!!!
Response Text: We asked customer to return he cake but they stated it was all eaten, We are a business we can not refund if a customer has ate the cake and wants it for free, This is not how it works sorry but good try!

Review Title: DPD marked as delivered even though…
Review Text:
DPD marked as delivered even though they left it outside my building. Desserts delivered bakery keep saying I need to contact DPD as they have marked it delivered but as you can see it wasn’t handed to me or even outside my door it was left outside my building where anybody can take it. Refusing point blank to give me a refund and advising I need to contact the police, how is that going to help me get my money back. Spoilt my sons birthday, won’t be ordering from here again.

UPDATE; they have offered me a replacement cake even though I had to run around hours before my sons party to go get a replacement, so this is not needed. Still refusing to give me a refund.
Response Text: Proof was provided by DPD that this was delivered, if not satisfactory it needs returned for a full refund

Review Text: Wrong order ,no communication, no refund birthday surprise spoilt. Why post something that clients haven't asked for just be honest and sort website so when item chosen is unavailable (out of stock) you either choose something else or leave website I'm £28.00 out of pocket through no fault of my own.
Response Text: Hi we tried to call you as the item was out of stock but we got no answer, We never like to leave anyone without a cake on their birthday so sent an alternative

Review Text: Bought the six slices option for £32 including delivery and got 6 slithers of cake not even half a cake when put together and the quality was awful, the buttercream was gritty and greasy and they all lacked flavour. Bought a whole cake 2 years ago and that was great. Don’t know what has changed but won’t be buying again.
Response Text: Hi Kez, you bought 6 slices of cake for £20 this is what you received with great quality products

Review Text: Great product. The cake had just enough sweetness, wonderful colours of the sponge. Not dry at all. Delivered with care and in time.

I ordered a cake and cupcakes 24hrs before a birthday and I absolutely loved this service, it came perfectly on time with no damages to the packaging. The delux chocolate hazelnut truffle cake was enough for a family of 10 and everyone enjoyed it, very tasty and looked really presentable. The chocolate wafer cupcakes were also delicious and looked great. All in all, awesome bakery shop and a very happy customer, I’d definitely recommend !! :)

Review Title: I ordered the variety cupcakes for our…
Review Text: I ordered the variety cupcakes for our 1st wedding anniversary and I can honestly say they were delicious. We were very pleased with them and the service was outstanding. We would definitely order from here again I would highly recommend them. Well done to all

Desserts Delivered Bakery were brilliant to deal with.  Excellent communications - always key.  My friend who was celebrating her birthday was very pleased indeed with her surprise delicious treats.  Would order again.

Awful experience, avoid at all costs.
Ordered a cake to be delivered to my mum on holiday for her 50th birthday. Ordered online and selected delivery for the day before which was confirmed. The following day I received an email saying that DPD would deliver the cake 3 days after the date I requested (the email also stated that they were due to collect the cake suggesting that it had not yet been posted). I attempted to contact desserts delivered however could not find a number but had to email. Reply received the following day saying that they had requested the day I asked for and the fault was with the delivery company. I explained that my mum would no longer be at the holiday site once the cake arrived and that it would be inedible by the time it was received (even if she was still at the holiday site). I requested a refund and was told that I would be passed onto the complaints department however never received any further emails. Contacted them again several days later requesting a refund, informed that they would not refund me as the cake had been signed for. I explained that this had been signed for by the resort staff and despite this had been in transit for 4 days rendering it inedible. Contained to refuse a refund, I was offered a replacement however as it had already gone past my mother's birthday and I had to pay for a local baker to make her a last minute alternative, a replacement would be pointless. Continued to refuse a refund, I had to open a visa dispute which has refunded me today.
Response Text: We sent this item and according to DPD was delivered proof has been sent, its a shame when people try to rip off hard working small family ran businesses.

Review Text: Absolutely amazing, I have ordered 3 birthday cakes so far and each one has been gorgeous, gorgeous to look at and gorgeous to taste, the delivery was great too, arrived on time and well packaged. Thank you so much will definitely be ordering again ??

Review Title: Wrong item received & appalling customer service
Review Text: First experience with this company and I won't be using again. I ordered some cupcakes for a present and they sent the wrong flavour because they were out of stock of the item I ordered. They claimed to have tried to ring me before to warn me but I didn't receive any missed calls, messages or emails. I contacted customer service to resolve and had the most frustrating customer experience I've ever had. They couldn't send the correct order and would only refund the item price if I sent the incorrect order back and paid for the return shipping myself (on top of the £6.99 original shipping fee which they wouldn't refund either). In the end they were only able to refund 50% of the item price (minus the £6.99 shipping fee) even though I didn't order this item and couldn't use as the recipient didn't like which has left me out of pocket. Awful service and really frustrating, would not use again. UPDATE TO RESPONSE: I didn't "claim" the order was wrong - it was wrong. I have evidence and the full email chain to prove this, as does Trustpilot when the company tried to flag this as a fake review. The company only offered a full refund after I posted this review, in exchange for me removing it from this site.
Response Text: We sent out the item ordered which customer claimed was wrong, we asked to return and a full refund or replacement will be sent but they did not, Hope you enjoyed the cupcakes!

Review Title: Lovely cake and presented very well
Review Text: Lovely cake and packaged very well, presented well, tasted beautiful and very deep. And lovely personal touch of the note

Review Title: Worst customer service I have received…
Review Text:
Worst customer service I have received in a long time.

I ordered cupcakes for a friends special birthday.
They delivered a different style of cupcake to the ones I had ordered because they were out of stock, but they did not notify me of this in advance.
When contacted they agreed to swap the cupcakes. (I have all this in email)
But they did not send out the correct ones or collect the unwanted ones.

I emailed yesterday after I was made aware by my friend that they had failed to correct their error.
When I asked that the correct ones be sent I was responded to with a blunt request for me to send back the unwanted cupcakes first at my own expense before they would send out the ones I had ordered.

I explained that two weeks had passed since the delivery issue and as my friends didn’t like the ones ordered they were thrown away.

Also I challenged why should it be my responsibility to pay for postage of the wrongly delivered item.

Again their blank response back was to offer me a discount if I bought from cakes them again in the future but that they would not send out what I had ordered unless I could send back the unwanted ones.

Again I have all this in email.

Awful service do not waste your money on this company
Response Text: As explained if we are out of stock we will always replace if we can not get in touch, if you are not happy your welcome to return for a full refund

Review Text: This was THE most fresh, unique cake I have ever eaten. Absolutely delicious. I shall definitely be buying one for Christmas. I loved the lotus cake but the quandary is should I choose a different one!! I think I may try the cheesecake too. Yum.
Cake came on time, very well packaged, looked and tasted delicious, can’t wait to order another one for the next Birthday, My daughter was very pleased exactly what she wanted.

Review Title: first of over my daughter big biscoff…
Review Text: first of over my daughter big biscoff fan she eat the biscucuits alltime.so i found dessets bakery there all looket amzing it was my daughter 28th birthday on 18th october 2022 i order her THE BISCOFF LOVIN! CAKE size 6inch severs approx 14 we got 20pices . topped with lotus biscuits the tast of cinnaman kick with sweet vanilla sponge milk chocolate sauce divered fresh was so amzing i give 10/10 im going buy all cakes from here alltime now thankyou so much for 1amzing birthday my daugther had bigest smile on her face she over moon
Ordered Halloween cake for my daughter and boyfriend. Loved idea of theme cake which was not childish. Cake was stunning , beautifully packed and delivered on time . I will be ordering again soon.

The cake was amazing, fast delivery and came in perfect condition.

The company took great care in making this a special cake for a special occasion.

Thank you

This was my second time ordering from Desserts Delivered.  Ordered the Biscofff Cake the first time and the Peanut Butter Cake this time.  Both cakes arrived on the chosen date.  They were perfectly packaged and the cakes looked exactly as in the pictures (although they are much taller than they look in the pictures, which means you get more cake!).  Both cakes were oh so scrumptious and I am waiting for an excuse to order another one.  Think I may go for one of the cheesecakes next time.
Response Text: So glad you enjoyed our creations and glad you are a returning customer!

Review Title: This cake was for my daughter’s 50th…
Review Text: This cake was for my daughter’s 50th birthday and we wanted it to be special and it certainly was. We chose her favourite bscof and it came so well protected in huge boxes and wrapping that the form of the cake was not disturbed and when it was presented to her she loved  it. The cake was delivered exactly when we asked so we’ll done for that and do I have to mention it tasted heavenly.? Thank you for helping to make her birthday special.
Response Text: Hi Edna, Glad you liked the cake and your daughter did too! Have 50th!

Review Text:
Ordering a cake online was a new thing for me and I was (if honest) a little worried, BUT......OMG, the cake was sensational!!

The cake arrived on time, it was expertly packaged, it looked like the picture, AND tasted incredible!

Seriously, don't hesitate to order from Deserts Delivered ! I had a very happy daughter who's birthday this was for and now may just invent birthdays to get more cakes delivered ! ??
Response Text: Hi Lindsey, Thanks for the review and glad you liked our creations! Its reviews like this that make our hard work worth while!

Review Text: Ordered on the Tuesday morning and delivered Wednesday morning. Incredible  service will be using again for sure!
Response Text: Hi Glynn, Glad you liked our service hope to see you again in the future!

Review Title: Cake was little bit  damage  but taste …
Review Text: Cake was little bit  damage  but taste  was nice maybe little to dry but fresh cream  on the top make the trick
Response Text:
Hi Bien
Yes sometimes some people prefer the cake a little more moist but you can microwave the cake for ten seconds or add cream for this!

Review Text:
Beautiful cake
Cake arrived on time. It was really well packaged, with cool bags. The cake was delivered on a Thursday for a Saturday celebration, when I unwrapped the cake it was still cool.
The cake was really well presented, I ordered the biscoffi cake for a friends birthday. It was a really light cake and delicious. I would really recommend this company.
Response Text:
Hi Jenny
So happy to see you enjoyed your purchase!

Review Title: Not hand made AVOID, customer service SHOCKING
Review Text:
Having ordered the rainbow chocolate cake from a place that "have a team of bakers" for Each cake you order for your autistic son saves me having to stand all day and we can enjoy his time.
Paid the premium for next day delivery and was very happy when it arrived.
I had ordered cheesecakes too one of which was a bit battered in transit. But nothing to get annoyed about until we done the candle on the actual cake.
I've written them an email saying I did wonder about the toppings as it wasn't as the website showed but never thought anything at the time.
I have for years had him a rainbow cake which never looks like the standard one from the outside so he always gets excited at that part.
We slice the cake and as I'm pulling his slice out I say surprise and his face drops as does mine because they sent a complete different cake.
This cake got a slice taken from it at half 5 on a Saturday night there's no way a mum can fix this.
It's currently in the bin all mashed and whatever and the response I got today was well you got a more expensive cake than you ordered.
The exact response below....

"So sorry about this it looks like you have been sent another cake in error being the ten layer fudge cake which is £7 more than what you paid! Deepest apologies for this, let me know if you order in the future and i will arrange some discount for the mistake so sorry, it looks like it has been used and ate so we hope you enjoyed!

Man - Sales & Customer Service Manager "

So how would we know we had the wrong cake without taking a slice?
Where's the compassion for the autistic child who now was so upset he didn't want ANYTHING.

These are not baked by bakers they can't be, I ordered rainbow, the box said ferrero and now they have came back saying I got fudge cake? Seems nobody knows what they are selling and don't care about the aftermath.
Absolutely disgusting company.
I say AVOID!!!

The company have since tried twice to have my review removed? ?? Suspect it's because their lack of customer service, compassion or attention to details have been questioned.

Although I will add the caramac cheesecakes where lovely.

**update as they have now written a reply ***

The cake in question was missing a slice in that picture because of the reason I bought your cake, it should have been a rainbow inside. If I hadn't cut it at all then how would I have known you sent the wrong order.
Still now coming back with an arrogant response, at no point was I offered a partial refund, I was however offered "some sort of a discount" then by the 25th I'm told if I return the cake I can get a refund. And seriously with the attitude of your company I'd have happily got it out of the bin however by then our collection had been made by the council.
Although completely irrelevant,
I at no point asked for a free cake, I pay my own way thank you very much.

My biggest complaint came after you decided to make out your company done me a favour by giving me a cake that according to your emails was £7 dearer now you say six.
I really do wish this trust pilot allowed photos since you now have the audacity to claim we ate half of that cake!

Your customer service is disgraceful, while your company are "only human" & send out hundreds of cakes. Maybe research the complaint first and foremost before attempting to slate someone on the reviews.
apparemtly having added the cusomer service name invades their privacy yet i did read reviews on here that they replied to saying they'd pass on the praise to the person in question.
THE AMOUNT OF EFFORT YOU PUT IN TO MY REVIEW .... SHAME YOU COULDNT ACTUALLY DO THE SAME WHEN I PLACED MY ORDER EH!!!
Response Text:
Hi Tess
As previously explained in our emails; you were sent the wrong cake in error, we send hundreds of cakes a day and are only human, sometimes mistakes can happen. We are also a small business who can not afford to give people free cakes in these tough times, We offered a partial refund or you to return the "unwanted" half eaten cake. You declined to both offers. You were even sent a cake £6 more than the one that was ordered.
Glad you liked our cheesecakes and judging by the size of the slice taken from the fudge cake it looks like you enjoyed that too!

Thanks

Review Text: I ordered the jammie biscuit cake for my sisters birthday. It turned up in very good condition, thought biscuits may go soft on top but perfect. Very nice, creamy cake. Very much enjoyed by all. Very good delivery and turned up on time. Have ordered again for my son and had to change the date of delivery and got a very quick email reply to say no problem with the date change.
Response Text: Hi Maxine, Glad you liked the cake and happy to see the customer service is excellent as always to!
HI Andrew, Thanks glad the twins enjoyed!

Review Text:
I have ordered from Desserts Delivered multiple times this year. From cupcake gifts for friends to Birthday cakes for family, Desserts Delivered offer a great variety.
All of my orders have arrived on time, looked great (as per website photo) and have been delicious.
I can highly recommend.
Response Text:
Hi Amy,
Really appreciate the review and feedback and glad our new products are keeping you coming back for more!

Review Text:
I placed an order for a Chocolate Orange Cake, Brownies and Birthday accessories for the Long Haired General’s party.
I was not disappointed.
Everything was exceptional, the tasteful baking, the thoroughly protective and chilled packaging along with the prompt delivery.

Everyone of the 14 attendees were most impressed.
I Will definitely use again.
Response Text: Hi Keith, Glad you liked our taste and service, Its reviews like this that make our hard work worth while!

Review Text:
Desserts Delivered Bakery did deliver! The recipient was delighted with the cupcakes which looked exactly like the picture on the website. The expected time of delivery info was accurate and useful, the ordering process easy.
The only slight grumble hence one star less, was the charging for a personalised card - I’m sure most of the cakes are given as gifts and you would expect the recipient to know who was sending them?! With most companies that I have used this is included.

However, all in all very happy with the service, I would recommend them and I would use them again.
Response Text: Hi Sally, Glad you were impressed overall, as well as our personalised note section we will be adding a recipient section also. Thanks for the feedback!

Review Text: I use this site for special occasions for friends. Every order over the years has been of exceptional quality. Whilst I can’t personally be testament to the quality of their products I can gauge it through the appreciation of the gift by the recipient. The cake brought back memories of being at home and baking by their mother. The mini cheesecakes were described as absolutely perfect. All in all the site is  quality delivered with superb communication. It is easy to navigate. Delivery is flawless.
Response Text: HI Tyrone, So glad everything was ok and you enjoyed our products!

Review Text: The Birthday cake we ordered was delicious and great. The package was outstanding. Thank you.
Response Text: So glad you enjoyed!

Review Text: Cakes are all about the taste and the ones we ordered were just awful. I placed 2 orders at the same time to be delivered on different days. One for a white chocolate cake and another for a box of cheesecakes. So it wasn’t just one cake or a bad batch! Both orders were moist, soggy and flavourless probably because they are frozen. Neither myself, my husband or our children ate their cakes. So much waste, we chucked them all as they were all inedible. Some even had bits packaging stuck to the frosting. Very disappointing.
Response Text:
Hi Jo,
We can not find your order seems like a fake review compared to all of our 5* reviews

Thanks

Review Title: Had a box of the sample sized brownies…
Review Text: Had a box of the sample sized brownies which was lovely, just big enough to share with a cup of coffee and a nice way to try all of the lovely flavours. Peanut butter was gorgeous. Very enjoyable
Response Text: So glad you liked our new brownies! They are very popular we can see why!

Review Text:
Well presented, well packed and made with love. They taste amazingly. Also A* for their customer service dealing effectively with the enquiries.
Thank you Anita
Response Text: Thanks so glad you were impressed with our service!

Review Title: Good Customer Service after the courier ruined the cake!!
Review Text: Have ordered several cakes before, and when I want the wow factor and gorgeous tasty cake....i put in an order....unfortunately this time the couriers DPD delivered a battered box that looked like they had played football with, so the cake was like mush. DPD were useless and referred me back to Desserts Delivered. Martin at customer service offered another delivery for free, even though it wasn't their fault.....I accepted some brownies which were delicious and one for a reorder! Such a shame the courier let them down.....as their cake (and now brownies)will be on a reorder....thank you.....
Response Text: Thanks for not blaming us for our courier mistake and glad Martin could assist with his excellent customer service as always!

Review Text: The products they sell are beyond mouthwatering, I honestly cannot say enough nice things!!! Martin from customer service was especially helpful!! Thank you so much I will definitely be ordering again
Response Text: Glad you liked our products! Shout out to Martin again!

Review Title: Worth every penny for that special treat
Review Text: I have ordered from Desserts Delivered Bakery twice now, and on both occasions the cakes have looked exactly like the pictures and from a taste perspective have been amazing. I was dubious initially about how they would hold up in transit but both were beautifully packaged and the method using the ice packs works a treat. The only downside is the inevitable family fights over who has had the most slices, the cake still tastes great after a few days and is incredibly moist however I would be surprised if you haven’t eaten it by then! If you are looking for a treat for a special occasion then look no further, yes you could pick up something from the supermarket that looks the part however in my eyes the taste and texture will be leagues below these, and the look on the recipients face is worth the extra as they will feel extra special! I must also add that the customer service is commendable and personable so you really can’t go wrong.
Response Text:
Hi Michael,
Thanks so much for the review it is much appreciated and makes our hard work worth while hearing reviews like this!

Review Title: Fabulous brownies and keep very well

Review Text:
Ordered a cake which should have arrived yesterday. Full details of the address it should have arrived had been detailed, however parcel was delivered to somewhere (no idea where) and order now closed (with no cake). I paid £8 odd for delivery and it can’t even be delivered to the right place and have been charged for this. Have emailed and not had any response, also tried calling and no response. See previous review regarding courier delivery and their responsibility, it is also the responsibility of the company themselves to make sure the courier they use are actually delivering the item as it should be and where it should be safely.

Further follow up after response from seller:

I was told I had to chase and find the order from Dpd, which as per citizens advice is incorrect as it is the sellers duty to chase the courier for delivery. I was told the cake was signed for and delivered to the address on the package, it was not, it was delivered to a totally incorrect address. The cake was ordered for a 30th which was supposed to be celebrated on the 30th of July. Instead, we had no cake as planned and the cake then sat in a warehouse overnight (incorrect delivery address). The sellers customer service would take no accountability for this and decided as Dpd had sent them ‘proof’ of delivery it was no longer their problem. If you get your baked good where and when your supposed to great, but don’t hope for great customer service as you won’t get it.
Response Text: This was delivered to the address requested and proof has been sent.

My son ordered a Biscoff cake for his partners 30th birthday, it arrived yesterday and her birthday is today - it was not showing as not available when he ordered the cake and is still not showing as not available as I have just gone on line to look. When the cake arrived he found they had sent the Lindt chocolate cake instead.  He contacted them immediately and they said they had apparently tried to call but did not leave a message or send an email to say the Biscoff was out of stock and thought they would just send the Lindt one instead! His partner does not like Lindt and he therefore asked them to send another cake and take the other back, they would not take the cake back he had to send it back apparently before they would send another as a replacement. Her birthday party is today! I also contacted the company to ask them to just send another cake, they were completely unapologetic about not notifying him properly (sending a text or email) or for having the cake available to purchase on line in the first place.  The general attitude was terrible, they couldnt have cared less that he had no alternative to give her.  Very poor customer service we will not be purchasing from this company again.
Response Text: Customer was sent incorrect cake, A free replacement cake was offered but declined by the customer.

Review Text: Biscoff Cake. Delivery,packaging and condition on arrival were all great. Service fine. However, it was so sickly I couldn’t eat it. And I have a sweet tooth! The icing/frosting was layered on so thickly; we all ended up scraping it off and just ate the sponge. The sponge itself was good. Sorry, but won’t order again. I’d rather pay £35 to someone local & have a fresh one.

Don’t buy from these! Cake ordered for wife’s 40th on the exact day so it was fresh. Opened to find it ruined in transit and badly wrapped up by this company. Emailed them to them and told they’d replaced the chocolates on top. Then told me they’d take it up with dpd.. never herd anything back from them so opened a dispute with PayPal 2/3 weeks later asking me to send the cake back for a full refund. These defo knew PayPal couldn’t do anything because it was a good product so it’s not covered under there policy..

Not sure anyone would save a cake for 3 weeks lol..

Don’t waste ur money pay for a proper cake company!!!

Good reply dessertidots

Didn’t offer no refund for 3 weeks and wanted cake returning as if someone would keep a cake for so long

Review Text:
Shocking. Frozen product, not fresh. Battered and delivered in plastic. Biscuits stuck on top all soggy. Arrived in appalling condition. Wouldn’t risk eating and misadvertised. Avoid

To be clear despite their reply we have had NO Refund.
A refund was only offered if we returned and paid for the faulty product ourselves despite it not being fit for purpose and of satisfactory quality. We explained we were legally entitled to have the postage paid for if they required the product to be returned but ‘Martin’ refused this despite it being our legal right.
Refund is still awaited and the ‘once frozen’ (but freshly baked he claims) damaged and soggy biscuit topped brownies are still here awaiting his collection.

Total waste of time and money. Terrible.

Review Title: I ordered the wafer cake with the…
Review Text: I ordered the wafer cake with the hippos on top for my dad’s birthday, it arrived in absolutely immaculate condition , still frozen and perfect, it was wrapped incredibly well with many boxes etc to keep it in perfect condition, I could hear my dad smiling down the phone and his absolute delight at such an amazing cake , he told he a tiny bit of chocolate came out of the box which he said tasted amazing, I’m so grateful your company does such an amazing treat for delivery like this , and saddened to read some of the negative comments on here , all I can say is they were either incredibly unlucky with their delivery or they have an axe to grind because their cake business isn’t doing as well !! Martin and the team were super responsive to emails and helpful for organising delivery. Great customer service. The cake lasts well too, we are still enjoying leftovers 3 days later and it is still very fresh. A great experience and will absolutely purchase from this company again, looking forward to trying the other flavours
Gary

Review Title: My go to place for Cakes!

The service was excellent and it arrived when it was supposed to.

Very pleased with how the cake was packaged and the presentation! Not to mention how great it tastes ??

Will happily order again ??

Amazing service!

Beautiful cake as described and shown on the online photo. Great taste. Fast delivery on the day requested, having placed the order the day before.
Would highly recommend :)

Review Title: Cake turned up in perfect condition
Review Text: Cake turned up in perfect condition. Looked great and very tasty

Cake apparently lost in transit - no refund offered - replacement arrived after the party.
Save your money and guarantee a celebration cake and go to a local supplier.
AVOID AT ALL COSTS

Evidence if ever it was needed - oops! Hate to be told I’m a liar!
