Response Text: *12th MayCustomer picked the incorrect delivery date and expected as full refund, unfortunately this was not possible as it was still delivered for the date they picked.

Review Text:
I ordered a Red Velvet and Cookies and Cream Cake for my daughters Birthday. It arrived on time and was very well packaged and in one piece despite DPD carrying it up the drive on its side, hence two stars as things went downhill from there.
The outer packaging was an enormous box, inside was another polystyrene box, inside that was another quite decorative box of a good size. Upon opening this box we were most disappointed to find a small cake held in position by corrugated cardboard.
The decoration was not as it appeared in the picture which showed Oreo and Chocolate cookies, there were only Oreo cookies. On cutting the cake the inside was not as it appeared in the picture either, it was supposed to be chocolate cake top and bottom layer with a red velvet layer in the middle, it was all red velvet.
We weighed the cake we couldn't believe it weighed 2000g as stipulated online, it did not, it weighed in at 1432g, quite a big difference.
The cake itself was firm and craggy without much flavour and the icing was quite sickly.
I wouldn't recommend this company to any of my friends and have experienced much better quality elsewhere and better value for money.
A most disappointing experience.
Response Text: Very shocked to see this review, our items are hand made and can not weigh the same every single time. Please see our reviews we have a a very high rating and many happy customers

Review Text: Easy to navigate website and easy to order cake which was delicious and gratefully received by birthday girl.  Delivered on time in perfect condition.  Very pleased I found Desserts Delivered Bakery and would highly recommend.

We ordered The Biscoff Cake for my son. It was left on its side by DPD which was annoying but due to the great packing and the fact that the cakes arrive frozen, no harm was done. The cake looked amazing, exactly as it did on the website. It tasted amazing too. Everyone commented on how wonderful it was.
Beautiful cake delivered exactly as promised .Highly recommend this company .

Review Title: This is my second time ordering from…
Review Text:
This is my second time ordering from Desserts Delivered. They have become my 'go-to' for cakes!
The service is excellent, website really easy to navigate and the delivery is super fast. The cakes arrive beautifully packaged and they are absolutely delicious!
I recommend you guys to all my friends and will certainly be ordering from you again in the future!
Many thanks!

I ordered the box of “choose your own” cheesecakes, best cheesecakes me and my partner have ever had and we’ve had a LOT of cheesecakes. Ever since we’ve been together we’ve set out to find the best and this is it. You will not be disappointed, each choice was completely different, so full of flavour and made with care, the pictures are accurate to when they are delivered! We will now be ordering regularly instead of special occasions!

Review Title: You are in good hands if you order from here!
Review Text:
Last minute panic buy for my daughters 20th and they did not disappoint! The cake was very well packaged and so not damaged at all and tasted amazing! We hid it from guests over the weekend and ate it just the two of us!
I will be buying all our special cakes from here going forward! Thank you!

Ferraro Rocher cake. Easy to order, very well packaged and arrived well insulated with cold packs.  Cake was enough for 10 of us. We ate it with vanilla ice cream yummy ???? thanks all at desserts delivered.  Will definitely order again

Review Title: It’s a bit nerve wracking getting cake…
Review Text: It’s a bit nerve wracking getting cake delivered, but this was faultless. Packaged well and arrived on time. It looked as good as the pictures and tasted great. Will definitely use this service again.

AVOID AVOID AVOID

Echoing previous reviews below. I could write a long review but it’s just a repeat of wrong cake sent, appalling customer service, rude, arrogant, passive aggressive.

I did advise Martin I was going to to a charge back through the bank. But I will take action in other ways ….

I think Martin may also be a pseudonym for the 2 brothers … who Martin claims is the manager.

Not wasting anymore time of effort on this.

Spoilt my husbands 50th birthday. Wrong cake. DPD delivered upside down - non of which are Martins problem apparently

EDIT - This has been refuted as a genuine sale by Deserts Delivered Bakery. I have provided proof to Trust Pilot to verify my experience with them.

This was most DEFINITELY NOT refunded.

I am also making my way through NHS Trust colleague sites to inform them of this horrendous service.

Recommendation for anyone considering using them. Use your credit card as charge backs are easier to have refunded than using a debit card.
Response Text: This was refunded for the customer hope you enjoy!

Review Text: While there was a slight issue with delivery (not associated with Desserts Delivered but an issue relating to the courier) of the cheesecakes, when they arrived they tasted delicious!! The Team were helpful and responded quickly to my enquiry when I contacted them! A brilliant idea for my sister in laws birthday and she enjoyed every morsal!

Review Title: Ordered a birthday cake and accessories…
Review Text: Ordered a birthday cake and accessories for my son's 16th Birthday and I can't fault the service, excellent delivery time, really tasty cake, packaged to perfection, would definitely recommend.
Omg amazing beautiful cakes fabulous designs and packing was incredible and delivery was amazing and cakes were delicious also many thanks kind regards to all concerned staff. Diane

Review Title: Great cheesecakes delivered as a gift…
Review Text: Great cheesecakes delivered as a gift !!! Was not disappointed, arrived when they said they would, great price & great taste ! Happy bunch of adults, thank you, keep up the good work, another delivery soon !

Amazing cake, ordered the red velvet cookies and cream cake for my mums birthday, it arrived on time and it was a really nice cake, even my dad liked it and he doesn't usually like cake. Would order again.

Very pleasantly surprised with the cake I ordered for my sons 18th. Super quick delivery, great value and the cake tasted amazing! It was a hit with my Nutella loving son!! And everyone else! I would absolutely recommend Desserts Delivered Bakery

Review Title: PLEASE DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY
Review Text:
I want to start off by saying that this company and the way they handle things is ABYSMAL! I ordered a Biscoff cake two weeks prior to needing it, less than 24 hours prior to the date of delivery I missed a call from them saying they had supply issues and I needed to phone back to arrange an alternative… these things happen so a few hours later I phoned them back where I was informed everything was okay and it had been sorted- NEVER informed that an alternative was being sent, so I assumed that I was still receiving my cake that I ordered.
The delivery date arrives and the cake arrives… on the box clearly labelled Biscoff cake. Once opened this cake was not a Biscoff cake, and in fact a Lindt Chocolate cake. This was no use to me as the recipient that I got this cake for doesn’t eat chocolate.
I was quickly on the phone and email in attempt to sort this issue out. No one helped, no one even tried to accommodate or apologise. Martin who is a part of ‘customer service’ and looking at previous reviews seems to be the only person who responds to emails. He is rude, patronising and threatened me over a review I hadn’t even written… he threatened me to take the review down or I wouldn’t see any of my refund, not that I was going to see it anyway. They refuse to refund you for their error, they lie and deceive to you and breach their own terms and conditions. It states they inform you of an alternative if it needs to be sent, but they don’t.
I still haven’t received a refund and I don’t think I will ever get my money back…
I have had to seek legal action in order to retrieve my money.
And finally before they comment like they do on every other review… this isn’t fake unlike their ‘positive’ reviews as you will see every negative review on here has been verified to show they are legit and real. I suggest to anyone they read ALL reviews before purchasing as every negative review is the same in regards to this ‘bakery’…
Response Text: This is a complete lie and we have no recollection of this order or name

Review Text: I ordered an oreo cake for a 16th birthday.  I could choose a delivery date to suit and the cake arrived on time via courier.  It was really well packed and looked really good.  It tasted great too. Great celebration cake. There was a good selection of accessories (candles and sparklers etc) so I didn't need to buy elsewhere.  Would definitely use again.

Review Title: The best cake we’ve ever had!
Review Text:
I ordered a cookies and cream cake for our daughter’s 17th birthday, I was worried that it would come and not meet my expectations.
Wow! How wrong was I!
Delivery was on time and the cake was in perfect condition.
It was just beautiful, it looked amazing and tasted amazing, it was moist, full of chocolate flavour and the cream was just perfect! We all said it’s the best we’d ever had (and we’ve had Carlos’s!) I will now be ordering all of our celebration cakes from here from now on! Just delicious!

Review Title: Can’t go wrong with this site ??
Review Text: Looking for a gift for my Son and his Girlfriend for their birthdays and came across this company on a search of the web. Couldn’t of made a better choice, ordered the pack of 6 variety cheese cakes, delivered on time and looked exactly the same as their website pictures. They really enjoyed them and I’ll definitely use their web site again ??
10/10 cake looks perfect, arrived day of order and early which was perfect, only ordered 2 days before, carnt complain would defo recommend to friends and family

Review Title: I ordered a nuttella cake for my wife's…
Review Text: I ordered a nuttella cake for my wife's birthday the cake was exactly as advertised worth every penny. Totally recommended this company for any further events

Amazing cake, absolutely delicious!
Would highly recommend - brilliant company!

Review Title: I ordered this cake last minute and it…
Review Text: I ordered this cake last minute and it was delivered as describe and in time and not only that I thought it would just be more like a shop brought cake but I was pleasantly surprise not only with the quality but the taste too. Amazing. Thank you.

I ordered 6 of the choose your own cheesecakes and they did not disappoint. They were well packaged so that they would stay frozen and looking beautiful, delivery time was also excellent. The cheesecakes were all delicious, my dinner guests loved them too. I will definitely be ordering from them again in the future.

Review Title: Need a cake delivered.... go here!
Review Text:
I recently purchased a cake from Desserts Delivered and wow! It tasted amazing and looked great! The packaging was secure and professional which meant the cake arrived in perfect condition.

I ordered the chocolate cake with lindts and it was just to die for. The cake was moist and kept well for a couple of days!

Highly recommend and will be ordering from them again!
Great cakes and amazing service. Delivery is prompt and cakes are fantastic quality. Would highly recommend.

Review Title: Excellent service and a lovely cake
Review Text: Excellent service and a lovely cake, we had the lindt cake. One if the best cakes I have ever had. The delivery was spot on and everything was well packaged. Please give this company a try.
Perfection delivered to my door, cake looked beautiful tasted delicious, everyone enjoyed it.

What an amazing cake, delivered well with care and great instructions. Tasted  so delicious will definitely be ordering again and recommend to anyone wanting a delicious cake. I ordered the red velvet cookies and cream cake for the next was not disappointed at all.

EDIT:
I was never looking to have a cake to be collected on Good Friday!! Desserts said they would send cake on Thursday, so it would be here on Friday!! Then they cancelled that order too!!

==============

I have used this company for 1 year, I have ordered lots of family and friends Birthday cakes. Never had a problem with them until last week (13 April 2022).

I received an email on 13 April stating they had a system error and my cake would need to be sent earlier due to Easter Holidays. The email stated my delivery date was for Saturday 16 April, which is wrong. My delivery date was for Tuesday 19 April. I replied to the email, asking about the delivery date, to which the reply was "Thats why we are emailing you as the system took the order in error". I replied
all they needed to say is they are on public holiday Friday and Monday. I then agreed to my cake being delivered on Friday 15 April.

I thought all was sorted out until I received another email at 12.50am (Thursday morning) that my order was now cancelled and full refund given.

Customer Service was neither helpful or professional in regards to this matter.

Needless to say I managed to source a cake elsewhere who were extremely helpful and managed to get my cake to me on Friday.
Response Text: Unfortunately no couriers in the UK collect on Good Friday. Customer was refunded and offered 50% on future orders.

Review Text: Absolutely love these cakes. They never fail to amaze to their quality and choice of cake. We recently ordered the chocolate rainbow cake. It was so vibrant in colour and so light and fluffy. Not a sickly cake at all and most definitely more-ish. Would certainly recommend this bakery and will definitely be ordering again in the future.

Ordered a selection of cakes 12 days in advance and paid £8 for it to be delivered on a chosen date. Contacted them the day before because I still hadn’t received any shipping updates and I was told “sorry it was lost in transit”.

I was so disappointed because it was supposed to be for a birthday. I specifically ordered way in advance to give them every chance to have it delivered on time. Would not shop with them again and based my experience, would not recommend them.

The only reason I’m not giving 1 start review, is because I got a refund fairly quickly.
Response Text: It looks like the courier let us down on this occasion, This can happen in very rare occasions

Review Text:
I ordered the peanut butter cake for my other half for his birthday & safe to say for a peanut butter lover the cake went down a treat!??
Cake got delivered on time on the specific date I had chosen with no complications. The customer service was also good I was kept updated and had all my queries answered straight away .

Will defo be ordering from here again!

Review Title: Ordered a Biscoff cake for sons 30th…
Review Text: Ordered a Biscoff cake for sons 30th birthday, day before as last minute thing. The cake arrived next day and surpassed our expectations. Great cake and fantastic service.

Review Title: Amazing Cake and good Customer Service.
Review Text:
We ordered a birthday cake quite last minute with additional balloons, cake toppers, candles etc. We then had a change of date and contacted Customer Services to see whether we could change the date. Desserts Delivered Bakery promptly replied and changed the date as per our request.

When the cake arrived it was beautifully packed to avoid damage whilst in transit.

The cake itself was beautiful to eat and everyone complimented the taste and flavor.

I would definitely recommend purchasing from this company and will be reordering again in the future.

Review Title: The cake was absolutely fantastic & the…
Review Text: The cake was absolutely fantastic & the quality of it was phenomenal. Delivered on time & with great care as well. Will order again! ??

Beautiful cake, really tasty and looks amazing. (White choc Lindt cake)
Ordered for my wife’s birthday (2nd year running) and she loved it.
I love ordering cakes from this company. It’s so easy and I have never been disappointed. I mainly order the white choc Lindt cake. It’s absolutely gorgeous, delicious and a show stopper.

Review Title: I ordered a Cadbury cream egg cake for…
Review Text: I ordered a Cadbury cream egg cake for my daughters boyfriends 21st birthday, it was beautiful they loved it,  they delivered it on time and with care. I would definitely order from Desserts Delivery again.

Review Title: Fantastic service and delicious, gorgeous cake
Review Text: Fantastic service, the cake was beautiful and delicious. We had about 13 generous servings and a very happy birthday girl. I would definitely recommend and will use again.

Review Title: We ordered the chocolate orange cake…
Review Text: We ordered the chocolate orange cake and honestly the cake was amazing got compliments on it! I was a little worried it might be too orangey/tangy but it honestly wasn't we will definitely be ordering again!x

First time that I have used this company and the service was excellent. I ordered 6x cupcakes of various flavours and the creme egg cake for my daughter's 18th birthday. The packaging was brilliant, they came well wrapped and chilled. Cakes moist....tasted lovely ????
They are amazing! Really good flavours; taste great, look great & great packaging!
Cake looked and tasted amazing. Delivery was on time. Perfect

Absolutely loved the cake and cupcakes, amazing service and fast delivery the next day! There was a great selection of choices & the cakes were very delicious. I highly recommend buying from desserts delivered baker, overall so impressed!??
This was a birthday gift for family member. Was delivered on time and enjoyed by all the family.

Review Title: I ordered a cake for my mum for her…
Review Text: I ordered a cake for my mum for her birthday. Her birthday was on Saturday.. I ordered a biscoff cake and some cheesecakes. On arrival the I checked the order and there was no biscoff cake and 2 cheesecakes were damaged. I could not get hold of them for a while and they got back to me after my mums birthday had passed. sending lots of emails back and forward they said to me that they sent me another random cake and as a replacement because biscoff was out of stock. They said me some random cake and refused a refund. I made for a product that was not in stock and the cheek of the company just to send out some random cake that does not sell and refusing a refund .shocking and poor customer experience. Real shame and very poor service
Response Text:
Our terms state if you are not happy simply return the unwanted product, Once this is returned we are more than happy to refund in full just like our terms state

Thanks

Review Text:
Excellent cheesecakes and cup cakes!! Delivery was brilliant, on-time and cakes fully intact. Would definitely use again for other special occasions and will be telling friends and family!
Thank you for a brilliant service and superbly delicious cakes ?? ??

Review Title: Cakes Superb - I can now say Customer Services is too
Review Text: We have purchased many cakes from this company and they never fail to impress. A small issue during the height of Covid meant a Cake failed to get delivered..Deserts Delivered couldn't apologise enough & offered a half price cake when we ordered again.. Just ordered one & they honoured the promise without question in their usual  friendly manner & the recipient of the cake was well impressed... This is an amazing company

Terrible and rude customer service. Also think they make fake 5 star reviews and they will do anything to remove the bad reviews which come through often. Would avoid this company - much better and honest companies out there that deserve customers than this one.
Response Text: All of our reviews are genuine and verified by Trust pilot this however looks like a fake review.

Review Text:
the cakes are so nice and have so much flavour. i would 100% recommend the cakes and the milkshakes
the milkshakes are so thick and creamy nothing can beat one.
great delivery service as well. 10/10
Excellent Biscoff Cake. Delivered on time and the cake was one of the best I've had. Thank you

I ordered the mixed cake slice box for Mothers Day. Amazing, choice was great and the slices that came were large. I strongly recommend. I have previously ordered a cake from here which was beautiful also and I intend to purchase some cupcakes for Easter. After that I’m just going to have to make up excuses to buy more cake

I ordered a ferrero rocher cake for my friends 50th. Typical me I left it till the last minute but with next day delivery service my cake arrived in time and was really well packaged. The cake was amazing and  everyone commented that it was one of the best cakes they had had!! Would definitely recommend and will definitely use them again. I just need another celebration!!

Marvelous! Bought these cup cakes and brownies for a Mothers Day Treat!  I was absent but I had 5 star reports from the kids and my wife so they must have been good. This is the second year I've done this and will continue. I'm back home tomorrow so I am hoping they have left one for me!

excellent great quality, the cakes are excellent, however you need to be around for delivery as the company  drivers they use will leave it, ours was left on door step in the sun, but cake excellent, however you do get a text when delivery so you can sort it and get it in to a fridge.
Amazing cakes! Will always order from here, great for every occasion and always loved by all of our family and friends!!

I came across the Chocolate Lindt cake by utter chance and can safely say it was the best choice I could have made, it's absolutely delicious! Delivery was punctual and very well packaged, now I can't wait to try another!

Review Title: Choc rainbow layered cake not so great.
Review Text: Ordered the chocolate rainbow layered cake. The cake arrived very very well packed. It looked Huge…However the cake was very small (box inside a box inside a box)!! It did not look as good as the picture on their website but at least it was not damaged. Also you would need to buy your own silver cake base plate as it came with a flimsy white cardboard base. I ended up decorating it myself. When we cut the cake, it was nicely layered however, couldn’t taste the chocolate for some strange reason..the cake was very moist probably too moist actually and sweet syrupy. It didn’t taste nice. Won’t be buying from here again unfortunately.
Response Text: It is clearly stated online the cake sizes and how many people they feed. The cakes come on a cake base and do not require another not sure what you mean about this.

Review Text: ordered the Oreo red velvet cake. Looks exactly like photo on website and was worried about it getting bashed during delivery but it came in secure packaging which I was really impressed with! really happy will be ordering again

I’ve had a few cakes delivered from desserts delivered every-time they taste and look amazing. My children absolutely loved the creme egg cake they gave it 5 stars.
Recommend to my family and friends.

Review Title: Got the lindt deluxe chocolate cake for…
Review Text: Got the lindt deluxe chocolate cake for my mum. Very tasty, creamy and soft! Put it up there with one of the best tasting cakes i have had, no troubles with the company at all. However, i will say for the price you pay the cake is a little on the small side as i have known other places to sell bigger whole cakes for cheaper. But all in all had a good experience.

Decoration quality was poor, and did not have a professional finish. Did not look like the picture advertised online. The side frosting was not smooth or continuous. The chocolate drizzle was minimal. There were elements of the decoration just not there as advertised. It looked as if it had been decorated by a complete amateur, and as if the online cake was just someone else's entirely.  I'd purchased the Nutella cake for my son's 18th. So if course it was a big disappointment  The taste was nice enough, maybe a touch sweet on the butter cream side. Customer service was poor. Blamed it on transit. However a positive was that it arrived very well packaged and on time. I mentioned this but was told to send it back at my own expense or met with an offer of 50% off a future order. I will not be making a future order!... Cake has a shelf life. It's not feasible to return. So this customer service is therefore unsatisfactory, and my purchase was just not a professional product. If only you could see the photos on here! I was never expecting a carbon 99% copy, however a certain level of care and attention to the end product quality should be a given.
Response Text: Our cakes are all hand made - they can not look EXACTLY like the photos but are almost 99% accurate. We do not sell machine processed cakes so this is impossible to replicate exactly.

Review Text:
If you do not want to be disappointed and waste your money avoid this company at all costs. The cakes are overpriced and taste awful. Far too sweet. The cake I received was broken and having sent pictures I was told it would still taste the same !!!!! I replied that I would not go into a shop and spend that amount of money on a broken cake. It was embarrassing to give that to my partner.
I was told an investigation would be lodged with DPD which was a total lie. This company doesn’t deserve to be allowed to operate

Response from company is subject to opinion - but doesn’t excuse appalling customer service - or lack of it.
Response Text: We have a very high rating on trustpilot and feel our cakes are great value for money

Review Title: Never received my cake as it was…
Review Text:
cake was delivered to the wrong address (no fault of my own). The company acknowledged it was delivered to the wrong place however refused to refund as it was “marked as delivered” due to their terms and conditions. Beware. Birthday cake not edible due to being sent to wrong address no refund

Update: Refunded in full? That’s funny as I have the email from your customer service stating you would not refund it even though you acknowledged it was sent to the wrong address (something I didn’t authorise) as it was still “delivered”. Do you mean refunded because after you refused to help me I raised a chargeback with the evidence via my bank?
Response Text: This was refunded in full as courier sent to wrong address

Review Text: Excellent and professional service. Cakes absolutely amazing and delicious, really good, everyone enjoyed it and will definitely buy again.

First time using this company and I'm impressed.  Ordered the nuttella cake , it looked and tasted amazing.  Thankyou desserts delivered bakery , il make sure more customers come your way ??. Totally recommended them

Review Title: This was the best birthday cake by far…
Review Text: This was the best birthday cake by far , ordered the crème egg one , all my guests commented on how lovely it was , excellent packaging, brilliant from ordering from start to finish, definitely recommend

I ordered the chocolate rainbow cake for my granddaughter's birthday.  The cake arrived on the requested date and was packaged securely.  On the day, my granddaughter was delighted with the cake, as was everyone else.  It was delicious. I would recommend Desserts Bakery, you won't be disappointed.

Fantastic company to deal with. Firstly customer service very good, efficient and always got a response. Martin very helpful with helping me and my order. Secondly, the cake was amazing! Just sad we only had one as it went far too quickly! Packaged really well too.

Ordered a large cookie dough cheesecake for my sons birthday.
What turned up was 6 mini individual Oreo cheesecakes.

Made contact and was told they ran out of the one I ordered so they sent these instead. £12 difference and no mention of a refund at this point.

I explained the replacement was not wanted due to it not being suitable for a birthday cake.
I was told that I would have to return the mini cheesecakes I didn’t order at cost to myself or I would not get a refund.
I returned the mini cheesecakes signed for and got my refund after I chased for it and provided a tracking number.

I was left with no birthday cake for my son, inconvenienced having to chase back and forward with emails and £9.99 out of pocket for having to return something that I never ordered.

Would never use this company again!
Response Text: Apologies please email us and we will be happy to refund in full.

Review Title: Not as advertised, far too sugary
Review Text: Cake listing had dark chocolate icing and cake, with layers being cake rather than icing. In the listing, the cake was topped with multi coloured sprinkles, stars, and rainbow. Upon delivery, it transpired that the cake had been stored on its side throughout its journey, even as it was being scanned on our doorstep. The cake was not topped with colours of the rainbow- it was just brown. The chocolate icing was not dark. The layers were icing, rather than cake. And the cake was very, very sweet: my child did not really want to eat it!

What an AMAZING company to do business with. I had several problems and they have dealt with these and sorted my delivery out. The communication has been so reassuring. Thank you to you all doesn’t seem enough. I would definitely recommend anyone and everyone to use this company.

Firstly - read the other negative reviews - there is a pattern of behaviour with this business sending out inferior/replacement products and expecting the customer to roll over and accept them and when you want a refund the ‘lovely’ Martin is more than happy not to help.

Simply put DO NOT use this bakery and seek an alternative - i ordered a cookie dough cheesecake for my wife's birthday what turned up were 6 individual oreo cheesecakes. I phoned the company on several occasions to arrange a return - no one would take my call to discuss the issue. I have since been in touch with the bakery via email - the best they can do is an ‘arsey’ apology for messing up my wife's birthday cake and an offer to refund the difference between the 2 products. I am currently discussing ‘legally’ my position with their terms and condition's (have a read before you order!) - but likely i will need to take the issue to the small claims court for a full refund.

Update - still not received any monies back from the company. DO NOT TRUST THEM!

Update 2 - They have finally refunded the difference between the cakes i didn't order and cake I ordered. Now they are asking me to return the cakes i didn't order at my expense a week after receiving them for a full refund. You couldn't make it up - AVOID THIS BAKERY AT ALL COSTS YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED.

Update 3/reply - So everyone is clear on the sales/returns policy at this bakery - there are some items they don't always stock - fine all companies from time to time will stock out - this company will then take it upon themselves to replace the item without consultation with a ‘most equivalent’ (their wording in the T&C’s) - the item they replaced it with on this occasion was not a cake but 6 individual puddings (not the ‘most equivalent’ in my opinion) - they will then ship this apparently ‘most equivalent’ replacement cake(s) to you - I tried to contact them via phone to make a return and they didn't call me back - I then emailed the business as no luck on the phone - they then mentioned i would have to return the perishable items i didn't order at MY EXPENSE 5 days after i first tried to get in touch - just be clear on this point - YOU will need to pay for a return for a cake you didn’t order. PATHETIC. AVOID. AWFUL CUSTOMER SERVICE.

Update 4 - I have taken up the case with my bank. The reviews for this business are getting worse! BEWARE.
Response Text: We try to call all customers if a product is out of stock, if we can not get through we never want to leave a customer without a cake so replace. If you are not happy your more than welcome to a full refund on returning the porduct

Review Text: Loved my birthday cake it was  on time and was so fresh highly recommend
Overall I love the cakes! Recommended

If you would like your child to be extremely disappointed & have their birthday ruined! then order from this company.  Your polite emails are responded with a very patronising response. The cake was absolutely tiny, looked nothing like the picture, biscuits all broken on the top and crumbs everywhere making it look a mess.  Biscuits did not taste fresh and it was a complete waste of money after one bite it went in the bin. Promised refund if I removed review but I feel it is more important to prevent another person being deeply dissapointed on their big day.  The photos on the website look amazing but they are tiny and do taste of mostly icing and stale biscuits.  My post is now verified as they tried to get it taken down and I had to provide proof of emails and the fact it was delivered on it's side which meant it arrived damaged!
Response Text: Full cakes sizes and descriptions are clearly displayed online, The biscuits are fresh on all cakes.

Review Title: Some problems but they were sorted efficiently!
Review Text: Unfortunately, I had to request for a refund for my cake as the recipient was allergic to an ingredient. There was initial back and forth with me and Martin as I was told the cake had been sent out and I could not receive a refund for it however, after speaking to Martin he assured me I will get a refund for the order which is being processed now. Thank you so much for helping me out with this issue!
Ordered the kinder bueno cake for my husband's 30th birthday! It was delivered in the most secure packaging I was very impressed. It looked and tasted fantastic. Thank you very much!

I ordered hazelnut cupcakes for my partner’s birthday and instead they sent plain cheesecakes. My partner HATES cheesecake. £30 straight in the bin.

Like other reviews, I was emailed after posting (at 2am) and they asked me to take down my trust pilot review and then I would be able to get a refund.
I’ve stated a refund should be given first as it was a fault on their behalf. Not a broken biscuit. A completely wrong order. Not even a different cupcake. A completely different form of dessert.
They haven’t replied since.

February 16th and the company are trying to blackmail me. They will not give me my refund and have said they will only give me a 50% refund if I remove my trustpilot review. Their product is still sitting untouched but they want me to pay £10 to return it to them.
Looks like I have lost my £30. I’ve never had such cheap, incorrect and awful looking products and customer service that runs through blackmail.
Response Text:
We agreed to refund half of the amount back or the customer to return the product for 50% refund
Thanks

Review Text:
thank you for the cheesecake I purchased from you. I’ve worked post sales support and servicing for decades, so I’m a firm believer in providing feedback.

I bought one of your cheesecakes to replace one for my brother’s birthday that he hated the taste of. He absolute loves it and trust me, he’s a bit particular ??

So, many thanks for the care and attention you put into your products and for the option of fast delivery, which I greatly appreciate.

Ordered birthday cake  at short notice after our family meal out had to be cancelled due to self isolation. Easy to order from website. Arrived exactly on time in highly protective packaging. Cake looked amazing- Lindt chocolate cake. Also tasted great. Whole family delighted- would happily use again

We ordered a box of six mini cakes before Christmas. When they arrived, they looked great. We defrosted and tried three of them. Tasteless mush. Contacted their so called customer services and received a reply from Martin (customer service manager). Requested that we would like to return the three uneaten ones. Told that we couldn’t. Tried various suggestions to resolve the issue but according to Martin, you can only deal with him as he is the manager and nobody above him. Asked for details of manager / ceo / legal team and basically got nowhere. Then got told to contact the legal team at the same location as Martin, we know where that was going. Nothing heard back.

Basically, if you like the cakes, great, but if not, throw them in the bin as the customer service is rubbish. Sadly would have preferred to resolve the matter amicably but not with Martin at the helm.

And no, we did not order a cake slice box. Clearly their customer service is a bit to be desired.


Order summary

Mini Cheesecakes - Choose Your Own × 1
Response Text: You ordered a cake slice box - please see our reviews we have a very high rating on trust pilot and many repeat customers.

Review Text: Everyone enjoyed the delicious rainbow cake sent to us for our daughter´s 18th. It arrived in good time, well packaged and chilled for next day. We had ordered a Victoria sponge rainbow cake which wasn´t available so a chocolate rainbow cake was supplied. I missed a communication about this so was initially disappointed but it was a great success and I would recommend this service to anyone. I had a couple of very prompt emails in response to queries and feel that the company want to get it right and deserve to do well.

Extremely disappointed!  Live in NZ and ordered a cake for my daughter's birthday in the uk.  Ordered cake, paid for cake, confirmation email received, email received saying cake has been dispatched, email from delivery company saying cake has been received and is on its way.  My sister (I gave her contact number) has a phone call to say they don't have any of the cakes I ordered do I want an alternative or refund.You advertise cakes are made to order.  How is it on its way and then you don't have one?  Won't be using you guys again!   Very angry!
Response Text: The cake ordered was out of stock, we tried to call customer a day before delivery dare and also emailed but customer did not reply. We never like to leave anyone without a product so send an alternative

Review Text: Excellent service from start to finish. Delivery on time and cakes tastes delicious. The aero mint cake is the best cake I've had, will be ordering again for sure.

I found myself without a cake for my sons 21st birthday. I looked online & found Desserts Delivered Bakery which promised next day delivery. Their website indicates that if you order before 2pm, you will receive your delivery within 24 hours. I ordered in the morning, so expected by the latest, lunchtime the next day. In time for my sons birthday lunch.
The next day I received an email from DPS stating that my cake would not be delivered until 6.30 pm. Too late for my sons birthday meal & well outside the ‘24 hour’ promise.
The first red flag when trying to rectify this problem, was there was no phone number for customer services. The only way to complain was via email. The second red flag was the contact I had with a ‘customer service’ advisor. He stated that they do not guarantee delivery within 24 hours & then said ‘you won’t get a refund’ - before I had even asked for one!! They were immediately very defensive & certainly were NOT customer focused.
The message to potential customers is, if you are in no hurry, then once received, the cake is nice! But the company clarified that they will never offer an express delivery service. The delivery will always be sent to DPS as a standard delivery, so when you get your delivery is very much dependant on where you are on the DPS schedule.
I would also say that if there are any problems with what you have ordered, the customer service they offer is very poor. The expectation I would suggest is that the company will try to avoid recompense as much as possible.
In summary, if there are no time constraints & the product is ok, you will be fine. Otherwise, you may have a problem.
I will not use them again myself.
Response Text: We do not guarantee a delivery time only a delivery date, your cake was delivered on the exact date picked as promised by our website. Thankyou

Review Title: Absolute joke of a business with no…
Review Text:
Further update to Dessert Delivered comments:

Utter rubbish and I stick with my comments. They resolved via me asking for a refund to Amazon and not by sending me the missing 2 cakes. Mistake? I hope you have a celebration and someone makes this mistake. I am sure you will be ok with the service provided. Anyway, no chance of any further business and hopefully people reading this will also walk away. Your loss for rubbish post sale customer service.

Update:

Even with the below Amazon have refused to post my review. I will be making a complaint to their review team.

Original post:

Absolute joke of a business with no awareness of customer service. Bought 3 cakes for Christmas and only had 1 delivered. Chase numerous times with no real resolution. Got a message today saying as they delivered 1 cake they will be calling collections company for the money? I have spent thousands with Amazon and always pay what I should. This threatening behaviour is unacceptable and all they needed to do was apologise for messing up my Christmas which they did not care about and I will pay for the useless cake they sent me, which I did. They have not customer service nor any remorse about ruining events they have committed to supply for. A disgrace of service and I have made a formal complaint with Amazon. Keep away. Cake wasn’t great either

Review Text: Excellent!  Ordered an 'oreo'cake for a 21st 2 days before Christmas. Arrived exactly when they said, cake looked great and tasted even better. Just ordered another fir.my daughters bday next week. Will definatlly return for future special occassions. Thank you

Review Title: 50th Birthday Cake - Dolce & Gabbana Shoe box with shoe on top - AMAZING!!!!
Review Text: My husband ordered me a cake for my 50th Birthday and I have to say it was amazing and not only that it was gluten-free which is so hard to find for such a beautiful cake.  It was a light sponge with a lemon flavouring and tasted absolutely delicious.  The decoration was fabulous in the shape of a Dolce & Gabbana shoebox with a shoe on top (he knows me too well, a girl who loves shoes).  Thank you so much,  I will definitely be recommending you to all my friends.

Got the cake this morning, WAAAAY smaller than expected and a broken biscuit on the top which is a major part of the presentation.

Their offer was buy a pack of Oreos, we will pay, but not for my time and I am working (hence I ordered and paid more for ease) I am not free to sort this out. Petty for sure but wow they got rude and aggressive fast.

They said send it back, leaving me with no birthday cake.

Like the other reviews, they tried bribery to take this down, so clearly a habit, along side them then making a complaint saying this wasn’t so to trust pilot so I had to prove I was a client. Which I clearly could.

meh, avoid as with the slightest issue they are rude and aggressive.

They’ve also lied in their response here. I have emails that trust pilot have seen and verified so again, they offered a bribe in a half refund and wouldn’t do so until I removed this. Yay it’s now verified. So proves my experience. I may even go to citizens advice or small claims.

The broken biscuit couldn’t be removed as it was kind of melted in and ruined the look and the outside had cream missing (like a smudged look)

I’m getting sarcasm. It was expensive to save hassle. The presentation was damaged by bad packing. It wasn’t layered as promised, it was just red velvet. It was bland and sugar. One slice was tasted and it was thrown. It didn’t look like the picture.


AVOID
Response Text: All of this over one broken biscuit on a beautifully presented cake, safely delivered, great tasting cake!?

Review Text:
I ordered an Oreo cake, candles, fountain, balloons, banners and a cake topper. My only complaint is the cake topper was missing off the order, however we did order a lot and once I notified them by email I was offered a refund of the missing item with a couple of hours with no fuss.

The cake itself was delicious. I was slightly dubious initially as this is the first time I’ve ordered but I will definitely be ordered again. This was for my daughters 6th birthday and she absolutely loved it. Best birthday ever apparently!

100% will order again.

I ordered The Lindt Deluxe Chocolate Cake about 2 weeks ago to arrive today for my partners birthday.

It was easy to place my order on the website. Once placed, I was advised that the order would be made just before it was shipped and that I didn't have to do anything else. Perfect.

The cake arrived at around 12pm today in the most secure and failsafe box I have ever seen for a cake. I was so impressed how well protected it was. There was even dry ice in the box to keep the cake frozen.

The courier they used (DPD) gave regular updates on the delivery, so it was easy to make sure we were at home and ready for the delivery. Also, it was great that the cake was delivered on the day I wanted.

The cake itself looks exactly like the picture and I got exactly what I paid for, very impressed. We haven't had chance to taste it yet, but it looks so delicious. The leaflet advises to wait 2-3 hours before eating, to ensure its fully defrosted. I will update here when we have tried it, but I suspect its going to taste amazing!

Would highly recommend using Desserts Delivered Bakery. Thank you!

Lovely cakes with fast delivery .
This is the second year we have had birthday cakes from here & it definitely won’t be the last. The cake arrived on dry ice & kept fresh for up to a week after. To be honest the cake was so delicious I am surprised it lasted a week. I would highly recommend .

Review Title: Chose Reeses cake it was delicious and…
Review Text: Chose Reeses cake it was delicious and not overly sweet and sponge was as good arrived on the day packed very well I will be using them again in the future the experience was trouble free.
Brilliant and tasty cakes for a surprise birthday party. Quality and timely delivered. Highly recommend.
Amazing cakes, used for a family birthday 10/10 for quality and service. Highly recommend.
As always excellent quality, taste and presentation. Never fails to disappoint. Definitely one of the best desert places around.
Thanks for the amazing cake. Had the Oreo. My dad loved it

Excellent, cakes are great.
Highly recommend

Review Title: Could not recommend this company to anyone.
Review Text:
I ordered a cake and some cheesecakes from this company on November 3rd for my boyfriends 30th Birthday, the items looked great on the website and I choose the Kinder Hazelnut cake specifically as I knew this was a cake he would love.

Unfortunately when the item was delivered on the Saturday I discovered that the incorrect cake had been delivered and I have received a Lotus Biscoff cake instead. I emailed the company straight away with a photo explaining the situation and when I was responded to I was told that it looked like a food packer had made an error and would I like to accept this cake. I explained that I would not like to accept this cake as my boyfriend who's birthday the cake was for does not like Biscoff and so it would be wasted. I also explained that we had kept the packaging and not opened the cake in order to return it for the correct cake.

Following this the company agreed for the cake to be returned to them for a replacement of the correct item however when I asked for clarification as to if they would be paying the shipping cost to send this back I was told that this would be my responsibility even though they had admitted to the fault being theirs.

This has now been going back and forth for the past two days with the manager on duty telling me that they do not pay for returns as stated in their terms and conditions. However I pointed out several times that this is not a return and is in fact a complaint due to their error and was still met with we do not pay for returns.

I also received an email pointing out a condition on their website about if an item is out of stock they will contact me and replace it with an equivalent cake. However when I queried why this was relevant as they had already said it was an employee error, I was told why it was relevant or sent to me.

I was also offered a 50% refund and to keep the wrong cake however as I had already explained, this cake is not suitable and would instead be going to waste.

I have now been in touch with Citizens Advice and have sent a formal letter of complaint citing my legal rights in terms of my short term right to reject and their options to either had the incorrect item picked up or to reimburse postal costs as a consequential loss to myself attached to an email to which they have responded "We have already replied to the email you don't need to send us the letter."

Unfortunately I feel that my complaint is not going to be resolved by this company and I will not be receiving the refund to which i am entitled unless I go further to trading standards or through my bank.

I'm honestly so disappointed as the cheesecake selection we also received look incredible however this experience has definitely put me off ever ordering from or recommending this company in the future.
Response Text:
We have offered a full refund or the correct product sent out

Thanks

Review Text: Ordered a cake my daughters 30th Birthday Cake in July to be delivered for her party on 30/10/2021 - nothing received  - no apology, no response  but today they send me an e-mail to say my order had been processed - good job I brought using PayPal so will get my money back - very disappointing as the cakes look amazing.  Full refund now received - NB: I did not choose wrong delivery date
Response Text: This was refunded in full. Fault with the courier.

Review Text:
This one is quite straightforward:

I bought a Carrot Cake and a Cookie Dough Cheesecake. The weight for each item is listed at approximately 2000g (i.e. 2Kg) on the website.

When I received the items it was obvious that they were much smaller so I weighed them on my kitchen scale...

The Cheesecake was 1548g and the Carrot Cake came in at just... 920g!!!!!!!!! That's less than half the advertised weight. Sure, I get the fact that it's an approximated weight on the website but the Carrot Cake is less than half the listed weight, which is ridiculous in my opinion.

I immediately contacted Desserts Delivered who did not take any responsibility and said they consider it's good value for the price. Now... value is of course subjective but weight clearly is not so I'm writing this review just so everyone is aware of these massive weight discrepancies.

In the interest of fairness I will say that the products were delivered on time, the packaging is excellent and they are high quality indeed but I'm not a fan of false advertising and lack of ownership on the company's part for what is clearly a BIG ISSUE!

Hope this is useful to any future buyers
Response Text: It clearly explains that the measurements are "approximate" We hand make all of our products so it is impossible to know the exact measurements. We have no complaints from our regular customers who feel our products are great value for money.

Review Title: I ordered a Carrot Cake from Desserts…
Review Text: I ordered a Carrot Cake from Desserts Delivered Bakery which arrived today. I'm very impressed with the packaging it came in. The packaging was secure and the Cake Box with the Carrot Cake in was wrapped well. The Carrot Cake tastes lovely and fresh and looks Beautiful. Excellent customer service and delivery. Thank you ???

Review Title: DELICIOUS CAKE! I would HIGHLY recommend!
Review Text:
I received a cake from here as a surprise for my Birthday. It was delivered in a huge box with plenty of protection to protect the cake.

When I opened it the packaging was still ice cold and extremely well protected so the cake was perfect.

I allowed it to come to room temperature before we sliced and I have to say I was a little dubious, I've never eaten a cake before that had been frozen but I need not have worried, it defrosted really well, everything stayed in place and the cake still looked incredible and it was absolutely delicious!

The cake I had was cookies and cream, it was a really light and moist chocolate sponge covered in a really delicious buttercream, chocolate and cookies on top.

I've bookmarked the website because if I ever need a gift for someone in the post this is 100% what I'll be sending. I'd highly recommend!
Delicious birthday cake delivered straight to my door! Sponge remained moist for several days. So yummy and looks great.

The cake I received was the Chocolate Orange Twirl, and I only have good things to say about it! The sponge was delicious, soft and bouncy and the icing was very sweet. Only disappointment was that I couldn't eat more than a slice in one go!
Lovely cakes for special occasions! ??

Review Title: Missing items and damage - appalling Customer service
Review Text: EDIT 3:  So now after opening a Paypal dispute as they didn't honour a refund they promised , they expect me to return a cake from days ago (and missing items) for a full refund. What will you do re-freeze it and resell it ? - absolute joke ! . All I ever asked for was £15 and reading some of these reviews you would most likely claim the returned ruined cake never arrived. Enjoy my money and thanks for spoiling a birthday.EDIT 2: Gobsmacked to say the least , latest email from company saying they will refund once I take this review down. Still waiting.  Last message very unsavioury and I quote from their Manager on duty Tony Misham  " Hi James - No problem we will do once the review is removed, i have a sales rep in your area are you home today and we can discuss, We do not appreciate slander of our business online. Are you at (My address) "    - and then a follow up to advise someone will be round soon to discuss  ! is this for real ! EVERYTHING WRITTEN IS FACT ! The approach by this company is dreadful.EDIT: Still unable to reply to this company , all emails bounce back as undeliverable so I cannot reply to your offer of refund. If you read this , please process what you have agreed back to me. I have also verified this review with Trust Pilot since you have disputed it !! Unbelievable tactics.This Company leaves me no choice but to leave this review. Having read others it seems I am not the first. Firstly cake arrived fine on the day but was missing the ordered candles. Furthermore on opening,  the cake was damaged. Not one to want to fuss I contacted the company and was told to check the box again (I had of course 3 times) and also send an image of the damage. Oddly after 5 attempts to email the damaged cake , each of my emails was blocked by their servers even by sending to more than one of their email addresses and using more than one of mine. Coincidence ?  By this point of being completely frustrated , I opened a Paypal dispute (to be fair to the company the cake with shipping cost £41.99 , I asked for a £15 refund for damage and missing items which I think is very reasonable . This was then met with a response to return the cake and items (candles missing - of course invisible candles can't be returned can they) for my £15 refund and at my postage expense , really - are you for real ? £15 refund, no cake, no candles for a £41.99 outlay that spoilt my sons birthday and I can also add the cake biscuits are soggy and stale just to add insult to injury . I gave an olive branch to this Company and was met with every obstructive twist and turn and now silence.  The worst customer service I have experienced.  All you had to do was listen to your customers, you clearly do NOT do this and have no interest in resolving consumer complaints when things go wrong. Appalling experience. i hope others read this , Caveat Emptor !
Response Text: HI James we do not "blank" emails and have emailed you back offering you a refund on the candles and slight damage. Thanks

Review Text: Absolutely delicious! This was the second cake we have ordered from Desserts Delivered and they never disappoint. A++
I have ordered 3 cakes recently from Desserts Delivered Bakery, they have always arrived wonderfully boxed, always fresh and as tasty as they look!! I would highly recommend them for any occasion!

I have been offered a refund and a discount for any future purchase which I’m safe to say won’t be needed. The lack of empathy for my daughter is beyond belief .. £55 by the time I added on extras and delivery .. ended up with a Tesco chocolate cake which by the way was delicious .
**Since submitting this , I have now been offered a replacement cake ONLY if I remove this review !!!!
Response Text: Hi - Due to the current circumstances with delivery drivers and couriers a very small percentage of our orders suffered from slight delays, our cakes last 4-5 days once they leave us. We have refunded you in full as well as offered you a free cake, Not sure what more we can do regarding this - as you can see from our rating we are an excellent source for bakery products. Thanks

The LINDT delux chocolate cake

Review Title: Lovely looking cakes, but check the best before date !!
Review Text:
I ordered the deluxe chocolate hazelnut cake and I was not disappointed. Delivery 27/08/2021 as I requested but would happily of had a day earlier if need be. The cake arrived in a robust packaging and in perfect condition. I also ordered some gluten free cakes which come in a separate package.
I was apprehensive after reading some negative reviews, everyone has their own story to tell but I am so glad I gave it a go.
Only down side is I wish they did a gluten free birthday cake but the individual cakes look delicious.??


So after I have given a glowing review I opened the vegan gluten free assorted cakes which 2 had been eaten to put the other cakes into a storage container these were not a gift thankfully to find they had a best before date 16/07/2021 these were delivered to me on 27th August 2021 some 6 weeks after the best before date, I have contacted the company via their website today and awaiting a reply and an explanation to why and how this happened, I could do nothing about the 2 cakes I had eaten but the other 4 went into the bin.
So at present no I would not recommend or buy again will update once the company has responded.

Update: After writing this review and several emails with the company nothing short of blackmail, I take my review down I get a refund for the 6 weeks out of date cakes they sent me, they then went the extra mile to contact trustpilot claiming I was not a customer! Which I had to prove to trust pilot and send evidence of my purchase, this review has been verified and yes unfortunately I was a customer and not a happy one.

I will be happy to add correspondence emails bargaining off me taking down this review in order to receive a refund for the out of date goods sent, and also proof of my order and delivery date and the best before date being 6 weeks after my delivery, if you are selling out of date goods the consumer must be made aware of this prior to purchase which I was not. Clearly not a lie or fake review as verified by trustpilot
Response Text: This review is a complete lie, we make our products then freeze and dispatch therefore a sell by date is not required until the cake is sent. Please see our excellent trust pilot rating. Thankyou

Extremely shocking company very very disappointed I want to start off by saying that the cake that was ordered it was a completely different cake to the one that actually showed up completely different colour different ingredient different decorations that was the first problem the second problem is that cake actually arrived with a note on top explaining that they tried to contact me and the cake that I ordered was out of stock.. That was not true in fact that was a complete fabrication nobody contact me I didn't have any emails or missed calls to explain that the cake I ordered was not in stock and that they would be delivering me a completely different one.
The customer service for this company is even more shocking than the cake that arrived it was an orange cake with more icing than cake it actually tastes a little bit like orange bubble gum and left a bitter taste in the mouth afterwards I had to get rid of this and get another cake as it was my son's birthday the day the cake came and they sent me a cake for a little girl that was leaning too one side because the sponge was struggling to manage with the weight of cream in between the layers there was sprinkles all over the box and cream all over the plastic bag that they cover the cake with.
I had to make a complaint to consumer services about the lack of professionalism within this company and the fact that they refused to give your money back.
They refused to give you a refund even after you have to prove to them that they sent the wrong cake. After acknowledging that they sent you the wrong cake after you have to provide them with picture evidence they are even more unreasonable when trying to sort out an issue and will do anything to not give you your refund.
This is actually the second review that I've had to write on this company because they told trustpilot that my review wasn't real.
I feel as though that as a company you really should let your customers know if you do not have an item in stock and that you're going to send them out a completely different cake as they refuse refunds.
They Should also learn how to speak to people with compassion and Honesty as you can't run a company off of lies and bad cake! They need ro accept when there the the wrong and try and resolve the issue instead of making customers frustrated and disappointed and making the situation worse, after seeing all the other reviews I realise that this is just how they conduct their business.
I've had to make a complaint to consumers services in regards to this matter I've never had to go to any extremes with any company before and to be honest I wouldn't have if a customer service didn't treat customers as they do.
The experience of the using this company was shocking.
I was told by the customer service man that I will not get my money back unless I take down my review, so as you can guess I'm still waiting for it. So I suggest if anybody wants to make a review on this company to write it after you receive your full refund otherwise you will not received your money or a replacement.
Personally I don't think anyone should be treated this way and I would never use this company again if I could give them -5 stars I would but unfortunately the minimum you can give them is one

Review Title: So sweet you’ll need to schedule a nap for the sugar crash
Review Text: I got a Deluxe Chocolate Hazelnut Truffle cake for my birthday and it’s just divine. Really well put together and so delicious, what a shame the pandemic means I will have to eat nearly all of it myself…

WOW I placed my order ready for a special birthday on 7th July 21 and the customer service was perfect!  Delivery was equally smooth and updates were great, Thank you for being really helpful and the cake is just lovely ??????????
Always order here and am never disappointed.

I ordered a white chocolate lint cake for my partners 30th. The cake arrived and it was a chocolate deluxe cake.
The cake was also not packaged properly as I have ordered before from the company. It was in a cardboard box - no polystyrene as usually does and the cake has fell to one side.
I contacted the company to highlight the wrong cake had been sent and if they could send out the correct cake for the following day as they offer next day delivery.
The company would not be able to send the correct cake out until 3 days later (this was two days after the occasion) and would not be able to offer a refund in full even though the item that arrived was not what I ordered.
I was told I had to return the wrong, damaged cake that arrived to the company to get a refund in full. I was not prepared to go to the inconvenience of sending a cake back when the fault was not on my part. Also why would the company want the cake returned? Are they going to sell this cake on again? I would not be happy receiving a second hand cake!
When I said this is disappointing not to get a full refund the company told me ‘we are a business we can’t just send out free cakes’
I was not looking for a free cake - I wanted the correct cake or refund in full.
The company offered a £10 refund from £43 total (including delivery) and did not offer to refund delivery costs until questioned. They could not offer a full refund as I was told ‘the cake costs £20 to make’
I think this is very poor customer service and I would not recommended to anyone.

Review Title: terrible. wrong cake sent. refund was not easy to get
Review Text:
terrible - look at the reviews carefully as you'll see my experience is very common.

I'm sure the company will claim this is a 'fake' review, but this review will stay up on the site as trust pilot will verify the order from the emails and the paypal receipts.

Ordered a cake for my daughter's birthday. They sent the wrong one. When I complained they asked me to return it (a defrosted cake??!!), no details of how to return it. Obviously I said no, unlike the poor person in the review below who went to all the effort to return it only for them to claim it was never received.

They then tried to convince me to accept a discount and 'keep' the wrong cake. Obviously I refused. In their third email they then admitted that they didn't have the cake in stock when I ordered it, so they had just sent me another cake without informing me. They said it was the same/similar inside, but I'd ordered a rainbow cake and this was a chocolate cake.

When I emailed for the fourth time demanding a refund, I said I would submit a paypal claim and leave a negative review on this site if they didn't refund me in full. Lo and behold they immediately agreed to refund and 'let me keep' the wrong cake.

Of course I had to chase the refund.

Order at your peril, and if you do, make sure you use paypal so you can get your money back quickly!

update: 13/7/21 the 'managing director' called me to apologise for the experience I had and then to ask if there was anything they could do for me to increase this review to 3 stars, or consider taking it down??!!
Response Text:
Not sure what more we can do here, you said you received the wrong cake so we refunded in full and let you keep the cake also?
Please read our reviews we have many happy and repeat customers and pride ourselves in supplying the finest collection of cakes in the UK.
Thanks :)

Review Text: Ordered a Nutella cake and an Oreo cake this week.  Both cakes look gorgeous and taste very good.  Cakes were safely packed and delivered.  Would definitely order again.

Review Title: Worst customer service! Staff is rude and passive aggressive even when they turn out to be wrong in the end ??
Review Text:
Awful. As a business graduate, this shop’s customer service is absolutely appalling. They refuse to refund even when you have provided proof that you returned their cake WHICH ARRIVED AFTER THE BIRTHDAY (selected date delivery my ass). It took a whole month to convince them that the cake has been returned AND IT HAS, it took finding and bugging the courier, asking for the name of the person who received etc. for them to acknowledge that I’m not lying about returning their damn late cake. Even though I sent them the tracking info of the return, clearly stating delivered. The problem was they clearly didn’t track what arrives back/what gets returned to them and who receives it. Instead, they kept insisting that they did not receive any returns, when they clearly did seeing as the courier said a certain (name) received it- which they later confirmed works for them. A WHOLE MONTH of back and forth bs before my refund. What kind of customer service emails you back SO rude as well? And just see for yourself, the way they reply to 1 star reviews here. No accountability, absolutely passive aggressive when dealing with unsatisfied customers. Customers are either delighted or not, if they’re not, you don’t behave passive aggressively but instead take their feedback into consideration. Yikes. Your management needs a lot of improvement especially whoever handles customer reviews and complaints because they need to be trained or fired. And for the love of god, record what comes in and out of your store. Even if the cake was delightful (which I don’t know because it didn’t arrive on time), I still wouldn’t bother with this shop due to their awful customer service.


EDIT: following your reply that this is a fake review, nope. This is my order number 77089. I can confirm that you have already refunded me so me leaving this review isn’t to acquire refund from you because I already got it. I’m only sharing my experience here because it truly was awful. It took a month and countless email exchanges for you to refund me because you didn’t believe that I returned that cake despite me providing the tracking info saying it’s successfully delivered back to you. You wouldn’t refund until cornered w the name of the recipient of the cake who is your employee. It’s just not fair to be treated that way when it’s your fault for not recording what gets returned to you and who received it. That’s it. I’m not here to discuss further, I’m just sharing my experience and I’ve seen other reviewers saying you’re asking them to take down their negative review. I’m saying now I won’t do that, so do not bother to coerce.
Response Text: So sorry you did not receive your cake, if you did we are 100% sure this review would not apply. Thanks

Review Text: So nice, good customer service, deffo recommend
Would highly recommend, staff are really friendly, and the desserts tasted amazing and such a great price. We will be back again soon xx

Ordered a cake for my daughters 40th birthday. It was due for delivery on the 7th May 2021. I decided to contact them as it was late in the evening and I did not receive a confirmation of delivery email, only to be told that there had been a delay with the delivery due to covid and I was promised a 100% delivery by DPD the next day and the refund for the delivery charge. The next day was my daughters birthday. If I had not contacted them no one would have made contact with me absolutely shocking. So the next day I contacted them again at 9:00am as again I had not received a delivery of email confirmation. They responded after 6pm by that time I had brought a supermarket birthday cake for my daughter the whole epidode was so stressful. I was promised a refund the incompentence and replys from them were vile, and unfriendly telling me to relax and to calm down how very unprofessional. I finally received my refund 6 days later. Think carefully before you order from this dreadful company. THE COMPANIES RESPONSE TO MY REVIEW IS AN OUT AND OUT LIE. I DID NOT RECEIVE MY ORDER NOR ANY CAKES FROM THEM. WHICH IS WHY IT WAS AGREED TO REFUND ME IN FULL. MY GOD THIS COMPANY HAS SOME SERIOUS ISSUES. THANK GOD I HAVE THE EMAILS FROM THEM TO CONFIRM MY REVIEW.
Response Text: This cake was delivered successfully and you were also sent a full refund plus another cake, Not sure what more we could do to resolve this. Hope you you enjoyed the cakes. Thanks

Review Title: Got a cake for a family birthday party
Review Text: Got a cake for a family birthday party. Came on time and in perfect condition, I was slightly worried about both when ordering. Best thing about the cake was the taste. Great company will definitely be using again.

Extremely disappointing experience. I paid for next day delivery but cakes did not arrive until a day late. I asked for a refund of the next day delivery cost but was told they cannot do this and blamed the pandemic?! I pointed out that we have lived with the pandemic for over a year and if they cannot fulfil their next day delivery promise then they should not advertise this as an option and should not keep payment taken under false pretences. After numerous emails culminating in my expressing disappointment at their awful customer service and pointing out that they could have issued repayment of the delivery cost, or offered a discount on a future order, or indeed free delivery, and that their failure to make any effort to make amends leaves me with the only option but to order elsewhere in the future,  they told me that if I order again in the future “let me know and I will refund some money back as a good will”. Sorry too little too late. The cakes I had ordered for a birthday gift were vegan brownies, they came with no explanation as to what each brownie was. I pointed this out but they have never addressed the point. To brownies were ok but nothing special. Suffice to say I won’t be ordering from this company again.UPDATE.  Your response to this review is not true. You said “Hi Debbie, we do make customers aware online to order a day or two before needed due to the covid 19 situation, and will unable to refund delivery costs as the moment”. You did not offer me a refund. I asked for one and you did not refund me. It does not say to order a day or two before on your website. What you actually say is order before 2 for next day delivery.  I have the emails and I only wish I were able to add them or a screenshot to my review. Appalling.
Response Text:
We pay our couriers a premium to deliver on time however it looks like on this occasion it was slightly delayed, we offered a refund on the delviery

Thanks

Review Title: BEWARE GO TO A CAKE SHOP!!
Review Text:
BEWARE GO TO A CAKE SHOP!!
My cake arrived on time , unfortunately it didn’t look like the picture on website, there was no chocolate running down one side so you could see the layers of cake , my chocolate balls were cracked or had chocolate missing , there was very little or no nuts at the bottom of the cake , so I had to redecorate it !! And as for the box it had coloured sprinkles stuck in it ( my cake was nuts ) looks like a reused box . I complained by email and was told I would get part of my money back after a week and lots of emails , I decided to do a review , they then asked me to take review down and then they would send refund ,which I did, I have received my refund and I have reported them to consumer services and I hope everyone else who has had problems with them does too , they took my review off this site and I contacted trust pilot and sent proof of purchase and emails , and trust pilot verified it , This is NOT a professional company!
Response Text: Our cakes are made fresh daily, we have never re used a box, we have a 5 star rating with trading standards and work closely with trading standards to ensure our quality is excellent. Thanks

Review Title: I couldn’t believe my luck when I found…
Review Text:
I couldn’t believe my luck when I found a celebration cake maker that could not only help last minute but deliver.
The order process is simple, you choose the day you want it delivering. The hard part is picking which flavour you want.
I was really nervous and excited once the email notification arrived saying dispatched.
But I had nothing to worry about. This company have obviously researched a lot how to get your bake to you safely.
The packing is much more than I was expecting and I also now have a handy cool box for the summer BBQ’s.
The cake itself was one of the best cakes I have ever had. The sponge was light and moist, the icing smooth, I can not fault it at all.
I will 100% be using this company again as I feel the need to try everything they offer as I know I won’t be disappointed.

Response Text: Hi Neil, You chose a Saturday delivery which is £5 extra on our norma delivery charge, we use a courier to deliver and make no profit on delivery, The biscuits on our cheesecakes are soft not soggy and are fine to eat, Our cheesecakes are much higher quality than what you will find in a supermarket, Thanks

I was very pleasantly surprised by this company.
Email communication with regards to an issue I have collecting the delivery from the communal door (due to injured ankle/on crutches) instead of my front door in a three storey building (I experienced delivery drivers from other companies refusing to climb the stairs despite informing them of my injury, and leaving packages on the street)
Their response was swift and very helpful and my problem was flagged to the delivery people.
The cake for my teen's 18th birthday arrived on time, (and right at my door by a very friendly, happy delivery man) and it was packed carefully with dry ice to keep it fresh for the next day.
The cake itself was delicious, super fresh and beautifully decorated.
Even better, the substantial cake was VERY reasonably priced too!
Well done guys, will definitely buy from you again.

We’ve now ordered a rainbow cake for my daughter's birthday, despite lockdown easing up and being able to get a shop-bought cake.
