The cake itself looks exactly like it does on the website and it was incredibly tasty. I should know, I had three pieces :-/

I was sent a Biscoff cake from Desserts Delivered Bakery. It made it to the Midlands from Newcastle in perfect condition! The packaging was really carefully done.

As for the cake itself - DIVINE! It’s absolutely beautiful and tastes amazing. Thank you so much.

Great response back and forth.
Cake looks great.
Great customer service.

Just hope it tastes as good as it looks
Brilliant service. Exactly as described. Delivered on time and well packed. Cake was delicious and looked fab. They are sweet and go a long way. Fab addition to add to a lock down birthday.

My second cake I have had from you, a Peanut butter cake last year and last Thursday was delivered a Red Velvet cake and as delicious, fluffy, moist cake as expected and very well packaged. I like the fact, there is no need to keep it in the fridge and stays fresh for at least 5 days later. If you can hold off from eating it by then.

We have used Desserts Delivered multiple times for many family birthdays, 21st, 60th, 22nd! Any age range would love to receive these cakes, amazing service, reasonably priced and so tasty! Can’t recommend enough
My husband ordered a cake for my birthday as a surprise. It arrived perfectly chilled and when he was told it would. It was stunning and tasted amazing! We would definitely use you again. Thank you

Review Title: Pre ordered a rainbow ?? cake on the…
Review Text: Pre ordered a rainbow ?? cake on the 7th of February to be delivered on the 16th it came when stated and looked absolutely beautiful and today the 17th we celebrated my baby’s 1st birthday/ angelversary in heaven and this cake was an absolute show stopper and tasted amazing would definitely order again

Beautiful cake delivered in perfect condition within 48 hours! I cannot recommend highly enough - I was amazed!

Thank you for helping to make my Dad’s lockdown birthday so special.
Very tasty and attractive cheesecake delivered on the day requested and very well packaged.

We ordered a cake for Christmas, which arrived in very good time. Unfortunately the cake was slightly sloped when it had arrived, and we couldn’t really use it to display on the dinner table. When emailing them they kindly refunded me some of the money back.
We did still eat the cake a few days later, and it was very nice indeed.
We have ordered another cake which arrived today, and it was packed perfectly, and looks amazing too

I would highly recommend this company
Everything was fantastic! From the delivery to the cake itself. The cake stayed fresh and tasty . Would definitely recommend

Ordered the cookie and cream cake for my boyfriend's birthday and it arrived on the scheduled date. Very yummy! Icing is sweet and cake soft and spongy! Only bad thing was the delivery person left the box outside the door on it's side but luckily the cake was secured well and didn't get damaged. Can't fault the dessert delivered bakery so I recommend trying their cakes and desserts!

Ordered a biscoff cake for my husbands birthday - delivered frozen solid (know the website states they are frozen but this was extreme and even had ice crystals on).. after 10hrs (gone 9pm at night) i felt whilst still exceptionally cold, his birthday would be over if we didn’t give my husband his birthday cake so we did..
I’d stress the cake itself is beautiful and we had high hopes but when we cut in it fell apart and crumbled in large chunks - it was also exceptionally dry but i believe this was due to how deeply frozen it was.
I dropped the company a message, not because i wanted anything (quite the opposite) but merely as I felt for the sake of their own business, they should see what was being delivered as maybe had a courier issue. I also volunteered to return it for them to see for themselves but received back quite a sharp reply (below). To be honest I’m now posting on here because maybe I’m not the only one who has experienced this and they should know. I was shocked that they clearly don’t like being given feedback to try and help their own business, which was all I was trying to do.
Sadly after this type of reply I won’t be ordering again despite having be prepared to before the response.

Reply - “Hi Karen, it is clearly stated online that our cakes are sent frozen so they are not damaged in transit, the cake is perfect to eat and we sold over 1000 of this flavour this week with no complaints, The cake requires defrosting for around 2-3 hours and it is perfect to eat, sorry you were not impressed like most of our customers”

Edit - I’m guessing from the identical response they have sent to my trust pilot review that is almost word for word what they they emailed me and I already quoted on this review, what i have experienced actually happens quite often, hence such a standard word for word response! Maybe in future they should read and learn from what customers are saying as I don’t see how a crystallised cake is perfect ..

Updated 17/01 - this company has now flagged my post to trustpilot as being ungenuine - considering they responded to me hours before I posted on trustpilot (and I did because of their shoddy response) they know full well it’s genuine. I’m shocked and gobsmacked an email sent to them out of concern for their products and how they are delivered has been met with such shocking customer service and then they have the audacity to say I’m not even a genuine customer - All I can say is avoid them at all costs
Response Text: Hi Karen, it is clearly stated online that our cakes are sent frozen so they are not damaged in transit, the cake is perfect to eat , The cake requires defrosting for around 2-3 hours and it is perfect to eat, sorry you were not impressed like most of our customers

Review Text: Cake arrived well packaged and as good as it looks on website. We were gifted the red velvet cookies and cream cake and it was absolutely fantastic! Sponge was very light and topping and filling were delicious- not too sweet or sickly.
The cakes are amazing would 100% recommend trying them if you have not!!

5* Cake & service.

Beautiful Biscoff Cake, delivered on date as requested, perfectly packaged to avoid damage in transit. I would ?? recommend and because it arrives frozen you could always order for a day or two before you actually need! It was so fresh & moist. I find the bad reviews below strange as my experience with this company was very positive!

Absolutely stunning cake,  brilliantly packaged. Literally looks identical to photos. The Biscoff cake was ordered for my sisters birthday. Tasted delicious.  Wanted to go the extra mile due to current climate. This cake did that. Would definitely recommend and would definitely order another. Delivery is Nationwide.

Dessetsdelivery bakery are Fraudsters
I ordered my birthday cake to be delivered on Saturday the 6th of February 2021. Paid the extra £5 for Saturday delivery. Today is 9th of February, 2021 and as at now, the cake is not been delivered. No contact phone number to speak to anyone. All emails sent were ignored and no feedback from them. All efforts to reach desserts delivered bakery proved abortive.
What a way to treat your first time customer.
Response Text: Fraudsters? Our courier DHL issued slight delays, Our email address and details are clearly displayed online, We can not find an order number for you. Take a look at our reviews we are not fraudsters,

Review Text: I’d been looking for cake delivery options for my partners birthday for some time when I came across desserts delivered bakery. It wasn’t the cheapest option, but the cakes looked so amazing! I decided to give it a go an so glad I did! I ordered the biscoff cake which arrived on the Friday as requested. My partners birthday wasn’t until the Sunday an when opened it was so fresh! It looked just like it had on the website and tasted moist and perfect! Both the cakes themselves and the the transport are well thought through so you get the cake you order. 100% recommend. It may seem a little pricey but definitely worth it. The cake is so wonderfully rich it definitely does serve a lot of people!

Review Title: It arrived in one piece and didn’t disappoint!
Review Text: I came across Desserts Delivered Bakery on Instagram.  I ordered via the website which was clear and easy to use.  I chose the Nutella cake and believe me it didn’t disappoint! It was rich, smooth and chocolatey.  The best part was the sponge light, fluffy and moist.  The most impressive part was that it arrived in a few days all the way to Scotland exactly in one piece.  Amazing cake I’d highly recommend!

I was treated to the Ferrero Rocher cake, which is my favourite chocolate treat & I say "I'm not a cake person" but I have to admit this was the most delicious cake I have ever tasted!

Would highly recommend. Perfect treat for a special occasion, would definately recommend this company to my friends and family and 100% use again :-) Clever how they package it to arrive in perfect condition. 10 out of 10!

Ordered at 1330 yesterday for next day delivery due to a last minute cancellation of my
previous order. Was skeptical about whether it really would arrive so quickly but it was here by 1230 today and looks exactly as it does on the website (one of the biscuits on top is broken however that's in no way the companies fault and is inevitable with delivery). It was well packed and protected as well. Haven't tried it yet as it's for tomorrow but I can only imagine
It tastes as good as it looks.

Review Title: They do not reply to any questions
Review Text:
They do not reply to any question you may ask them but just refer you to their website.

Response Text: This is not a review - We reply to all emails and questions within 5 hours and have a team dedicated to this.  We replied to this email saying yes we do deliver anywhere in the UK and we can not change any of the cakes sold online. Thanks

Review Title: Received a white lindt choclate cake
Review Text: Received a white lindt choclate cake. It was amazing. Not too sweet just a perfect blend between white choclate and velvet cake. 10/10

Received the vegan mixed cake box as a gift. The cake decoration was damaged in transit and not massively appealing. The site claims these cakes are freshly made to order but these were not fresh. I have found identical cakes for sale as pictured on the desserts delivered site just by typing ‘vegan cake delivery’ in the search engine with same ingredient information word for word. Disappointing.
Response Text:
We supply many companies our products at wholesale so they can be found elsewhere and are made fresh by hand

Thanks

Review Text: Excellent service. Delivery was quick and exactly on the chosen date. It was well packed and the cake was safe without severe damage. I loved the packaging of the cake and the cake ofcourse which was perfect size for lockdown birthday. It was exactly as shown in the picture. I would highly recommend it to anyone who is looking for perfect cake with next day delivery.

I ordered the Biscoff cake for my sisters birthday. The cake arrived on my chosen date despite the snow! The cake was well packaged and arrived exactly as seen on the website. The cake was smaller than expected, however it does clearly state on the website that the cakes are 6", I am just rubbish with measurements. Although smaller than initially expected, what I will say is that a small amount of cake goes an incredibly long way as the cake, although incredibly tasty, was very rich and a little sickly (which is a good thing for me as I have an incredibly sweet tooth!). About 1/3 of the cake comfortably fed 5 of us so it would definitely provide 10 generous portions as specified on the website! Overall it was a good shopping experience and I will likely order again for small family events/birthdays. The perfect size cake for a household/small gathering.

Review Title: I made a mistake over the delivery date…
Review Text: I made a mistake over the delivery date of my order, fortunately with a two-week gap that gave time to resolve the problem.  I contacted the team at Desserts Delivered Bakery, they responded immediately (they must have been working from home as it was out of hours at that point) and put everything right.  The (delicious) cake arrived beautifully packaged in an amazing box allowing bespoke space for the extra items ordered (sparklers etc.) and making the entire item a really exciting celebratory event cake.  Thank you and compliments to the team. I will be ordering from these guys again and cannot recommend them enough.

Review Title: No cake delivered - really poor service
Review Text: I ordered a Rainbow Cake on 18th January for my husband’s 60th birthday on 20th January. Had every hope it would arrive on time (next day delivery is the promise) but did not mind if it was a day late. Got an email from the appointed delivery company on 19th saying it would be delivered the next day - great! When nothing had arrived by 21st I messaged Desserts Delivered but received no response. As the day passed by I messaged again and on 22nd I received a very functional email response (‘sorry for the delay’ ‘it will be delivered as soon as possible’’). This is is not good enough as my order was for a birthday cake and I specified a delivery date. It is the 24th today and nothing has arrived - and as the moment has passed the cake would not be meaningful - I have sadly requested a refund as really wanted the lovely cake shown on the website and did not get it and had to battle for even a sentence of information to let me know what was happening. Very very disappointed. Looks like some customer’s do receive their cake as promised but beware, not all do!
Response Text:
It is clearly stated online that at the moment due to the current pandemic we can not GUARANTEE a delivery date, No courier in the UK can do this at these times. We do not let the customer order from us until they acknowledge this, All cakes last 7 days and are packed securely to ensure they are perfect when received. Apologies.

Thanks

Review Text: Totally delighted with the delicious chocolate rainbow cake I ordered for my daughters birthday. To see my daughters face light up when she saw the cake was magical as lockdown prevents us from being together and the sparkling candles a hit. Great service, prompt delivery. I would definitely recommend for in my daughters words ‘what a thoughtful gift’......and it tastes delicious!

Really impressed. We wanted something special for a lockdown birthday but with fairly short notice so my daughter chose the cookie dough cheesecake. We have yet to try it but it looks fantastic! We ordered a cake for her twin sister from another company and you could see the difference. This was so well packaged--it came in perfect condition whereas the other cake had slid around. Arrived on the requested date which is impressive given all the delays at the moment. Highly recommend!

ORDER EXPERIENCE
Ordered twice in 10 days for 2 friends. I would take one star off for a minor gripe that will go into later but the speed of the response to my query was satisfactory and can be overcome. What's important is the product was delivered timely, efficiently and intact.

Opted for the Brownie Selection box for 2 friends - some lockdown cheer and we can't see them. Nice surprise.

Received on the designated dates - unfortunately no note was included; recipients were perplexed as to who and why brownies are delivered to them! One was a better sleuth than the other :)

One recipient said no dry ice or foam padding, but product intact in box - this was how the product is said to be packaged under delivery.
Mentioning as the person gifting will not necessarily know how the product presents unless friend/ receiver tells the person gifting!

Emailed Desserts Delivered and they were great at responding and explained they don't normally include the invoice- great as I didn't want that; "not classy" when a gift but I did want the note :(

INVOICE
"Our products never come with an invoice apart from an email to the purchaser, Like you said as a gift most people do not want the recipient aware of the price paid for the product. "
NOTES
The reply went on to say the notes are for the company internally. That's fine - there's a solution. If needed we can purchase from their menu under "Extras" and choose "personalised notes" - just looked, it is £4 for this service; high quality paper + envelope.
In my book, perhaps I am being mean, I would only pay this for a "note" if a birthday or annniversary.

Especially as we are already paying for the product and delivery. It makes it almost £25 for 6 Brownies if we selected the "Extra" for the tailored print out on high quality paper and envelope!

MINOR GRIPE
No note - for the price + delivery, a standard note options at no charge should be available for customers like myself who is not purchasing for their own consumption.

OVERALL
I don't fault the product or the speed of response from the company to the question- therefore will give 4/5 as this is a business and it's only fair as I for one look on TrustPilot before I purchase - if the company have reviews here.

Happy ordering and don't let our minor gripe put you off. At least it is now clear.

* We were told most of their customers include the note option - that's fancy paper and envelope - unfortunately the scrooge in me can't bring myself to part with £4 for the privilege - may as well have my friends sleuth. I am obviously not "most".

UPDATE: TRUST PILOT REVIEWS
Just read verified positive and negatives reviews for Desserts Delivered Bakery; comforting that others felt that tone was amiss when querying!
Perhaps, I am being sensitive but this was part of the response in my email from sales manager:

"This is available on the extras section and is included in almost every order we take, Apologies that this was not made clear or you failed to spot this on the website",

Aim of my review is not to cast doubt on the products but more an experience from the "gifter" as opposed to "recipient" ,- I doubt the receivers of the gift will look on the website unless they wish to purchase or like me, the friend chose to.tell me.
I would have been horrified if they were too embarrassed to say the present was horrid.

I would urge people to read, the good, the bad and the ugly - then decide.
Having read a range now, I'm slightly put off and not sure I would have ordered, had I spent more time reading the reviews. Especially as it's a happy gift ??.

24/01/21 - just received message from TrustPilot asking for more information from dessertsdeliveredbakery. I am actually not looking for a response as had one when I enquired and I even explained what led to my purchase with them as a company; wish for peace of mind when purchasing - both positive and negative experiences.


I am leaving my review up - not looking for a refund or anything - just voicing my experience which was overall good but will reduce the stars if I feel badgered for voicing an opinion. Thank you Trust Pilot.

14/02/21
Now reduced to 3 stars from 4. Having read more recent reviews, I would be amiss if I mislead anyone into thinking I would recommend or order again.

Having been on other sites, Trustpilot often flags up cos who try and have reviewers remove negative feedback. This company did this with reviewers - wondering why there isn't a pop up...

Orders: #61752 #60912 - proof of orders and genuine customer.
Response Text: Thanks for the reviews, we are glad to hear everyones opinions and pride ourselves in having a very high rating :)

Review Title: A 5 star cake with 5 star service
Review Text: Ordered the Biscoff cake on Sunday 17th to be delivered on Tuesday 19th and I can’t fault anything about my order. Speedy delivery, friendly courier service upon delivery and the cake was just incredible. Looked and tasted amazing and it went down a storm with others. I must admit I was a bit skeptical ordering from somewhere last minute but I would certainly recommend DDB and I will most definitely will be back in the near future!

Not used this company before but found it last minute. Ordering was very easy and product was delivered on the chosen day as promised. Haven’t seen the brownies myself but my friend said they were epic! Really great service and reasonably priced. Thanks so much.

I ordered a chocolate rainbow cake for my husband's birthday and it did not disappoint. My order was delivered the next working day, well packaged and chilled, and tasted delicious.
Thanks for helping to make a lockdown birthday a bit better!

Review Title: I was amazed when I received the cake
Review Text: I was amazed when I received the cake, it was nicely packaged and it looked exactly like the picture on the website. I honestly thought my brithday wouldn't be great as it's in lockdown but this cake has made my day even though my brithday isn't till Sunday! I would definitely recommend you to friends and family especially because it tastes amazing and it arrived on my specified day. Thank you so much to you and and your staff  for making my brithday special. Ayesha xxx

Review Title: Bit disappointed that the picture on…
Review Text:
Bit disappointed that the picture on the website made the cake look much nicer than it actually was so be prepared that the cake may not look the same.
Also disappointed that the company didn’t acknowledge my email when I complained.
If you want a cake quick you get one, but you do pay £7.99 for the privilege! Nice enough cake but just a bit underwhelming for an 18th
Response Text:
We have not received any emails regarding this complaint and find it very strange that you have left not a customer name.
Our cakes look identical to our photos please see our customer photos on social media platforms.

Review Text: Absolutely brilliant, I booked a cake on the Saturday and got it delivered on the Tuesday 12th January 2021 totally on time and excellently packaged. The cake looked fantastic, it was the white chocolate cake and was beautiful it really was, made for a great birthday. Seriously get a cake they are the best.

Ordered a cake for a birthday at 1.30pm on Wednesday and it arrived the next day by 9am. The delivery service was brilliant with APC. The cake arrived well packed and in perfect condition. I will definitely be ordering cake from Desserts Delivered Bakery again. Thank you :)

Absolutely fantastic company, people are lovely, friendly and helpful, it was such a pleasure to do business and so easy from start to finish. The cake was for our daughters 9th Birthday and it's absolutely delicious and we all loved it. Would definitely recommend and will for sure be using Desserts Delivered Bakery again. Well done to Everyone.

Review Title: Excellent service.  Would not hesitate to recommend.
Review Text: Excellent.  Delivered on the correct day.  I had a query and Customer services were quick to reply and give me the confirmation I required.  Recipient of the cake was very please.  Liked that the delivery people gave updated from the day before delivery and on the day gave a time slot which was adhered too.  A very good experience.

I ordered a birthday cake from this company and the service was amazing. My sister is living away from her family at university so I wanted to make sure she had something special for her birthday. The company responded really quickly when I contacted them on Instagram and were so accommodating. I was finding it so difficult to find a company to deliver a cake on the right day but it was no problem for this company and they delivered the cake the next day on a Saturday night. My sister adored the cake and was so suprised when it arrived on Saturday evening. Thank you so much for all your help.

Great cake, my teenage daughter loved it. I was worried about the delivery, but needn't have been. Beautifully packed and it arrived on time and really well protected. I will definitely use these guys again.

Beautiful cake, amazing taste, easy to order and on time delivery. Money well spent.
I have ordered Rainbow cake for the recent birthday in Lockdown. It has most definately lifted the spirit, brightened the mood and filled us up.
Thank you Dessert Delivered Bakery for this deliscious cake. Compliments to the Baker and thank you to delivery company for keeping us informed about the delivery via emails.
I shall be buying for special occasions in the future or just as a treat. People with a sweet tooth should be delighted after trying your cake.

My husband ordered me the biscoff cake for my birthday which is two days after Christmas (a very difficult time to get a nice birthday cake). It looked amazing, especially considering it was posted, and it tasted incredible. I was also impressed how long it stayed fresh. Thanks so much Desserts Delivered, we didn’t waste a crumb ????

Review Title: We got the deluxe chocolate hazelnut…
Review Text: We got the deluxe chocolate hazelnut wafer cake and it was amazing! We definitely had the first slice without being able to work and it’s the gift that just keeps on giving. Who cares about lockdown when you have these delivered to your door?!

It felt like such a risk , ordering a cake for my wife's birthday online. And frozen as well! But did I need to worry? Nope. This place is outstanding. The customer service was perfect and the chocolate orange cake, was genuinely unbelievable.  I will be using these guys again without doubt. Well done desserts delivered,  top marks.

Review Title: Great speedy service and lovely cake
Review Text: Great speedy service and lovely cake. Will definitely be ordering again

Review Title: Ordered a Biscoff cake on Tuesday which…
Review Text:
Ordered a Biscoff cake on Tuesday which arrived on Wednesday, very well packaged and beautifully presented inside.
The cake looks amazing and I am sure my son will be overjoyed once we present it.
Thank you for the great service!

Review Title: Probably the best cake I’ve had
Review Text: I ordered the biscoff cake for my husbands 40th birthday. I had to change delivery at the last moment due to the change to the Christmas rules and I was worried it wouldn’t arrive in time or to my home address. It arrived on time, to the right address and packaged wonderfully. It was so well protected and was perfect inside. The cake arrived on Christmas Eve, still frozen and we had the cake on 27th. It was perfect. Probably the best cake I’ve ever eaten. I was so pleased with it, my husband and son loved it. I will definitely be buying from here again. Thank you so much!

Never again!
I bought a Rainbow Cake for my wife's birthday, at about 1am on Friday 11th December and paid the delivery charge and the extra charge (which are notified only at checkout) for delivery on Saturday 12th December. The total was £47.75, Order No. 57615. Based on the claim on their website, this should have been delivered within 24 hours, or by 2pm on Saturday the 12th December.
It didn't arrive!
I emailed them and straight away got this response from the Operation s Manager.
"Hi Scott,
Deepest apologies regarding this, we paid DHL £13 to have this delivered today, We will email them but you can also contact them on 02476 937770 quoting: 41776040003411
It does clearly state on two occasions as well as our terms and conditions you legally accepted that due to the current pancdemic and medical supplies being priority there are some slight delays.
Apologies regarding this"

I've never come across a supplier quoting terms and conditions of sale as an apology! Very strange.

The cake eventually arrived at about 5.00pm on Monday 14th and I refused delivery based on the fact it was 2 days late, it had defrosted and wasn't, in my view, fit for consumption..
Since then I was offered a 50% refund which I declined.
The case has now been claimed on PayPal, where a member of their staff stated that I had taken delivery of the cake and eaten it! I asked him for a proof of delivery which he ignored and can't provide, but he has said that if I return the cake he will give a full refund. I'm not sure how I can return it when I never took delivery of it.
No doubt, just as he does on just about every poor review, they will take no responsibility for poor customer service, respond that he can prove the cake was delivered, that it was still edible for 6 days, and find some way to blame me for the cake not turning up on time and not accepting delivery.
I understand that carriers don't always turn up on time, and if he had apologised straight away (on the Sunday), advised that the cake was still edible, offered a part refund, and confirmed when it would be delivered, I probably would have accepted that, but the fact he immediately quoted terms and conditions of sale, left me shaking my head.
This company quite clearly doesn't have a clue about customer service, and their attitude and responses to what is a perfectly legitimate complaint, just begs for a review like this.
Good luck if you do order from this company. Just remember that if your order doesn't turn up on time, it's probably your fault!!

Update 2/1/21- I received this email from Trustpilot yesterday "Desserts Delivered Bakery has flagged your review because they don't believe you've had a genuine experience with them." I sent Trustpilot the documentation they required, and you will see at the top left of my review that they have "verified" my review.
My review was based not just on the fact that the cake was delivered 2 days late, or that it was completely defrosted and in my opinion not fit for consumption, but on the way they reacted to my complaint. To quote terms and conditions when you get something wrong is not a customer friendly approach in my opinion, and now to argue that "I didn't have a genuine experience with them", is bizarre.
Strange company in my opinion and not one I'll ever order from again! Good luck if you do!
Response Text: We are currently experiencing a global pandemic, some items are slightly delayed. Apologies we are trying as hard as we can in a tough time and couriers are trying as hard as possible to get items delivered on a chosen date, If it does not arrive you are always entitled to a full refund, if you take delivery for the item you must return it in order to receive a full refund, Please email our customer service time and i am sure they will be happy to resolve this, with a complimentary free cake.  Thanks

Review Title: I ordered the cake 6 days before…
Review Text:
I ordered the cake 6 days before Christmas and it arrived on time on the date I specified which was brilliant.
The cake itself was to die for, absolutely delicious, the whole and family approve. I will dey be ordered off you guys again thanks so much 10/10.

Avoid at all costs.

Ordered a cheesecake on 6th December for delivery on the 23rd December. Ordered arrived on the day and it was a completely different cheesecake (Ordered a Ferrero Rocher and received an Oreo one). Of course mistakes happen but what is not a mistake is the baffling, disgusting and most unprofessional customer service I have ever come across.
Upon emailing straight after receiving the cake I had an email straight away to state they tried calling me (no missed calls at all showing suspiciously in the last few months) and that was it. I responded that this was unacceptable and was informed if I wanted a refund I have to send back the product myself. I then informed them that this was their mistake and the cost of me sending the item back would be almost the same price of the actual refund itself. I was emailed a response "we tried calling and it's in the terms" I said I would happily accept this if he can prove they had tried calling me and where exactly it stated in the terms if they send an incorrect item the customer is expected to send back the item at their own expense for a refund... Well I haven't received a response since and they had been replying to me instantly until this point.

I thought I'd check online for any help and stumbled across Trustpilots reviews only to see I am not the only one having issues with this horrendous service for a mistake on their part. It looks like they will try at any means to get any bad reviews taken down by commenting on reviews to state the customer is lying or they were never a customer to start with. Luckily I have proof of every email send by them and my order confirmation and photos from delivery to back up everything I have stated in this review if they even attempt to get this taken down. The actual issue of the wrong cheesecake had not bothered me this much but I refuse to let any company treat customers this poorly and unprofessional as this.

All I can advise anyone is proceed with caution when ordering on a customer service point of view as if you experience any issues you will not get any help in the matter.

UPDATE 26/12/20 - First reply on this review stated they had contacted me by email for a full refund but I had not responded. This was a complete lie on there part they had not responded to my previous email from the 23rd, and what turned up 20 minutes later after their first comment below? Their reply to my email which just stated the terms of the refund but just confirmed my problem from the original review. Sadly they have continued the lies stating in their edited comment below they sent me a more expensive replacement. But both items are £30 on their website. They also state below a note was attached and a free item. Again sadly this is a complete lie no other item came with the delivery (happy to prove with photos from delivery) and I have apparently declined a refund but have not even had the chance to reply to there email from 20 minutes ago so I'm not sure where they got that idea from. (Although sadly I don't see it viable if they are making me pay to send the wrong item back to them to pursue a refund I will have to give up on this idea and will in the future respond to them to inform this). However if they continue to lie anymore about this situation I will be taking this matter further as I have every email and photo to provide evidence on everything I have stated in this review. As already stated, the actual refund and incorrect dessert are not the issue but the principle of being treated so poorly and unprofessionally as a customer is my issue here and the passive aggressive comments they have left below will hopefully show any future potential customers to stay away.
Response Text: We have many customers who love our products and provide an excellent customer service as well as the best cakes in the UK, we have worked very hard in this pandemic to provide every customer the service they deserve, We tried to contact you regard a missing cake, you did not answer the call so a more expensive replacement was sent. We even sent you a free item for the inconvenience as we do with all orders we can not get a hold of as well as a note explaining the situation. We have offered a refund which you declined. The matter is now being investigated by trust pilot. We encourage you to take this further as we have not lied about anything, In the meanwhile feel free to read our recent reviews with our very happy customers who have received our beautiful creations! Merry Christmas!!

Review Title: Thank you for such amazing cakes!
Review Text: Ordered two cakes for birthday celebrations which we were to enjoy with family members on Christmas day but unfortunately due to the Tier 4 restrictions I had to cancel my order.  Tony @ Deserts was very helpful and refunded my order straight away.  Much to my surprise we received two cakes today and when I contacted Tony he kindly sent them to cheer us up.  So very kind and thoughtful!  With all the craziness going on and not being able to see family at Christmas this was such a kind gesture which really cheered us up!We will definitely be enjoying the cakes !  Thank you so much Tony and team!I have ordered from deserts before and the cakes have always been delicious!  They are well packaged for transportation and enjoyed by all!Thank you again Deserts :0)
Ordered a Cake from here for my daughter's birthday. It was so beautiful and such an easy process, it came out exactly how I expected and was delivered just on time

Review Title: Beautiful, scrumptious cake delivered perfectly on time
Review Text:
I am really impressed by this company and APC (delivery company). Ordered a cake on Sunday night to be delivered Tuesday. Got an email to say the cake was complete on Monday and then multiple emails from the delivery company updating the journey of the cake. It arrived at 1.30pm on Tuesday by a friendly driver who passed the box over with care.

I ordered the Deluxe Chocolate Hazlenut Truffle Cake. It was very well packaged and easy to take out of the box. The cake was beautiful to look at and tasted fresh, moist and indulgent. The only thing I thought could be improved, is that the Ferroro Rochers weren't as crispy due to being kept at low temperature (obviously to preserve the cake). I'm not sure what could be done, maybe leave them in the foil/case so that moisture doesn't get to them and leave a little note explaining why? But honestly, other than that, the cake was a big hit and I'm looking forward to making more purchases in the future. Keep it up guys ??

Beautiful Christmas cake,delivered perfectly boxed and presented.
Their customer service was first class and couldn't of been more helpful.
Thank you Tony and staff will certainly order from you in future.The array of cakes and attention to detail is impeccable.

Review Title: The cake was delivered on time and was…
Review Text: The cake was delivered on time and was absolutely scrumptious as good as it looked online infact better! packed impeccably arrived in perfect condition. I indeed will  order from this bakery again my daughters are  insisting I do as they say it’s the best cake they ever tasted and I agree?? Thank you.
Turned up exactly on time, boxed perfectly and discreetly and the cake itself was delicious! Thank you!

Ordered the chocolate orange cake for my boyfriends 40th birthday and I must say this is honestly one of the best cakes I have ever tasted ??. Great service, well packaged, well presented and absolutely delicious.
Well packed and presented, delicious Brownies well done.

I pre-ordered a cake at the start of November (order ref #54537) paid via PayPal
A Red Velvet cake to be delivered on the 24th November for my wife’s birthday.
I had an email to state order was received,Had another email to say cake had been dispatched, had a email from A.P.C regarding delivery time and made sure someone was in to receive the cake.
Had an email/text from A.P.C saying my parcel had been delivered.came home and checked the cake and much to my surprise had a note saying,

Hi,
We have tried to call you as we are missing the cake you ordered.we did not get an answer so have replaced it with another.
Apologies for the inconvenience,
Thanks.

Firstly I’ve had no missed calls from desserts delivered and No message left .
I should have been sent an email on the day of dispatch as they say these cakes are made to order on the point of ordering in the first place ?
Sadly no message , email or missed call and I’ve checked my missed calls log on phone and have no missed calls from the dessert delivered bakery, missed call log goes back to October.
So this comment on the note left with the cake I never order which is made to order? Is an out right lie.
If I had been contacted I would have cancelled my order which had been paid for 22 days prior to date needed.
I contacted Desserts delivered bakery via there contact page to tell them no one had called me and that my wife won’t eat this cake,To have a reply of we did call you ?
As they then said they sent me out the one I received instead,If their cakes are made to order who’s cake did I get ,or was it just one that was lying around .
Clearly they are not made to order as these cakes come frozen so must be made in batches and not to individual requirements as mentioned on ones the web page.
This would have been blatantly obvious they didn’t have the Red Velvet in the empty space in the freezer where they normally sit ?.
I’ve had quite a rude exchange of emails from the operations director.who does not care one bit and after saying they don’t organise collections it’s now been left where I will have to pay to send the cake back for a refund which is outrageous in its own right as I never ordered this cake I received.

Even in the face of a pandemic which we are going through,This is not the way to run a business.

Just taking peoples money 22 days in advance and then sending out whatever you feel like !
In the end I had to go to Sainsbury to buy a run of the mill cake which I should have just done in the first place.

Also after writing this review I’ve received an email saying if I take it down I can have a refund.
It’s the principle of being lied too that annoyed me the most .
Buyers beware waste of time .
Response Text: As explained online some items are slightly delayed due to the current pandemic, This is clearly explained online, Thanks

TOTALLY RECOMMEND!!!

My experience with Desserts Delivered was mixed.  I ordered a biscoff cake which arrived on time and was mostly intact but all of the biscuits on the top were broken and misplaced. I realise that the design of the cake uses some broken ones, but they were all broken.  The cake however tasted nice and my daughter was very happy with it. The problem I had was when trying to get a response to questions I asked.  I sent three emails requesting information and not one response was received which is terrible customer services.  They might be better at responding to those who have not yet paid, but I certainly got no response. So despite the cake being ok I’m not sure that I would use them again?
Response Text: Apologies regarding this, we have not received any emails from you but a member of our team has been trying to find your order. Please email: Sales@dessertsdeliveredbakery.co.uk so we can offer some refund.  Thanks

Review Title: I have had a horrible experience with…
Review Text:
I have had a horrible experience with dessert bakery and they have now blocked me on Instagram to stop other people having the same poor experience. I contacted them via Instagram on the 30/09/20 asking if they could make me the Lindt cheese cake in milk chocolate which the reply was yes please order online which I did I also wrote in the notes box please make in milk chocolate. I did not here from them until the cheesecake arrived today in white chocolate I contacted them straight away and explained wrong order to which I received horrible abuse and completely refused to help in any way they offered to take it back at my expense I have been sent laughing emoji when I said how disappointed my 11 year old daughter will be extremely upset and more so at the lack of unprofessional staff and when you complain block your fair comments never order from them again.

Dessert bakery also tried to claim I was not a customer till I verified my details on Trustpilot I have photographed proof I asked dessert bakery for a milk chocolate Lindt cake and they told me to order online which I did and wrote in notes horrible customer service.
Response Text: Unfortunately we do not sell the chocolate cake and can not change cakes once you have paid and order them for cakes we do not or have not even sold. Anything you are to your basket and purchase at checkout is what you will receive like any other website. Apologies you thought otherwise but nothing on our website  indicates that you can add one of our cakes to your basket and change the design or flavour. This has never been an option unfortunately. Thanks

Review Text: Mix up with the delivery however clear communication with the operations manger throughout. When the cake did arrive it was lovely! Company were very sympathetic to missed delivery date and did everything they could to rectify. Would order from them again, cake was well packaged and arrived in one piece, not much of it left now mind :p!
My cake arrived on time and in perfect condition. It tasted incredible and was decorated fantastic ??.  We will be definitely ordering again. Well done x

Cannot praise this company enough, the service to the delivery was just perfect. And the cake was beutiful and tasty. Would definitely recommend to anybody thinking about ordering a cake for any occasion. ??

Ordered the Biscoff cake. Service and delivery all as planned although a £5 Saturday delivery charge was added on sneaky at the end, even though the usual 2 day delivery would have made it a Saturday anyway. This made the delivery £13.75 which by anybody’s standards is pretty ridiculous.
Cake was nice, not a Biscoff cake so much as a normal sponge with chocolate & lotus biscuits on top which were a bit soggy and old tasting. The cake was unbearably sweet and leaves you with a wrinkly sugar burned mouth and kind of sick feeling. That was just a normal/small slice of cake. All in all the cake worked out at £48.75 and nobody in my house wants a second slice. Waste of money.

ETA
Tony from desserts delivered contacted us offering a full refund in exchange for removing this review. He said he was shocked that we had been unhappy. After looking back at the other 1 and 2 star reviews I realised that this happens any time he gets a bad review and people remove them. Honestly I’m glad I found out as I could not figure out how this company had 4.6/5 reviews, now it makes sense. In light of this I refused the refund and wanted to keep my review posted. He got it taken down by trustpilot accusing me of never being a customer, but after being verified by them it has now been reposted. These are not made to order cakes, they are clearly factory made hence the reason you can not make ANY changes to them. Tony’s customer service and quite baffling emails waffling on about trading standards and suing the company were truly bizarre.
Response Text: Nothing “sneaky” here.  We clearly advertise that Saturday delivery is £5 extra at checkout. Any other day is a standard delivery charge. Our biscoff cake is one of our top sellers and is very popular with many repeat customers. Thanks

Review Text: The cake was well presented, delivered timely and was absolutely delicious. Made my son's birthday extra special. Thank you.

Review Title: Awful Customer Service DO NOT USE
Review Text:
My wife ordered a cake for our friends birthday, and the cake never arrived on time. Despite paying £7.99 for nominated day delivery and an extra £5 for the date being a Saturday. Things happen so naturally my wife requested a refund as the cake never showed up on time, as we had to buy another. Communication was poor and they initially refused a refund. Only when a review was placed on Trustpilot did they fully engage; arguing the cake had been delivered and offering a refund only if the review was taken down. The company was blatantly lying, as a delivery man showed up 3 days later with the cake. Absolutely awful customer service, do not use!!!

03/09/20
In response to the company’s reply below, I have photographic evidence with time stamp proving delivery was several days late. Shocking service

14/09/20

The company is now threatening my wife with legal action based on grounds of Slander. Not sure they understand the meaning of Slander. However we wouldn’t of gone to all this trouble if they simply refunded the money.

Response Text: Not only is this review a complete. lie but is not even from a valid order. We send the cakes using DRY ICE, DRY ICE is not a liquid it is CO2 to keep perishable goods cool during transit to ensure quality. It is impossible for co2 to leak water when there is no water in!!

Review Title: Amazing cakes, delivery service let it down.
Review Text: I’d requested for a surprise birthday cake to be delivered on a specific day for my fiancée .  A day earlier than requested, whilst at work I received a call/voicemail message stating that they’d been to my house to try and deliver the cake. (Very lucky my fiancée wasn’t in).   I explained that it was the following day I had requested delivery of the cake and they said they would bring it back on the correct day between 6-7pm. I explained that was fine but that I had to leave at 20 past 7.    7pm came and went and no sign of the cake.  Called the store and was told the driver was on the way, however by 20 past it had still not arrived and I had to leave.  On returning home later that evening I called the store to let them know they could deliver anytime from then on, and an hour or so later the cake arrived. The cakes are amazing here, it’s just a shame the delivery process let it down.
Response Text: Apologies we will pass this on to our courier

Review Title: Ordered the Brownie Treat Box for my…
Review Text:
Ordered the Brownie Treat Box for my sons birthday. I normally bake homemade but wanted something more special with it being his birthday. When they eventually arrived you could tell just by looking at them they were nothing more than normal brownies that had been put in the freezer ... We eat half of one & the rest went in the bin ... Were that dry & stodgy totally not edible. Felt totally let down & £20 just ended in the bin! What a waste! Don’t know how you can get away with selling such horrible products at these prices! Birthday Treat Disaster! ... Emailed several times now & not one response! Full refund should be given! Expecting this review to go straight in the clouds & again no response!

Update ... After been promised a ‘full refund’ in response to my review this was not so ... ‘Tony’ asked me to delete my review & then a refund would be given ... I replied that I’d only take my review down once payment was received in full ‘as promised’ ... Absolutely disgusted with this companies behaviour & attitude. Never come across such appalling customer service! ... Promise a full refund on a review reply publicly only to be given an ultimatum & no intentions of actually paying it any how!!!

As you know you didn’t ask for the brownies back as I’d already put them in the bin un eaten & said so ... They were in edible! You’ve just emailed me saying‘You’re going to process a full refund AND give me 50% off any of your products’!!! ... Minutes later your replying full of lies on this platform! ... I can prove everything by all email correspondence! ... Could of been settled by a full refund as repeatedly promised! ... Review Title: I would have given it zero!!!
Review Text:
I would have given it zero!!!

Delivery driver lost my parcel when he left it at a strangers address, I then had to knock on a number of doors and eventually found it.

Contacted the courier company and made a complaint and also contacted DESERTS DELIVERED during the process of my parcel going missing and recieved an email, which proceeded to tell me that it had nothing to do with them and they were located in a different city and I must speak with the courier company myself.

At the time, I explained that I did but needed their help as well since this is the courier service they used to deliver their goods but again the same operator who seemed to be the only person manning the emails would not help.

We went back and fourth and the last email response proceeded to imply that regardless of my custom they had a great order value.

As you are aware I managed to locate my parcel myself but with everything going on with covid 19 you can understand that having a parcel with food left at a strangers property, is very frightening.

I urge you to think carefully when ordering from this company and if you do and your parcel goes missing they will not help or take any accountability regarding the matter and it would mean losing all your money.

Also although the cake looked very pleasing to the eye when I eventually ate it, it was dry, however my son liked it but definitely not worth the money and I WOULD NOT BUY FROM THIS COMPANY AGAIN!!

P.S This review was edited as my review was reported but if you have repeat orders like you say then why care about one persons views? Take from that as you will...

Buy at your own risk!

Very disappointed customer.
Response Text: Please email us on sales@dessertsdeliveredbakery.co.uk

I ordered the truffle Ferrero rocher cake as it looked classy, the Nutella cake with the breakfast bar and jars on didnt really impress me as much. Response Text: Hi Maria, due to the current pandemic last week we struggled to get certain ingredients. A small amount of customers cakes were out of stock and our team called you and other customers well in advance to arrange a different flavour. Our cakes are very popular and you were given the choice to refund or choose an alternative which you did. Any problems pls email us and we will resolve. As you can see by our reviews we have very high quality products and are shocked to see your review

such a shame you deliver via APC as driver tipped it over to carry - driver didnt care and said it had been kicked around this morning before he got it - as it cost £7.99 for delivery this kinda sucks but not your companys fault.

Review Title: Delicious cake and delivered on day…

We ordered a cake and were told it would be sent out frozen and we would receive a link to track our order. We required it to be frozen as we were going to defrost for a party the following weekend and this was the only day we could accept a delivery as my wife and i are both key workers and working 6 days a week.We didnt receive any tracking (which is forgiveable given the current climate) but the cake was delivered at room temperature. I contacted the office to enquire why it was not delivered frozen and was told "all our cakes are sent out frozen". Completely dismissive of the fact that our cake was not sent frozen it was chilled meaning we had no idea whether we could freeze it for the event or not. I also asked about allergen information for the product as the allergen leaflet included with our order didnt list that particular cake. Again this request was ignored.
Shoddy customer service and a mediocre product. Will look to use local bakers next time as this really was a very poor experience.
Response Text: Hi David, I think your a little confused here bless you. As advised on our website all of our cakes are sent out frozen. Not “chilled” but frozen. They defrost in transit and when you receive are starting to defrost. All of the cakes are good for 7 days as explained online as well as the delivery process. The fact that you did not read this properly is not our fault. All allergens are clearly listed online and in the small booklet provided. In future please read before your a review a business and maybe best not to slander when we have done everything that was asked: thanks

Review Title: The delivery box gave away the surprise! :(

Would have been fine if it just said cake, but it has the full description so it ruined the surprise! I realise there is nothing the company can do now, but I would have appreciated the logic used when buying any gifts etc, have an option to be discreet.

After reply from company:
It wasn't a logo. It was a description of the cake I brought. I wanted to surprise my partner with a special cake. The box actually said on it "Chocolate rainbow cake" which obviously gives away the surprise.

Hopefully this review is a warning to others at what to expect from this company.
Response Text: Hi all of our packaging has our logo on and this is something we will never change, We have never heard such a ridiculous complaint and had us chuckling in the office, Maybe next time tell us if you do not want branding on an order and a receipt?

Review Text: The cake is lovely and delivery was on time. The only thing was that I hadn't realised it was a cake that had been frozen and defrosted partly during transit (maybe it does say and I missed it). Some people cannot eat frozen cake as the starch molecules change so I do think that this should be flagged up.
Response Text: It is clearly stated online that the cakes are sent frozen, even if they defrost in transit they are good for 7 days, there is no problems with any changes and never has been

We will definitely recommend Desserts Delivered to friends/family!

Review Title: Cake looked great and tasted even…
Review Text:
Cake looked great and tasted even better yet my gripe would be to have delivery notification systems in place ie sms if running late, tracking system on your web page
Cake was being delivered on the actual birthday and was running late and yet we could not find out was was going on except to have to email the company. No phone number just email
Cake was finally delivered at around 4pm. Driver just rang the bell, dumped it by the front door and went off back to his van. Didn't wait nothing.
Except for the cake rest of the service was very poor and given how much you charge for delivery I'd say it needs to improve.
Response Text: We use Two of the most popular couriers in the uk.

Review Text: I ordered the Cookies & Cream cake and I loved it! The cake arrived with some pretty optimal packaging that kept it cool during transit and once it was defrosted it looked and tasted just like a freshly-made one. The cream was a bit too sweet for my taste but overall I can't complain at all.

The cake was excellent, really tasty and moist, and it kept well once cut. However, it was small for the price (this wasn’t a surprise as the site is clear on size, but is worth noting). Also, the amount of packaging is quite something. I accept that shipping a cake safely must be a challenge, but surely there’s a better solution than an enormous polystyrene box?
Response Text: Sorry we have done much research and in order for our beautiful cakes to be delivered safely our packaging is a must we do not just do it for the fun of it. Thanks

Review Title: Thanks for the lovely cakes it was…
Review Text: Thanks for the lovely cakes it was second time I ordered cake. First cake was good exactly what I ordered but the second time they didn’t have what I wanted and sent an alternative with an apology note... as it’s good customer service I wouldn’t take a star off.
Brilliant service. Lovely cake. Thank you

Would definately recommend.

I was contacted the day or two after ordering my cake that it was out of stock so had to pick a different one. Was quite happy with it. However - and I realise this is the couriers fault - it arrived turned upside down as he didn’t follow the this way up instructions! Luckily the cake was very cold and didn’t get smashed.
Got a cake for my sister’s birthday as I couldn’t see her due to lockdown - very prompt delivery and my sister said the cake was delicious! All round very impressive. Thank you!

Review Title: Stunning cake, couldn’t get any better

The cake was carefully decorated and the sponge tastes fresh and not too heavy considering the hazelnut filling. I’m glad I found this bakery online as my local bakery closed for lockdown, but I will definitely buy from here again in the future. All the best and thank you so much, perfect for my daughter’s 18th birthday!

Review Title: Delivery was on time and the birthday…

Review Title: Let down, rude staff, blaming Covid for no refunds in a timely manner
Review Text:
Sent tracking number for delivery of the ordered cake, for my mother’s 60th birthday, then the very next day called to cancel the order as they have no stock. Very rude on phone, suggested refunds only available via emailing or writing in, and will take some time ‘cause of Covid thing. Poor, best avoided.
It’s also quite clear that any critical review of this company is challenged by them, denying it is them, and when proof is sent, you get the below added as by way of an excuse, the refund took 21 days, the apology, yet to arrive. Poor customer service.
Response Text: Covid 19 was a very tough time for us, we had a massive increase in orders and ran out of some stock. This happens in this pandemic for popular businesses. We refunded in full. Thanks

Review Title: Tastes like it was baked and hour ago 7 days on !!!
Review Text: Amazing cake!! Ordered 3 days early as recommended by website due to covid. Arrived on that day dispite them saying there may be delays . Speedy delivery , packaged great and still cold when delivered . The cake tastes amazing so moist and fresh . They say cake stays fresh for 7 days !! I’m still enjoying the day 10 days on and still tastes amazing and just as moist !! Great value for money too??
Wow, great packaging and delivered on time!

The delivery was a bit confusing - several notifications were sent suggesting “overnight” delivery was in operation, which seemed odd to Surrey. Then the times given weren’t correct - the delivery was two hours later than the latest time stated. Apart from that, all good , and I would certainly use again!

I've ordered from here twice now and could not be happier with the ease and friendliness of service and with the cakes! The most recent one I ordered to cheer up my parents was delivered the same day! They loved the cake and it did the trick... Thank you desserts delivered, you smashed it again!

Review Title: When i first started buying these cakes…

Its such a shame when you became more popular and the business took of that you out priced the people that put you there- I can buy a decent gift for £45 so who needs cake, Its just not worth it!!

Review Title: Desserts Delivered Bakery 80th Surprise birthday cake
Review Text: I found Desserts Delivered Bakery after doing a google search, as I wanted to send my mother in law a birthday cake, due to covid-19 and isolation restrictions; I did not want her to miss out on having a birthday cake for her 80th. I order her birthday cake late Monday night, it arrive in one piece, thanks to careful packaging on Thursday, much to my mother in laws surprise.  She was so please with her beautiful cake, the only problem she saw was that she could not share it with anyone. Personally not having to share beautiful cake is not a problem in my book.  I would highly recommend Desserts Delivered Bakery to everyone.  To share or not to share is up to you.

Said I would have my refund within 3/4 working days. It’s been two weeks and even sent an email. Had nothing. This is the second time I’ve had to chase for my refund.

Review Text: Just to make it clear ... I returned the cake to deserts delivered un opened , un eaten , I returned this recorded delivery, I have proof they received the cake and cannot understand why this is being investigated??? They know they have the cake which was well sealed in the box ? I am waiting for my refund and would like you to investigate this . Regards Carol Hodkinson........I ordered the rainbow cake costing £35 for a 21st and received a kinder buenno one for a child , I had no phone call, no message left or no email , in the box there was a sheet of paper saying they had tried to contact me Saying they didn’t have ingredients for the cake I ordered and sent me a substitute , which is totally untrue As I received no call, message or email, it took me numerous emails which they ignored, numerous message which they ignored, I eventually got through to them by phoning them which took some time getting through , I explained everything and the woman on the phone was not helpful at all talk about customer care .. she told me I would have to pay for the cake to be returned even though I didn’t ask for this cake and she said I would have to email them and the manager would have to read it to issue a refund, now I did explain to her I had sent numerous emails all day this was Friday 3rd April when I reviewed cake which was still in the box, ... I wrote my letter and put it in the box to send it back on Saturday 4th April recorded delivery , so I had to pay for a  cake to go back which was there fault to sent me the wrong one in the first place , I’ve took photos of the cake, the packing , I printed pieces of paper with handle with care on them so it was better packed than when I got it , as when the delivery driver put it on my wall it was on its side ... I have emailed them today “again “  because they received the cake Monday 6th April 2020... still no reply , I’m hoping to hear from them very soon otherwise I’m taking this to trading standards , I have proof of everything.. waiting for my refund ..Customer  service is very very poor!

Review Text:
Absolutely amazing!! I’m so impressed by this company and the service received. I ordered selected day delivery and was really impressed by the tracking information I received. I could track when my parcel would be arriving and it arrived when it said it would!

The packaging of the cake was extremely secure and the cake arrived frozen and in perfect condition. Now to the good bit.. the taste. Just wow.. honestly the best cake I’ve ever tasted the cake was absolutely delicious! Highly recommend this company - I will definitely be coming back again!

My daughter really loved this cake for her 12th birthday as she is a huge reeces fan.

The cake was really well packaged. Seriously you could leave the cake anywhere and nothing could happen to it, it was that well packaged. I ordered it the day before so it had plenty of time to defrost and also I wouldn't have ro pay the extra weekend delivery charge. I Had the option to have it delivered in a safe place as I'd be at work.

The cake looked small, especially after taking it out of the huge polystyrene box, which has compartments which hold their own box tight so and then even in their box it is then wrapped up but honestly looks can be deceiving. The cake is deep and we had plenty left over.

The cake was so moist and delicious, even my mom who doesn't like sponge loved this cake. Even the left over after a few days stayed moist and delicious. It was honestly the best cake I've ever tasted.

I will definately be ordering again. Hopefully the next cake I order from them will be for Christmas as they've got a couple of really lovely looking Christmas cakes on their website now.

Hi Anne,

1. We ran out of white kit kat and could not get through to you on the phone so replaced with white lion bar.

I googled and googled and came across desserts delivered bakery. They seemed very good at what they do so I checked out their FB page and testimonials and decided to place an order. There was a great choice of cakes to order and they all looked delicious. I plumbed for the deluxe Ferrero Rocher cake and was not disappointed! The cake was extremely well packaged and was immaculate upon opening the box. Although it looks quite small, you can easily get at least 10 good slices out of it and because I’d chosen a rich cake you couldn’t eat too big a piece anyway. My daughter loved it, it looked very posh and was exactly what I wanted for her special day. I wouldn’t hesitate in ordering another cake again. My only small criticism is that the cake board could be a bit stronger but other than that it was a 10/10 experience.

I would highly recommended this company for your cakes,  I'm looking forward to trying the other flavours. Desserts Direct is definitely my go to site for birthday  cakes from now on.

The customer care was and is still arrogant about the product however the delivery was prompt (thank God or else the birthday would have been ruined).
Response Text: Our Red Velvet Cake is a traditional American Red Velvet recipe which has been complimented many times. The Red velvet cake is chocolate? We have never had any complaints of our icing being too sweet. Our cakes are sent and delivered frozen from 1-2 of baking from fresh. We do not understand how it can be more fresh than this.

I got regular email updates with regard dispatch info, and was able to track my order on its delivery day with a tracking code that enabled me to see exactly where the delivery driver was on a map, and how many more stops he had before delivering to me. I would 100% recommend this company to anyone and will be using them again. Superb.

Review Title: Cake did not arrive. Very disappointed.
Review Text:

I have an email from them where they stated they were having issues with their courier when I asked them where my order was. Either way this does not explain their lack of communication (no confirmation emails etc) and being impossible to contact by telephone.

Northants

Cake turned up Wednesday and it was so beaten up it was embarrassing!! All the jammy biscuits on top were broken, the cake had slid off the silver cake board. It had defrosted!!
Not what you expect for £20 and £7.99 for specified delivery date. I’ll stick with a supermarket cake next time. Don’t waste your money or time on this shambles! Clearly not set up for online orders and delivery cakes nationally.

We then ate the cake the next day for a birthday party and it was dry and horrible. Such a shame as the first one was amazing!

Review Title: Absolute awful service and would not…
Review Text:
Absolute awful service and would not recommend. Ordered a cake for my husbands birthday the wrong cake was delivered and the order was incomplete the candles I ordered were also not delivered . I was sent a rainbow cake instead of the Nutella cake. After quite a few rude dismissive emails back from the company I was offered a refund if I paid for the cake to be returned. Which I would of happily done if the fault was my own and not the mistake made by the company. My emails then just got ignored and no refund given. The cake didn’t even get eaten as I was waiting for a response to the last email about next steps and I had to go buy a suitable cake for my husband on top of what I had already spent. Considering cakes are generally for a special occasion I couldn’t rate there customer service and company more poorly specially when the error was made from there side. Don’t make the mistake I did just go buy a cake from a trusted retailer.

Update to their response - a courier company does not pack the incorrect cake and also miss the candles from the order. I also need not deal with them when trying to find a solution. As said a complete waste of money with very bad customer service.
Response Text: THIS REVIEW WAS MADE WHEN WE USED AN OLD COURIER WHO FAILED MANY DELIVERIES WE HAVE NOW CHANGED TO A NEW COURIER WITH A 99.9% SUCESS RATE

Review Text:
Hello, our young Sons Birthday cake was supposed to be delivered on Friday. We placed the order 3 weeks ago with you.

Your courier text on Friday to say they would not be able to deliver and would do so in two working days..

My wife emailed you on Friday to explain that this would mean we’d have no cake for his Birthday and to cancel the delivery.

You told us to contact your courier directly which we explained we could not do.

Your courier did deliver a day late even though we asked you to cancel as the cake was late.

We’ve now been told to return the cake to you at our cost otherwise you won’t issue a refund?!..

I believe that the cost of sending this cake back to you may be more expensive than the £25 fee we initially paid.

We’ve had many emails from Tony and not once has any apology been offered..

I understand that the courier is not under your control and sometimes things just don’t go according to plan even with the best of intentions.

To be told that we have to chase your courier directly & that we cannot have a refund unless we courier the cake back to you at our expense seems ridiculous.

The cake is still sat outside in its box as we had to purchase one elsewhere.

Could I suggest you kindly allow us to put the cake in the bin and issue us with a full refund?

I’m not too sure why you’d even want a stale cake back?

I believe the request to ship the cake back to you is merely designed to put customers off doing so due to the cost involved.

Could you please make good and arrange the refund as requested.

Our customer service experience so far is sadly not what we would have expected.

This was our second order placed with you and we had hoped to place a third on Monday for my Mums Birthday...

Thank you, Steve Cahill.
Response Text: THIS REVIEW WAS MADE WHEN WE USED AN OLD COURIER WHO FAILED MANY DELIVERIES WE HAVE NOW CHANGED TO A NEW COURIER WITH A 99.9% SUCESS RATE

Review Text:
The customer service or should I say 'Tony D's attitude is shocking.
I ordered a birthday cake for my step father which arrived okay - it had white plastic bits in the icing which obviously disappointing not to mention dangerous.
Before I had even noted these issues i had complained via Instagram which was ignored and via email which was replied by the ever so delightful Tony D.
I complained as there was an offer on Instagram for a slice of mini egg came free with ANY weekend orders and the link to dessertsdelivered.co.uk here I placed my order for the cake and input the code into the note section as advised on Instagram .
The extra slice never turned up I complained was told I was wrong as the companies are seperate (funny how I managed to order from the website on the Instagram post ??)
Advised that maybe this should be clarified on future Instagram posts as misleading.
Tony however knows my mind clearly and told me in fact no it's not misleading. Obviously Tony that's why I wasted time writing to your lovely self.
Suggestions for everyone don't use unless you want crap customer service, and your relative to choke on plastic from a disappointingly small and expensive cake.
Surprised they don't make fruitcakes here I reckon they'd be good at them ??
Response Text: THIS REVIEW WAS MADE WHEN WE USED AN OLD COURIER WHO FAILED MANY DELIVERIES WE HAVE NOW CHANGED TO A NEW COURIER WITH A 99.9% SUCESS RATE

Review Text:
Overall, I would recommend that you do not use this company. You may be lucky and have no issues with your cake (which is great) but if you have any issues like I did then do not expect to receive any decent customer service, as you won't get any. See below for my full review...

Having seen Desserts Delivered Bakery on Facebook I decided to order a cake for my partner for her birthday.
I ordered the cake a week in advance but obviously due to the nature of a cake being perishable it was only shipped the day before for next day delivery. Unfortunately the cake did not arrive on the date that I requested but instead arrived the day afterwards. The cakes are sent frozen with dry ice and inside a polystyrene box.
As it did not arrive next-day the cake had defrosted by the time it arrived it was stuck to the packaging inside, compromising the aesthetics of the cake (not the end of the world of course)

However my main fault / complaint is not with the aesthetics of the cake but the inside of the cake and the customer service I then received following my complaint.
The inside of the cake was advertised as being both plain & chocolate sponge but when I cut into it the cake was fully chocolate cake. Due to this I contacted the company who apologised and offered to send me a replacement free of charge (which was brilliant), I responded and said this would be great but only if they could clarify that I would definitely receive the correct cake. I did not get a response to my email but instead they sent the cake out straight away without clarifying
The replacement arrived the next day (which again was great) however it was still the incorrect sponge. I complained again and they apologised and I was informed that the bakers were mixing up two of their cakes.

After this I then asked what was to come of the second cake as it was incorrect and I still had not recieved the cake that I had paid for and ordered. The response was that I could return the cake as long as it was in the same condition that it arrived in. Obviously this was not possible as the issue was with the sponge and not external and I had to cut into it to see this issue. I was then informed that I could not return the cake due to this.

After much back and forth I have now given up with my complaint, the gentleman that I was speaking with (Tony) clearly did not care about the issue I was having and kept referring me to their "legal terms and conditions" rather than actually responding to the questions I was asking / the complaint that I was making.

EDIT: The company’s response does not explain their atrocious customer service.
Response Text: THIS REVIEW WAS MADE WHEN WE USED AN OLD COURIER WHO FAILED MANY DELIVERIES WE HAVE NOW CHANGED TO A NEW COURIER WITH A 99.9% SUCESS RATE

Review Text: These wonderful people are a life line for us. Especially after leaving hospital and being too ill to go out. Honestly I have recommended you far and wide and to all the ladies I was in hospital with as you can buy 1 item or as many as you want. So convenient. The Cookie People cookies are delicious, I have had them in the past, and sent as gifts,which have always been well received! This time I ordered a mixed box with flavours I chose myself, and surprisingly my favourite was the strawberry one with pop tarts on it, it wasn't as overwhelmingly sweet as I thought it was going to be! I really enjoyed it.
My least favourite, which came as a surprise, was the cinnabon one... it was so sweet, that even with my sweet tooth I couldn't manage it. I loved the cinnamonness of it but I couldn't handle the sweetness. I had to leave it. My 2nd or could it be joint favourite with the strawberry? Was the toffee crisp cookie, sweet but I love toffee crisp, I enjoyed that one very much. The Biscoffi one was scoffed very quickly too . Definitely flavours to have again,except sadly for the cinnamon cookie, that's a no im afraid, sadly.

Review Text: The best cookies you’ll ever have!! The cookie people know their dough and it’s amazing!! The whole household rushes to the door to be the one to take the delivery! I don’t know how unfair I’m being as the muffies are simply AMAZING!

I don’t know if I’m used to everything being so easily accessible but waiting 5 days for these to arrive felt a long time!
I think the packaging is perfect but I do also feel the postage is a little pricey for the amount of time I waited for these to arrive.

If you can plan ahead and can afford to wait for their arrival these are a fab bougie gift and or treat!!
