thanks so much for leaving us a review,
we are so glad you like your products and was happy with the packaging

I do feel the 3 star review is a little sad to read :-( especially when you seem to be happy with the products.

we do state on our website when ordering when to expect the delivery giving our customers all the information so they can decide if they are happy to place an order knowing how long delivery will take.

as we are a bakery who bake everything in-house and also we have such high standards with our product quality, making sure our products get to you as fresh as possible means we take your order then we process and arrange the baking schedule so that we can bake and post the order the same day.

we also post every order tracked 24 so that you receive it the day after it was baked meaning that everything is as fresh as we could possibly get it to you.

its so hard as we are often expected to keep up with the huge companies that are sending non food items and we simply couldn't do this whilst making sure our that quality comes first which in our opinion it always should.

I do know some company bake ahead of time so that they can send the items on the same day they was ordered but this means the products are already a day or 2 old before they even get sent to you.

unfortunately cookie have 3-5 days shelf life, so we would rather give the customer all the information on the length of time to expect the order this is no more then 5 working days and not sacrifice the quality you receive.

also the postage cost is actually what we pay to Royal Mail so we don't have very much choice on what we can do here, unless we send on a second class basis but again this affects the quality.

we really have tried to make sure you receive your order in the best condition and to give you a all the information so you would know what to expect.

but thanks so much for choosing to order from us as small business it means a lot and we really value your custom.

also reviews are massive part of us gaining more customers

Toni
Owner

Review Text: I bought a box of 12 for my partner's birthday, after hearing about the biscuits on Rutland and Stamford Sound. Biscuits arrived really quickly, within a couple of days. They look fabulous and come in a smart box. The box fitted through our letter box so it was no problem that we were out when they were delivered. The biscuits taste great, and are definitely best eaten fresh. Because they looked so good we saved a couple, but they were not as tasty a couple of weeks later.
Response Text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review & we are so pleased that you liked them! All orders are baked fresh to ensure that they are as yummy as possible when they arrive. We do advise that the biscuits are best enjoyed within a week (although most people say they are devoured long before that)...they would need to be sealed airtight to last longer than that just so that they remain fresh. We hope that helps for any future orders, we would love to bake for you again!

Review Text: Very late delivery not down to the postal strike, was ordered weeks ago, only just arrived.
Response Text:
We are so saddened to read this & we have reached out to discuss this with you but have not heard back.

If this related to your Christmas pre-order then we can only apologise if the information on our website was not clear & you didn't realise that we wouldn't be shipping Christmas biscuits in November...we always want them to arrive just before a special occasion so that they are as fresh as possible. We upgraded the shipping (at our cost) to a tracked service for many of our Christmas orders & we can see that your order arrived on 16th Dec, in plenty of time before the big day!

If this was another order that has arrived much later than expected, we had no contact from you to let us know of the issue and we would have quickly resolved this for you!

The postal strikes have been on going for many months now & they are sadly causing delays to orders. Delays which are totally out of our control.

Either way, we would always ask that you contact us first before leaving a review, it doesn't seem fair to blame us for something which isn't our fault.

Sending nothing but best wishes & our apologies, The Kitsch Hen Biscuit Team.

Review Text: Wonderful product! My friend was thrilled with the biscuits and it brightened up her day. I sent a question to the company over Instagram and received a very friendly, quick reply. Would highly recommend ??
Response Text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this review! We really appreciate it & we are so pleased that the biscuits were enjoyed by your friend.

Review Text:
Such a fantastic little company. I have both received and sent gifts and can confirm they are both delicious and very welcomed. A unique alternative to flowers and a great selection of messages.
The only reason I deducted a star was purely on timings as there’s no option for a speedy delivery if you need to send them ‘in the moment’. That said my latest order was placed and received within a week!
Recommend without a shadow of doubt ??
Response Text: Thank you so much for the lovely review, we are so pleased you have been both a biscuit receiver and a biscuit sender. As each order is baked fresh before being hand stamped and iced - it is tricky for us to offer a fast turnaround service, however we are always happy to do our best to help with any biscuit emergencies as we know there are times when the biscuity love is best received as soon as possible. We just ask that you drop us an email so that we can check the baking schedule to see what is possible. We hope to send more biscuity treats for you in the future!

Review Title: Appalling customer service from Caroline, the owner
Review Text: Sadly, I've had a very poor experience with Caroline, the owner of Kitsch Hen.  Her customer service skills are horrifyingly appalling! She fails to respond to emails and text messages, doesn't answer the phone, and when she does, she lies and makes promises to get back to you when she actually doesn't.  On two occasions now, I have tried to order biscuit cakes from her.  On the first occasion, April last year, she said she couldn't make one for me - and there she took her time responding, leaving me with very little time to sort an alternative.  More recently, the second time, she did the same again, but on this occasion, she sadly lied and was dishonest enough to tell me that she had been busy in a meeting all day.  At which point, as a test, I got my mother to call instead.  Of course, she answered the calls.  I texted her to find out why she was avoiding my calls/messages and why she was lying.     There is history between Caroline and myself.  Back in 2020, she had made me a number of Wedding Invitation biscuits for my wedding.  When I collected the order, at which point I must add, she also failed to deliver on time, I found all of the packaged wedding biscuits to be imperfect.  The gold paint had not been dried enough for them to be damaged/marked by the greaseproof paper, which of course the paint was smeared all over too.  Of course, I expressed my dissatisfaction graciously.  I expected nothing less than what she had promised, a perfect quality product.  These after all, were going out as invites to all of my wedding guests!  Caroline at this point had broken down in distress with tears, going on to explain that it was all due to her ongoing domestic personal issues.So, I did the decent thing, and offered to help her in several ways.  By allowing her to take her time and remake the biscuits, and delaying the delivery date a further one more time.  By offering to help her remake the biscuits, and/or package the biscuits, or simply do anything else for her she felt would help, whilst at the same time continuing to console her by hugging her, wiping away her tears and listening to her problems!  I was patient, understanding, empathetic, sympathetic and helpful.  I am simply dismayed and flabbergasted at such horrendous attitude in return.  Caroline needs to remember how to treat people decently back, as life generally works in mysterious ways!!!  She has certainly forgotten how to reciprocate the kindness and generosity of others.  She has become dishonest, ungrateful and arrogant and does not care about decent and good clients like myself.  People - remember to vote with your feet with such uncaring businesses.  They will be here today and gone tomorrow.  Already, we are starting to see the arrogance in her product/work, boring and very samey.  There are better biscuit makers out there , offering the latest and edgy on-trend biscuits.
Response Text:
Sadly, there are times when a review is more of a personal vendetta which no amount of discussion will change. We know that the words being used to describe Caroline could not be further from the truth & we are fortunate that anyone reading this would realise that.

You have not written this review to warn others, you have written it from a place of negativity. And in all honesty, the fact that you could refer to Caroline’s “ongoing domestic personal issues” as well as write the phase “Caroline needs to remember how to treat people decently back, as life generally works in mysterious ways” in relation to her devastating fertility journey - is the most abhorrent thing we have ever encountered. Your text messages also included that Caroline should remember “karma” and her “difficulties in life” which only cements this further. This along with your review says so much more about you than it ever will about The Kitsch Hen.

The final “insult” of The Kitsch Hen’s products being “boring and very samey” begs the question…if you truly felt that way, why were you so keen to order a biscuit cake?

We truly hope that you find peace in your life as well as a suitable birthday cake for your husband by the end of February.

Marlen, The Biscuit Team - The Kitsch Hen

Review Title: The biscuit I ordered for someone who…

Response Text: We were really saddened to read this review as we put so much into each & every order. Once the biscuits have left the bakery, we have no control over their journey & sadly a few orders do go missing. When we were first alerted that the order had not arrived 2 days after dispatch, we offered to send a replacement as we would always want the chance for the recipient to receive the biscuity treat. In the follow up email received 5 days after that, the customer asked for a refund which was issued immediately.

My first order. Not tried anything yet, just a little bit of the quiche as I was portioning it up but OMG it was absolutely delicious! I am mostly excited to try the lamb and mint pie along with the rhubarb and custard.

Wow! These pies are just so delicious. The pastry is perfect,melts in your mouth. My personal favourites are the lamb & mint, chicken & chorizo, Hunter's chicken & pulled pork My daughter is vegetarian she loves the Sweet potato spinach & goats cheese. Review Text: After searching around and ordering from other gluten free bakeries with varying degrees of success I'm so glad I've finally found Mum and Dad's Kitchen. Their cakes are delicious and the pastry and meat in the sausage rolls is perfect. You wouldn't know these were gluten free. Absolutely superb, I 100% recommend this bakery. I'll be ordering from them again in the near future.
Response Text: Thank you so much Fleur for your lovely feedback!

Review Text:
The pies are excellent. We freeze the pies, then microwave to defrost and then bake. The pastry is crisp and flavourful. One pie is perfect between two of us - they are a generous size.
I like the fact that the fruit pies are not over sweet. With a spoonful of clotted cream - delicious.
My only reservation is the packaging my order comes with. The insulated bag and cool pack - could they be returned and reused?
Could an alternative be used for the heavy duty tape used to completely cover the box.
It all keeps the pies in good condition but not great for the environment - all that packaging.
I will, of course, be reordering in the future the pies are too good to miss.

Food arrived exactly when promised, perfectly packaged inside a foil bag with ice and pies all still frozen.
The quiche with caramelised onion is gorgeous. Pies have been popped straight into the freezer to enjoy at leisure. The cakes might not last that long. ??
It was worth ordering a little more to qualify for free p&p. I can even re-use the packaging again.
Jennifer even messaged to explain if it was ok to add two extra of another flavour as they thought one of the pies didn’t present properly. It looks perfect to me. How’s that for fabulous quality control!
I’m seriously impressed and will definitely be a repeat customer.
Other food delivery companies should take note!

Review Title: We love the gluten free and dairy free…
Review Text: We love the gluten free and dairy free meat pies-they are packed with meat and the pastry is crisp and flavoursome (no soggy bottoms!). Our favourite pies are the steak & ale, and the lamb & mint. The sausage rolls are also delicious, and are a generous size. Those of us that can eat dairy love the crunchking honeycomb chocolate bars, ginger cake and chocolate cake: the pieces are large enough to share if you can resist the temptation to scoff the whole thing!
Response Text: Thank you so much for the detailed review! It’s very much appreciated...

Both brilliant - lots of flavour and pastry is excellent! Looking forward to tasting the rest of the items in my order :)

I recently ordered a selection of pies and pastry. I also tried the sausage rolls - which are delicious. Everything is in my freezer - so that I can use it over the coming months.
Ordering and delivery is easy (I live in Portsmouth) so pick up or delivery suits me).
I recommend this company (as a coeliac) needing gluten free food to others - give them a try, you won’t regret it !
One happy customer

Review Text: I've only been coeliac for 2 years so I remember what a normal pie tastes like, you cannot tell the difference with these they are gorgeous, and it's so nice to get gf pie that has meat other than chicken in. Am definitely coming back for more.

Five stars for MAD K and their wonderful gluten free products.

.

Your pies are absolutely delicious.  They are the best pies I've had since being diagnosed with Coeliac disease 12 years ago.They are filled to the brim and the pastry is second to none.  They are worth every penny and will definately get some more very soon.
Great tasting pies from a friendly, family run company with the added bonus of all being gluten free. Highly recommended. I`m going to buy some more today for my friends.

Review Text: Bought my first MADK pie from my local farm shop because they're a local producer and I'm trying to support more local and/or small businesses this year. I opted for the Beef & Blue version as steak and blue cheese anything is a favourite of mine. I didn't notice until I was getting the pie out the fridge for dinner that it was gluten-free; I was a bit cautious as gluten-free pastry can be a bit, well, meh. But no need to worry, the pastry was fantastic, crisp and delicious, making it one of the nicest pies I've eaten and if I'd not seen the box I wouldn't have believed it was gluten-free. It was good value too, I served it with mash and greens and it did two potions.  I will definitely be buying this one again, and trying the other flavours and products, too.

Review Title: Pies were of very good quality
Review Text: At first thought a little expensive but after eating thought definitely worth the extra expense as Pies were of very good quality and bigger than most. Plenty of meat filling and a lovely light soft pastry. I haven’t tasted the quiche yet but I’m sure they’re of the same quality. My grandson loved his minced beef and onion pie and me my steak and kidney. Will definitely purchase some more ??

The ordering and delivery was very smooth. The food quality is great and portion size is great.

Many thanks MadK.

I ordered a few pies via mail order and we were impressed with the excellent service and good communication.  I ordered Steak & Ale and Chicken, ham & leek.  The pies were packed full of filling (both varieties were delicious) and the pastry was melt-in-the-mouth.  Will definitely order again!
Response Text: Thank you for your review.  We do only source the best quality ingredients and it really makes it easier for us to offer a high quality product, but it is nice to hear back from our customers, confirming that we are on the right track!

Review Text: My partner brought home a massive bag of pies today and I couldn’t be happier. She is coeliac and after trying your mince pies at Christmas, said that this was the pastry she had tried since being diagnosed. I’ve just finished off a rhubarb and custard pie and it was amazing, the filling and pastry were top notch. I can’t wait to tuck into the savoury pies as well but trust me, these are good.

Review Text: These pies are simply the best! You will not find this 5* quality in any supermarket nor in many restaurants.  Just tried the hunters chicken and steak and ale and they were divine! Delicious shortcrust pastry (gluten free  if thats your thing too ????) generously filled with tender meat and gravy. Will definitely be trying the rest of the range!  I totally wowed the family serving these beauties up which was a lovely night off for me ??. Thanks so much Mum and Dads kitchen!

Review Text:
Everyone loves a pie but only if it's a good one. I have tried 3 different MAD-K pies so far and all have been excellent without disappointment.
Highly recommended, good quality, fulfilling pies and all gluten free!
Response Text: Thank you for your lovely review, we really appreciate the feedback.

Review Text: Just driven to collect our second batch of gf pies, think we are hooked! Hubby is coeliac and we both eat gf all the time, I can honestly say these are the best pies I’ve ever eaten, the pastry is amazing and the fillings are packed in well and tasty, the steak in them is so tender! These pies put some of the awful ones in the supermarket to shame! Thank you and keep doing what you’re doing!!

Review Text:
I have been enjoying pies and puds from Mum and Dads Kitchen for well over a year and I just love them all - taste, flavour and price all amazing!

Response Text: Thank you Gary! So glad you enjoy our products!

Review Title: First time placing an order with Mad K…
Review Text: First time placing an order with Mad K pies and definitely won't be the last. The first pies I tried was the chip chop chicken curry pie. Oh my ,it was so good. So good in fact I had to double check they were in fact a gluten free bakers. Best pies I've tasted since being diagnosed as coeliac and theyre a decent size. I'd all but given up on gluten free pastry, it usually tastes of sadness and disappointment.  I can't wait to try the rest. Everything arrived really well packaged, still frozen and ready to pop into the freezer. Super friendly customer service. 5*****

Review Title: The best GF pastry I’ve tasted
Review Text: Great service; speedy delivery in time for Christmas, and most importantly tasted amazing! Their GF pastry is so deserving of their awards; the chorizo and bacon quiche is divine. Thank you for making a coeliac very happy.

I’ve had to go GF and as a Northern Bird, I miss a decent pie! Having been utterly disappointed with even the ‘high end’ of GF pies available in supermarkets, my GF colleague pointed me in the direction of MAD-K. Wowzers! I was not disappointed! A proper pie, no soggy crust and plenty of filling! I got a bonus apple cake pack with my order and can verify Mum and Dad make GF cakes and pies that you won’t notice are GF. I’m hoping they’ll turn their hand to bread soon! My GF life would be complete!
Response Text: We aim to please!!! Thank you for your detailed and super enthusiastic review! The MAD K TEAM!

Review Text: Amazing quality gluten free pies, sausage rolls and quiche! Also fab delivery as I needed it sent after a certain date which was done too :) will definitely order again!

Well i've got to tell you... you would never believe that these pies are gluten free!! they're big well filled and delicious. Ive been going back for more for over three years now.
Customer service is brilliant, friendly, helpful, just lovely people..
only gripe is the website !!! not user friendly, could certainly do with bringing up to speed must lose more custom than it attracts ...
Response Text: Thank you for your review of our products! We do our best to accommodate everyone.  As for the website we are constantly updating it and have done so again this last month.  Feel free to email us with any suggestions and if we can we will try to action any changes.

A friendly local business who, in normal circumstances, supply their cakes and pies to many restaurants and cafés in the local area.

I ordered my Christmas puddings and mince pies online and the service I received was very efficient.

The mince pies are delicious but we haven’t had the puddings yet of course!

Review Title: As normal everything was spot on
Review Text:
As normal everything was spot on , ease of ordering on the website, delivery, packaging, and definitely the pies were absolutely gorgeous! There hasn’t been any compromise on quality
Thanks for everything again ??

You can tell the owners are passionate about pies. Each pie is made with top quality ingredients and it really shows. I would say that the Steak and Ale pie was the best I'd ever tasted.

Review Title: My first time of purchasing from MAD…
Review Text:
My first time of purchasing from MAD and after having eaten one pie, I am delighted with the quality of this product.
Service and communication has been first class with cost wonderful for the size and amount of meat within.
It’s good to trust a company when you are coeliac. No after effects for me so thank you MAD.
I will definitely purchase again.
Response Text: Thank you! Your kind words make us happy!

Review Title: Best place for Savouries and cakes if you are gluten tolerant
Review Text:
I found this place as I was having work done at the garage next door and all the Mechanics were eating their Pies when I came back.
My Auntie and Cousin both have Coeliac and so they have to eat Gluten Free foods.
The selections available are 5* and the taste in everything are Impressive.
My Auntie came down from Glasgow so we got some pies and cakes to try and she was really impressed that we did a second order that was taken back to Glasgow. As we informed them that it was going back to Scotland they packed the food with icepacks to keep it all fresh.
I am going up to see family in July so I will making my 3 order with them to take up with me. Anyone who has Coeliac and has to eat Gluten Free foods I would recommend this any day of the week 5*****

I have been purchasing Gluten Free Pies and Cakes from Mum and Dads Kitchen for some years now. I can't speak too highly of their products. It is not always easy to find Gluten Free food that is really tasty, but with this company it's easy! I have purchased Fruit Pies, Sausage Rolls and delicious Cakes many times and they are wonderful. My Husband loves them too and he isn't Coeliac! I would not hesitate to recommend them to anyone. Their Customer Service is also terrific. I hope to keep buying from Jane and Dave for a long time. Well dona to all.
Response Text: Oh Wow! Thank you SO much :) we are always striving to better ourselves and your kind words give us more inspiration to carry on doing so!

Review Text: Love these guys !! They make good, honest tasty food. Have ordered several times before and they always delivery a great service with amazing food ! You wouldn't know you eating gf, they taste amazing! Go try them........

Wow amazing pies, my husband was very jealous at the size of my pie and his normal shop brought one.
Lovely surprise to get a gift of a rhubarb pie. Great service and fast delivery. Would definitely order again.

Review Title: You would never know this food is gluten free!
Review Text: This is about my 5 th order. The quiches are delicious as are the pies - love the hunters chicken, pulled pork and sweet vegetable curry ones. And the cakes are mouth wateringly scrumptious from the coffee and walnut to the bake well cake with buttercream. I’m so glad I found this site
Response Text: Oh wow! Thank you so much it is so encouraging getting such lovely feedback.

Great pastry
I love Jane and Dave's enthusiasm for excellent, tasty pastry in gluten-free sweet and savoury pies and brilliant choice of flavoursome cakes.

Great selection of pies.

Review Title: Sorry but both the chicken and beef…
Review Text: Sorry but both the chicken and beef pies were incredibly dry and we both suffered from bad acid/indigestion - we have thrown the rest out
Response Text: Good Morning  Colm! We have replied to your product review, so we are now replying  to your service review.  Your order was received on the 3rd April and was made and dispatched on the 7th April.   We noticed that there was a glitch in the postage charge so in good faith- as we would always do- we included some complimentary items to compensate for this. Also included was a note explaining this (hand written by myself - Jane - as we believe in a personal service). We note that none of this has been mentioned in your review.  As for your opinion on the pies,  you can clearly see from our previous 5* reviews, that this has never been the case. As we said in our reply to your other review placed this morning we are sure you understand that we wholeheartedly disagree  with what you have said.

Review Text:
I usually hate fruit pies- but omg madk fruit pies, I have discovered, are GORGEOUS!!
I already know how scrumptious their other pies and things are- but when you’re GF AND DF eating lovely produce like this is hard to find, but I don’t need to worry anymore!! Top stars, I fully recommend them and their pies- all stuffed to the brim with whatever you’ve chosen, and they are not small!! One is enough for one hungry person. Love love love MADK ??
Response Text: Love you too- thank you!

Review Text: This was my very first order and I couldn't wait to try the food. The pies, quiches and sausage rolls were really high quality. Pastry doesn't taste like gluten free - just normal. Would highly recommend these to anyone. Really friendly staff both on the phone and delivery. THANK YOU!
Fantastic food delivered quickly. The Christmas cake is especially nice giving a real gluten free feeling of Christmas. As ever the sausage rolls are fabulous.
Response Text: We aim to please! Thank you fr the wonderful feedback :)

Review Text:
I love the gluten free savoury pies, beautiful buttery pastry packed with lovely sumptuous fillings. So tasty ?? ????
I have recommenced Mum and Dads Kitchen to loads of friends.
Response Text: That is the best compliment when our customers refer us to their friends and family... Thank you and we are so pleased you love our products that much!

Review Text:
These pies are absolutely amazing. My husband ordered a mixed selection, mainly for himself, but included a few vegetarian options for me. I was dubious as I'm not generally a fan of pastry, but as soon as i tasted the pastry on these I was sold - it's light, tasty and not a hint of the heaviness or sogginess that usually puts me off. They are all really generously filled too, so you never feel short changed in content.
My particular favourite is the sweet potato, spinach and goat's cheese, but both varieties of mushroom pie were also really tasty. My husband couldnt choose as he said he loves them all equally. The lamb and mint did get a special mention, though.
We havent tried the sweet pies, but a friend has rated them highly too. They are next on our list. The pies are freezer-ready and delivered in a fab little cold box, which meant that even though I was worried that we'd end up having to cook them all on arrival, they were still frozen perfectly.

Nothing at all to complain about, and well worth the money. Give them a try!
Response Text: Thank you so much for your detailed review! We really appreciate it :)

Review Title: I have been a customer of Mad-K for…
Review Text: I have been a customer of Mad-K for some years now and am totally hooked on their Gluten Free products. Lovely pastry, plenty of filling in the pies and very moreish cakes! I have Coeliac disease so have to eat Gluten Free at all times. Anyone who has this condition will know that Gluten Free Products aren't always as nice as regular foods. Therefore it is nice to have a product that is safe for Coeliacs to eat and tastes lovely!! The only  problem I have is trying not to put on any weight. Jane and Dave are a lovely couple and they deserve to carry on being successful. Well done to all.

Very easy to order, received messages regarding order and then kept updated on order delivery. Apple pies are delicious, can't wait to try chocolate cake, ginger cake and sausage rolls. Definitely recommend.

Review Title: Easy ordering, quick delivery, excellent pies!
Review Text:
I placed an order and received the pies just a few days later. I had a couple of messages telling me when they would be delivered as well. Awesome packaging!

When my husband saw they were gluten free he started moaning and asking why I had wasted money. We had a beef pie each for lunch today (the rest are in the freezer), they were excellent! He had to admit they didn't taste like they were gluten free lol. Nice proper meat filling, no yucky bits or filler inside, and the pastry was light and perfect too. I served them with home grown veg and gravy made with home grown onions. Definitely looking forward to having another one next week, and will be trying the pulled pork one then too.

You have made a sceptic into a convert, well done! One very pleased customer here. Shame I can't post photos to show how good they look, definitely no skimping on filling!
Response Text: Truly one of the funniest reviews we have received!  Thank you for your wonderful feedback.

Review Title: Really great pies from MadK as always-…
Review Text: Really great pies from MadK as always- they are our favourite gluten free pies and are always enjoyed by those who don’t usually eat gluten free!

Some pies broken on delivery. Defrosted some overnight in the fridge, to find they're falling apart. Had to serve in ramekins. Taste is really good, just frustrated with the delicate nature of the pastry.

I bought these for my husband who’s gluten intolerant. He’s had the steak and ale pie so far and proclaimed it to be the best gf pie ever! A huge pie, with crisp pastry and filled to the brim. I have to admit, it looked absolutely delicious!

Really delicious! I love the ginger cake! So nice to have gluten free food that tastes and looks appealing. Delivery was really quick and packed really well. I could honestly serve all of the food to non coeliacs and they wouldn't be able to tell the difference.
Response Text: Thank you so much- that is just what we are aiming for....unbelievably gluten free!

Review Text:
Pies are delicious, I also buy their shortcrust pastry which is the best as far as I am concerned, wouldn’t even try again to make my own! I have not tried any other products but if what I have had is anything to go by they will be great. Customer service brilliant. As said above my husband is not a coeliac like me but says these are the best pies he has ever had! What more could I ask for.
Customer service is high on their agenda, nothing too much trouble. Thank you Mum and Dads kitchen you are great.
Response Text: That's so amazing to hear!  Our strapline is 'Unbelievably Gluten Free'  because of reviews like yours.  Thank you so much for the wonderful feedback!

Review Text: The size, structure and fillings are great but the pastry is dry and without gravy or custard, they have been difficult to eat. I presume this is due to being gluten free?

Review Title: The quality of everything from dunk…
Review Text: The quality of everything from dunk cookies is  insane. From the cookies to the dips to the brownie type products. Everything you can tell has had so much thought into making and the flavours are incredible. Annabelle and the team pull out all the stops and make sure everything feels personal. Review Title: Buy now, you won’t regret it!
Review Text: I found dunk in lockdown and have bought a number of items from them since. I have ordered themed boxes as well as orders where I’ve chose the items and have never been disappointed. The dips are what keep me coming back, they taste great. I order for special occasions mostly and people always say how good the items are! I like following the team on Instagram too and it is great to be supporting a small business.
Absolutely love Dunk Cookies, I always look forward to seeing what's new, love the creativity and heart that goes into every flavour created. Love a mystery box too.

Review Title: A must try for cookie lovers
Review Text: My go to for a pick me up or celebration! I have been supporting Dunk Cookies for over 5 years now and the quality is just unmatched! I could pick Dunk from a selection of 1000's cookies because they are just THAT GOOD!
Always a 10/10 experience, doesn’t matter what I order!! It’s always fantastic, Annabelle really changed the cookie world with her insane dips!
Multiple orders, always absolutely delicious and well worth trying!

Dunk Cookies are absolutely amazing!!

I'm one of those people who love to support small and firmly believe in sweet treats regularly for myself and as gifts, Dunk is perfect for this! They are brilliantly unique but also there's something to suit everyone's tastes. The cookies are always cooked to perfection and each dip I've tried has been delicious
Response Text: Hi Natalie, Thank you so much for such a lovely review! I am so pleased you love our goodies ??

Review Text: Oh my life...  you never disappoint Dunk Cookies.  I have tried so many of your products and you just keep getting better.Picked up a sharing platter for a birthday at work and treated myself to the Caramel exploding egg cookie.  Got home and thought I'll just have a bite.... but one bite is never enough.... 5 minutes later that enormous cookie was gone.

OMG Dunk Cookies are amazing ?? you will not be disappointed they are a taste tingling sensation with each and every bite!

Halloween themed cookies and treats were amazing from a witch’s cauldron cookie brownie creation to a candy stuffed bursting cookie these were delicious ??

Definitely my go to place for cookies for life lol ??

Hats ?? off to everyone at Dunk Cookies for such joy you bring in your baked goods. Just can’t get enough definitely turned into a Dunk Cookie Monster in this household.

Review Title: Oh my goodness where do I start!!
Review Text:
Oh my goodness where do I start, I've never had a bad experience with the company and these cookies are amazing! Perfect for when hosting or just eating them all to myself!! I took some of the cookies over to America and they survived and everyone raved about them!
I love that I can collect now too!! Always a positive experience cannot fault at all.

Annabelle (and her awesome team) have created a wonderful company out of passion and determination. The cookie creations are phenomenal! My favourite has to be the original vanilla cookies with the queen bee dip, (Christmas time it's the white Toblerone). I have made my family fall in love with Dunk and I drive my partner mad, moaning about how much (and often) I fancy a Dunk treat. If you want an independent, cookie magical, mouth drawling, mind blowing treat- Annabelle, her amazing team and Dunk cookies is the place to go. Order now! You will not regrett it, I promise.

I’ve followed Dunk Cookies since almost the very beginning, and have never been disappointed with my buys!
Such tasty cookies and dips, as well as in recent years the expanding offer of awesome bakes available.
I can’t wait for my Christmas box, and cheeky extra order today to arrive… haven’t decided yet if I’ll share with my husband or not!!

Review Title: The best cookies you'll ever eat.
Review Text:
I've had multiple orders from Dunk now and every single one has been perfect.
The Bakewell cookies are quite literally the best thing I have ever eaten. The dips are so moreish.
You can tell the dedication Annabelle and her team put into every single item.

I received everything quickly and in good condition. I brought new ones this time and I loved them all. The flavours are always amazing and the size makes them well worth the money. They always look amazing as well as tasting amazing too. My favourite are the Cherry Bakewell. I highly recommend buying from this seller. Everything comes in perfect condition which is unusual for cookies as they usually are smashed up in postal orders. These are big and thick so they don’t just  crumble into powder. I usually pull them apart in to smaller pieces and every bite is delicious.

Order No: 5520599875872
Second order with Dunk Cookies and I find the website very easy to navigate. Checkout was super fast and I received my confirmation email within minutes.
Cannot wait to try the Battenberg cookies. The Biscoff & Honeycomb slice we ordered last week was insane, a great combo. Best place to get Cookies from. Annabelle and her team have nailed it.

Absolutely delicious! The cookies & dips arrived well packaged, fresh and were a great family treat - we had a little cookie tasting session in the kitchen,  listening to music and eating cookies! Brilliant way to entice the teens from their room once in a while! :)

A bit ‘meh’

Have ordered previously and thought they were lovely quality and great taste.

However I ordered a Christmas brownie and cookie box and it just didn’t taste as fresh as it previously had and the flavours weren’t as good. Not bad enough that you’d complain or not eat but half did go in the bin as I just wasn’t that tempted to go back for more.

If I saw a really unique flavour or concept I might be tempted to try? But for your ‘standard’ flavours i just didn’t feel the price and quality were aligned. Also not overly keen on some of the content which has felt a bit guilt trippy it manipulative, I’m sure not the intention but I don’t want to feel personally responsible for a business owners happiness and well-being.
Response Text:
Hi Lucy

I’m glad to hear you have enjoyed your previous orders, but I’m genuinely sorry to read you were disappointed with your recent purchase. We bake everything fresh and price all our products fairly for the quality of ingredients we use. On this occasion, this box may not have been for you, but we take all feedback on board.

I am also sorry you have not been enjoying our content. As you said, it is not our intention to ever manipulate our customers. We pride ourselves on delivering genuinely delicious products for our customers. That has always been our only intention. Anything personal I have shared has purely been to take our customers on our journey with me, through the highs and lows of running a business from start-up, through a challenging economy, and occasionally mentioning the personal journey I have been through too. I am merely human. You are most certainly not responsible for my well-being. I am simply genuinely grateful to every single person who purchases through us and want to shout that from the rooftops!

Wishing you all the best,
Annabelle

Review Text:
I have been a regular at dunk. I thought the naked cookies were their best item but once I tried the dairy milk cookie bars I was blown away. They are The fudgiest cookie bars I have ever tasted and quite easily The best!!!!
Annabelle and the team constantly coming up with new themes and items that no matter how much I try to be good I always cave into dunk's deliciousness and keep on ordering ;)

I've ordered a fair few times over the last few years from Dunk and honestly they are incredible! Their themed boxes are amazing and the thought Annabelle puts into them is unrivalled. We love Dunk Cookies and it's a family business which just makes it that much more special ??

Honestly, find me a better small business who care deeply about their customers and create the most delicious treats you could ever eat. They are beyond. You could absolutely not find a better treat for yourself or someone you love!

Review Title: Not my first order and definitely not my last #5367766417696
Review Text: I was lucky enough to stumble upon Dunk during lockdown and I've placed many many orders since then. I have earnt the tile of dunkie queen I love them so much! Every single product is perfect, I've never once been disappointed. You can taste the love baked init all the goodies that are received. As well as the most amazing products, if you follow the company you'll see the great customer service offered and gain an appreciation for Annabelle the owner too ??

Ordered an Easter box which arrived today. Have to be honest and say I was quite underwhelmed with the entire thing. Overpriced for what you get and that’s even when it was purchased ‘on offer’. The bakes themselves (brownie, cookies) were mediocre at best. Nothing special at all and didn’t taste at all fresh. Puts me off ordering again which is a shame.

I honestly cannot explain how much I love Dunk! EVERYTHING they make is insane! My husband has always said my cookies are the best, the day he tasted dunk he demoted me to second best cookies!! Even the vegan cookies taste incredible - which as most people know, you hear vegan, you think bland, think again. If you haven't tried Dunk then order one of everything, you will not be disappointed!!

Dunk cookies are a favourite in our house, my daughter saw a picture from last Christmas and begged for some ‘dippy cookies’ so just ordered the kids Christmas cookie decorating kit as a surprise for her. Can't wait for them to come!

Review Title: THE BEST COOKIES ANS DIPS EVER (5534988501280)

Review Title: My favourite cookies and dip ever!!

The krazelnut dip was so good I regret not only ordering the mini version but also only ordering 1 dip, it was gone when I was only 1/3 into my cookies. I will definitely order again.

Would love if it were possible or order a mixed bag of cookies (chocolate + vanilla)

I ordered the NYC Cookies which are amazing, a crispy outside coating the wonderfully soft & delectable gooey magnificence which lies beneath. Just as well they're packed in 4's! The order process & delivery was very efficient & cookies came nicely packed with a little note.

Review Title: Ordered the Valentines sharing box and…
Review Text: Ordered the Valentines sharing box and didn’t want to share!! The cookies were amazing and I loved the brownies as well. Will definitely be ordering again and would definitely recommend, ssoooo good!!!

Review Title: The website looks amazing and extremely…
Review Text:
The website looks amazing and extremely easy to navigate. I could spend an absolute fortune but the Dairy Milk box was just too much to resist.
Postage is a little expensive but I understand that everything has gone up in price so this is no different ??

Ah, Dunk! My favourite small business. From the cookies to the dips to the POKE CAKE! I can’t review one thing because there isn’t just one good thing! Customer service is great, the way the items are packaged is great and the overall taste is superb. I can’t recommend this business enough.  I’ve been a fan since 2020 and will continue to be so.

Everything about Dunk Cookies is so thoughtful and considered - from the customer service, the eco packaging and the amazing range of options available. You can't go wrong with any of their cookies and dips (and believe me, I've eaten a lot!) Buy as a gift or simply as a treat for yourself. Couldn't recommend enough!

Today I got a mystery box - which was divine!!! and a small order with banana and custard dip that's what I want to talk about (I know it doesn't make sense let me break it down)
The fabulous team at dunk have a gift in creating or (re creating) these array of flavours and making it their own.
You know how there is different milk chocolate. That's Dunk Dips.
The banana and custard is a flavour all on its own, and the custard compliments the banana so well that it doesn't have that banana aftertaste, think custard cream meets chocolate with a dash of banana for the secret ingredient. I hear it's being discontinued but I for one put a vote in for banoffee as I can already imagine it tasting as moreish as old school sweets toffo

Thanks Dunk Team, payday me makes the best decisions treating myself with your tasty treats see you next month or maybe sooner :)

All the cookies and dips i have tried are so tasty love the chocolate cookies and the queen bee and the nutterly butterly white are standouts for me. Also ordered the monster peanut butter cookie and it is honestly the best sweet treat I have ever eaten sooooo good! I live in the Scottish highlands so delivery is a bit too expensive for regular treat but will defo be ordering treat for special occasions they are that good ??

Fabulous company!! I’ve ordered from here several times and never had any issues. Their selection on their website is fantastic, with dip menus changing monthly and specials weekly, what more could you ask for? The cookies are the perfect combination of soft in the middle with a crispy outside, and so far there hasn’t been a dip I haven’t loved! Value for money is incredible, and they often do a “bundle” where you’ll get to try many of their products at a reduced price. Delivery has always been perfect, using DPD next day so the cookies are as fresh as possible. Brilliant company and I will continue to buy from them.
Response Text: Hi Suzanne - thank you so much for such a lovely review and continued support! Lizzie :-)

Review Text: It would of been a 4 star as I thought the cookies were lovely, flavours not as intense as I thought they would be but all be it a lovely taste and consistency I ordered 5 for £15 from my local Christmas market, unfortunately I have to give a low rating as one of my cookies I thought was kinder turnt out to be hazelnut ! This one was for my 2 year old son luckily he handed me the hazelnut and I bit into it and took it of him ! It was large and a choking hazard for anyone ! I’m glad this didn’t end up in a worse situation or even someone with a nut allergy!
Response Text:
Hi Hollie, Sorry to hear this was your experience. Please be assured that we do state our Kinder cookies contain Nuts (directly underneath the product name on the signage). We take allergens VERY seriously, and have additional signage to make customers aware that they should let the team member know if they require a full ingredient or allergen breakdown on any of our products. All of this information is always to hand at our markets.
We are always happy to answer any questions customers may have and our team are trained on the process and inclusions on all of our products.
I’m really pleased to hear that despite your experience you did enjoy the cookies, and thank you so much for your support and custom on the day.

Review Title: OMG second order and not the last
Review Text: OMG second order and not the last, the brownie cookie is next level but wow the frost cinnamon cookies are simply the best thing I’ve ever tasted. Next order will just be frozen straight away so we have a constant supply!

Review Title: A sweet surprise that kept on giving ……
Review Text: A sweet surprise that kept on giving … we had to ration ourselves !  Delicious cookies made even better by dunking. Then finishing off the dregs like a kid licking the bowl… mmmm

I'm in the US but my sister in the UK loves this cookies.. sent her a package for her birthday and she absolutely loved them.. I saw the pictures of the beautiful cookies and wanted to jump on the screen and have a bite.. can't wait to visit this summer and order me some.

I love these cookies the original vanilla cookies are basically perfect with a great taste, great level of sweetness and generous size. The only thing I'd like to see changed on the website is the ability to add multiple items before it takes you to the checkout page.
Response Text: Hi Christine, Firstly thank you so much for such a brilliant review, we are so thrilled you love your cookies from us! Secondly, thank you for such a great piece of feedback on our website. We agree with you! And have made an adjustment to our website so customers are no longer directed straight to the checkout page when they add items to their cart. We hope you love this change, and thank you again! Annabelle :-)

Review Text:
Awesome cookies and brilliant service!
I ordered the cookies as wedding favours for all the kids. The cookies arrived promptly and were devoured by all the kids. One guest was celiac so I ordered some of the gluten free cookie, she commented they were the best GF cookies she’d ever tasted.

I cannot tell you how much I love this company. All the items I have received have been in perfect order. I cannot get enough dunk cookie products (I wish I had enough money to buy something every week) cookies, dips and brownie slabs along with everything else are delicious and if you haven't tried then why not?

My favourite small business that makes the tastiest cookies and dips,I always come back for more. They use good quality ingredients in their products. Their dips are the best. They change the products regularly as well. Favourites have been dippy eggs (that was genius idea) the cookie slices, and their themed boxes.
And the collab bar they did with another small business was the best chocolate bar I’ve ever tasted in my life!
Only gripe is last time I ordered they used APC and not DPD as usual. APC are useless!

Review Title: We brought some Dunk cookies from Tenterden Christmas Market
Review Text: We brought some Dunk cookies from Tenterden Christmas Market. They were so delicious. Soft in the middle and tasted amazing especially the chocolate orange and Ferrero Roche.

Absolutely delicious! I ordered the cookie and dip selection and was delighted with the beautiful packaging and taste! This would make a great gift for someone.
I will note that initially I recieve the wrong order but after one email the brilliant Lizzie organised for my correct order to be baked and dispatched the same day. I was extremely impressed with the quick and helpful response to my email. This has not put me off ordering again as I could see it was an honest mistake and I would definitely recommend Dunk Cookies.
Response Text: Hi Lucy, I am so pleased we could rectify this for you. Thank you so much for a lovely review. Lizzie :-)

Review Text: Quick & efficient delivery, really well packaged with a lovely personalised note. I ordered a box of brownies which were insane !!!! The best ever. The only thing I would have liked to have seen is a menu card or stickers on each brownie to say what flavour they were. £5 for delivery is a bit pricey hence why I haven’t ordered before but I really enjoyed them, a fabulous treat for the family x

Review Text: The most amazing & moist cookies ever.  The dips are extra special. The brookies are also a must when available.  We generally don’t bother with supermarket sweet treats now because they just don’t compare to dunks.

Having followed Dunk on Instagram for a while I decided to make my first order last November and it did not disappoint. I have since ordered several more times as the variety of treats on offer is constantly changing and tempting me! The team are kind and helpful if you need to get in touch about your order. Very happy to support this superb business.
Response Text: Hi Jessica, Thank you so much for a brilliant review, and for all your support, we really appreciate it! Lizzie :-)

Review Title: Couldn’t love them more if I tried!

Hey! Thank you so much for your support & lovely review. We work so hard to make sure the process is as smooth as possible from ordering to dunking so this feedback is so lovely to hear! I'll make sure to pass you comments on to our team!

Brad :)

Response Text: Hi Emma! Thanks so much for your feedback. I am so sorry to hear there was something wrong with your Millionaire dip, we would have been very happy to replace this for you. Millionaire is a silky smooth caramel dip; perhaps something happened to its temperature in transit. Either way, we really appreciate and take on all feedback so thank you for letting us know. Lizzie :-)

I like the option to freeze things (not all of it freezes but lots does) - especially when you’re buying a lucky dip box as it’s a lot of product to consume in a short time frame.
I personally love the packaging and knowing it’s environmentally as friendly as can be. That really stuck out for me. I like that is is a small business and really believe such businesses should be heavily supported, it is not an easy thing to do; given the currently climate.
I really like the Instagram updates and the team behind the business, their ethos and values are fab and I will definitely be a life long customer.

The cookies and dips from Dunk are amazing! I basically order every month when the new dips of the month come out. I love following their story and growth on Instagram. Highly recommend that you make an order now!

These are the best cookies you’ll ever taste. Delivery, packaging and total order experience is the best out there

Absolutely love Dunk! I've ordered several times now & it never disappoints! The NYC cookies are AMAZING & love trying all the different dips.

I discovered Dunk Cookies through a collaboration with The Chocolate Smiths over a year ago, and oh my, what a find. These are now my go to sugary treat, and have certainly ordered well over 10 times.

They sell the very best cookies I’ve ever ordered - super fresh, always delicious with creative cookie combinations -, and the quality of the dips is out of this world (Dunkstar Martini addict here).

The current delivery system is great - you’re guaranteed a delivery date based on the day of the week you order. The cookies are always so fresh, that it’s never a problem if you’re out and can’t receive your order on the day, or end up getting your parcel from a DPD pick up shop a couple of days later.

The only time I’ve ever had to use customer service was for a small issue with my order, and they were super quick in sorting it out.

Honestly the most delicious cookies ever! I have ordered from dunk a few times before and I’ve never been disappointed! Then I saw the new monster cookies and I just had to try them! And they have to be the best cookies I have ever eaten! I would 100% recommend!

First of all can I just say that I've bought a lot of cookies and dips from Dunk Cookies and their products are amazing, but on this occasion I feel extremely disappointed.

Usually their themed boxes are great products and great value for money but their Spring Fair Box, in my opinion, was poor and I feel like I've been taken for a ride!

Considering subscribers got this box for the sale price of £27 not £32 it's the worst box I've ever received.

The new bundle on sale at £25 is better value as it has more products.

Sorry to leave this review but seriously I think you should contact everyone who bought the Spring Fair Box as it certainly wasn't what you said in the description "the best of dunk". It's put me off buying themed boxes again but as I said your cookies and dips are lovely it's just a shame about this themed box. Four products for £27 (or usual price £32)! A bag of vanilla cookies with a small plastic tub of dip, cookie fries with a small plastic tub of dip, 2 flat ring doughnuts with white chocolate icing and one small hot dog cake (possibly the size of 2 small angel slice cakes from Mr Kipling).

Even if the dips were the regular size this might have been a bit better. I've put half of my cookies in the freezer for when I buy more dip as the dips were far too small.
Response Text:
Hello, thank you for your feedback, and we are sorry you didn’t love your themed box this time around.

We always strive to make every experience with Dunk magical. We’ve been trying to do this for years, and even though we’ve created hundreds of goodies, we still want every single one to be special for our customers.

Our aim, particularly with themed boxes, is to create items we haven’t seen anywhere in the market before, such as the hot dog cakes and cookie doughnuts in the Spring Fair Box. Creating new items require specialist moulds and considerable product development. Alongside the bakes, these boxes focus on the experience of how they can be enjoyed (cookie fries’ packet & cookie/dip cone etc).

With any new product there are always risks when trying to create something new, and pushing the boundaries of what you do. We appreciate we won’t always hit the mark with everybody, but we do always want to push ourselves to try and create new and special things for our customers. So absolutely, we take your comments on board for future boxes.

Lizzie ??

Review Text: In the past, they have been good cookies. Response Text:
Hey Emma!

Thank you for all of your orders with us. We are very sorry to hear your most recent order with us didn’t meet your expectations.

We pride ourselves on our uncompromising approach towards producing high quality bakes, and want all of our customers to be happy and satisfied with any of their purchases from us.

As a postal service it is also extremely important to us that we provide clear information to our customers on recommend best before dates and storage.

As such we would really like the opportunity to investigate this further with you, and would love for you to get in touch with us at hello@dunkcookies.co.uk.

Brad :)

Hi,
I've used your delivery service once before and it all went well.
However, this time it went drastically wrong; I'm in France and had to rely on delivery in the UK from companies over there this Christmas, I ordered the cookies for an address in Essex, they should have arrived in the week before Christmas but in fact, and with no explanation, they were returned to you.
I emailed as soon as I saw this and whilst I realise that you must have been flat out, I'm still waiting for a reply. Sorry, would love to use again but no confidence in your delivery company,
Response Text:
Hi Fiona!

Sorry to hear this! After speaking with Lizzie in our operations team, I believe this was down to an incorrect delivery postcode at ordering & the issue has now been resolved. Should you have any further issues don't hesitate to reach out on hello@dunkcookies.co.uk & we'll be more than happy to assist you!

Brad :)

Review Title: Order the cookies and hope no delivery issues
Review Text:
I've made 5 orders, and the food items are fantastic apart from the chocolate bars are too thick to bite it's painful in my opinion- cookies and dips are great. Really the best.
However if you have issues don't expect a reply within a week or sometimes - at all. Which I didn't have after an order earlier in the year. I've had issues with deliveries and we had to travel 24 mile round trip to collect from the depot a few days later so the items weren't as fresh. I sent a DM on Instagram they replied three days later asking me to email. I emailed, I've had no reply for 9 days and now I'm writing this. No refund of postage offered for the delivery issues we've had and postage is not cheap!! The owner is on Instagram stories all day yet doesn't have time to reply to customers. They use DPD local who are absolutely useless round here, they went to a car wash and wardrobe shop instead of a home address.

Edit - I have had an email and social media response since leaving this review and a comment on insta which I appreciate. No refund of postage offered or alternative shipping options explored at this time. Really sad we won't have those incredible cookies in our future. Just can't be doing with the 24 mile round trip to the depot and the hours on the phone to dpd. Gutted.
Response Text:
Hi Jayne!

Thanks for your feedback.

Firstly, we'd like to apologise for the delay in responding to you, we've been 3 members down this past week or so due to COVID so it's really been all hands on deck in the kitchen!

We're so glad to hear you love our cookies & dips! We work so hard making all our goodies so it's a shame to hear you've had issues with DPD. We've made notes of all your feedback regarding their service and will definitely pass it on so they can improve in the future!

Thanks for all your support this year! Wishing you a Merry Christmas & Happy New Year

Brad ??

Review Text:

Response Text:
Hey Kayley,

We’re sorry to hear you weren’t 100% happy, and definitely want all of our products to be enjoyed.

We do state on all items, that decorations may vary, as we are not able to be exact as we hand bake and decorate everything.

The Cakesickles wouldn’t have been undercooked - as this is thoroughly checked, but they are mixed with buttercream to make them easier to eat, which may have given the texture you experienced.

If you had contacted us directly we would have definitely put it right however!

Thank you for taking the time to review us, we’re glad that part of the order was enjoyed and hopefully we will see you again.

It looked stunning and tasted delicious - a real crowd pleaser.   It was beautifully packaged and therefore transported well.    Also, the slices coped perfectly with warm conditions and kept their shape etc.    I would have no hesitation in ordering again.  My thanks to Sian and her team.
Response Text:
Thank you for taking the time to review us, and thank you for ordering from us!

It’s great to hear you loved your order, and we can’t wait to serve you again soon ??

Review Text:
We have been coming to the shop for a while now and loved everything we’ve tried. But yesterday I had such an amazing experience using Sian’s sweet treats, the website is super clear and easy to use, there’s a huge amount of yummy things to chose from and the option to Collect or have delivered is fab!
Plus messaging their Facebook page i spoke to someone lovely, with amazing customer service and now we have a delicious gluten and dairy free cake to look forward to for a family birthday party.
1000% recommended!! Thank you so much everyone involved.
Response Text: Thank you for your review and we are glad you enjoyed your order!

Review Title: The perfect place to go for that special sweet treat.
Review Text:
Online ordering was simple. The website shows what the goods look like and are available as slices or a whole cake. A whole chocolate orange cheesecake was my choice and as I live locally to the shop, I opted for collection. I picked the time and date, paid and received a confirmation email.
My order was ready at the allotted time and was a delight, both visually and taste-wise.
The shop stays open late into the evening so it fits in well with most work patterns.
Their cakes are so much nicer than standard shop-bought ones, well worth that bit extra for the sheer pleasure when eating them.
Response Text: Thank you for your review and we are glad you enjoyed your order!

Review Text: Incredibly friendly lady who managed to deliver our sweets early, much to my son's excitement.  Very happy with the overall quality and experience and will definitely be ordering again in the future!
Response Text:
We’re extremely glad to hear this, and we can’t wait to serve you again soon. We have passed the feedback on to our driver that this relates to.
Thank you for supporting our small business ??

Review Text: Delivered on agreed date to my nan for mother's day, she thought they were wonderful x thank you :) x

Ordered one cheesecake and instantly got a phone call to say that they had an offer on and I could get another cheesecake for free. What amazing service!!! They also allowed me to pick a delivery day, when the delivery came the driver was absolutely lovely. I would 100% recommend. Not to mention that they were so tasty and by far the best cheescakes I’ve ever had.

I cannot recommend Sian’s Sweet Treats enough, despite my initial negative recommendation they were apologetic and went out of their way to prove just how good their goodies are! They have certainly done that and the treats I received were amazing. Thank you thank you thank you ??

Review Text: I recently ordered 60 boxes of cakes for a corporate training day from Sian.  The cakes were delivered locally personally and by post all over the South West.  Sian communicated well with me and the value for money was exceptional.  I can highly recommend Sian and will definitely be ordering again, we had flapjacks and brownies with tea, coffee and hot chocolate sachets, it was absolutely delicious.  Well done Sian.

Review Text: Amazing beautiful cakes which also taste as good as they look. I bought them as a birthday gift!
Good communication but no timeframe for delivery was problematic. Cupcakes had sunk during transit but we were able to re-set before gifting them. Cupcakes were also very small but tasted great.

This company is 5*
Amazing products for amazing prices.
I wouldn't go anywhere else now.
Even my family enjoyed all of it ??
Australian crunch was lush.
Brilliant delivery too.
You guys are doing an excellent job.

Review Text: Mother’s Day cupcakes were beautifully decorated and well presented as a bouquet. Very tasty and enjoyed.

The delivery driver had a huge smile on his face and was so lovely! It said an hour til delivery but it was here in half that time! And my doggo thoroughly enjoyed some sausage roll and the doggy ice-cream! No bad words to say at all, highly recommend and will definitely be back!! Thank you!!

Review Text: Apparently the cupcakes were tasty but they were delivered a day late which defeated the purpose of planning ahead & ordering in advance to help our colleague celebrate his birthday. I have no idea why the cupcakes weren't delivered on the correct day and didn't receive a notification or apology about the missed date, which was also disappointing.
Response Text:
Dear Emma, we are really sorry we were a day late and there is no reason why this should have happened, and is something that we have never done before!

Please accept our apology, and pass our apology on to Steve for us.

I will be offering a full refund as an apology to you, I know this doesn’t make up for them being late, we’re not sure if it was a system issue/ human error and would like to investigate this further - please email contact@sianssweettreats.co.uk or contact us through social media.

Kind regards,

Robb Hughes
Director
