Review Title: The place to go for wedding cakes
Review Text: The place to go for wedding cakes! It looked gorgeous, tasted amazing and was affordable

Review Title: Such a beautiful cake which also tasted…
Review Text: Such a beautiful cake which also tasted amazing!!

Elizabeth's cakes are equally beautiful and delicious. She made us the most incredible wedding cakes and we go to her for every birthday and celebration. We love visiting on a Saturday to try all the weird and wonderful flavour combinations and will keep recommending EK Bakery to everyone!
Response Text: Thank you so much, love to be a part of all your celebrations!! We look forward to baking again for you soon ??

Review Text: Great taste, excellent service!
Amazing blondies, really well packaged, delivered quicker than expected. I wished I lived closer!

The brownies are delicious! Excellent customer service too because I got the delivery and billing address the wrong way round and Robyn was very quick and responsive to my email to switch them around. Would highly recommend!
Response Text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this review, I'll pass your feedback onto Robyn and the rest of the team. We look forward to baking again for you soon. Best wishes, Elizabeth

Review Title: I’ve ordered twice from Ekbakery and…
Review Text: I’ve ordered twice from Ekbakery and the cakes are to die for!  They also answered all my questions over the phone and were able to fulfil same day delivery for one of my orders.  The only reason I’m taking 1 star off is because I think the delivery price for central London is a bit too expensive, the price for the cakes instead is reasonable considering the quality you get.
Response Text:
Thanks so much, Joe! We are delighted to hear you enjoyed the cakes, I will pass your feedback onto the team.

I would so love to be able to offer a lower delivery price but we quote the price that the courier charges to us. We don't add anything extra on top and unfortunately, door to door delivery within an hour window is expensive. We are exploring other options but so far none are as careful and accurate as our current provider. You are always welcome to collect from us (EC1R 0NE) or arrange an alternative delivery method.

We hope to bake again for you soon. Best wishes, Elizabeth

Review Text:
The Cake: Very tasty and incredibly beautiful. Really well put together and was exactly what I had hoped for after too much time researching occasion cakes in London.

Delivery: I had this delivered inside London and the process was smooth. The day before I was sent a tracking code for my one hour time slot. Through this on the day I could see when the courier had collected the cake, the estimated time to drop off, and a little icon on the map of where exactly the courier was. Therefore no anxious waiting for the doorbell.

Conclusion: I will be ordering my friends cake from here for her birthday in April!

Great flavour selection, easy to order (and add custom message), timely delivery. Their brownies never miss. My go to gift order! Have ordered many times before, will order many times again. Love EK Bakery.
Response Text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this review! We look forward to baking for you and your loved ones again soon. Best wishes, Elizabeth

Review Text: Brownies are always great! Loved the Vietnamese coffee ones, but my favorite standards are white chocolate blondies and the caramel pecan brownies. They're always a hit when I give them as gifts.
Response Text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this review. So pleased to hear you're enjoying the new and classic flavours. We look forward to baking again for you soon. Best wishes, Elizabeth

Review Title: Fabulous bakes - a treat for the eyes.
Review Text:
Fabulous bakes. Treat for the eyes and they taste absolutely amazing. Such great flavour combos and I really appreciate the effort they put into decorating and making each batch special.

However, I think they need to pair with a better delivery service as I have had issues with almost every delivery.
Response Text:
Thank you so much for your kind feedback, Jaya! I will pass on your feedback to the rest of the team

With regards to delivery, I'm not sure why you've had bad luck with yours. I'm always trialling new services and to date it's still the best service we've found for delivery with tracking and drivers taking care of the cakes. Appreciate the feedback.

We look forward to baking for you again soon! Best wishes, Elizabeth

Review Title: Came across EK Bakery on social media…
Review Text: Came across EK Bakery on social media and did not realise how close they were to me so decided to order two cakes for my daughters birthday. Over heard my guests complimenting the cakes throughout the night and when I tell you it was lovely I mean it! Fresh ingredients & great decorations. You get more than what you ask for. Highly recommend them!
Response Text: Thank you so much for your lovely review, delighted to bake for your family and friends. We look forward to baking again for you soon. Best wishes, Elizabeth

Review Text: I bought the coconut brownies for my Aunt for a Mother’s Day treat as we are both lovers of coconut. She was very happy and told me they were delicious, full of coconut. The letterbox brownies were posted on time and received the next day. Fantastic service and a fantastic product. I will definitely recommend and buy again.
Response Text: Thank you so much for your feedback! I've passed it on to the rest of the team and we look forward to baking again for you soon

Review Text: It’s been a few times I purchased brownies from EK Bakery, and they never disappoint! They are so luxurious and decadent! ?? I love the cute handwritten notes, with your personal message, that gives the gift a special touch. I definitely recommend their brownies as gifts. ??
Response Text: Thank you so much! Thrilled to hear that you enjoy all the little details! We look forward to baking for you again soon, Elizabeth

Review Text: The choice of cakes and brownies are as awesome as ever. My family looks forward to the arrival of Mothering Sunday and Easter for the restock of the super delicious Simnel Cake. A firm fave. Thank you Elizabeth & Team
Response Text: Thanks so much Hayley, so thrilled you love the Simnel cake as much as we do! Best wishes, Elizabeth

Review Title: Letterbox brownie- the perfect pick me up!
Review Text:
The letterbox brownies are absolutely incredible, ever single time. They arrive in amazing packaging, the texture-flavour is incredible: the perfect mix of bite and moisture.

They make an excellent special delivery, monthly treat, or little pick me up! we’re always sad when they are gone.
Response Text: Thank you so much Dana, delighted with this review. Best wishes, Elizabeth

Review Text: I ordered a cake for my birthday which was beautifully balance and visually stunning. The cake was tasty but not over sweet, they aren’t just relying on sugar to do the heavy lifting flavour wise like most bakeries. The bakery was easy to deal with, friendly and very professional. I’m very impressed and will getting more cakes from them in the future.
Response Text: This is the perfect review, thank you so much. We look forward to baking again for you soon, Elizabeth

Review Text: Cake was delicious! Positive comments all round! Immediately responsive to order query, establishing requirements beyond the order form to make sure cake was just right and rectified small issue on the delivery day straight away and with ease.
Response Text: Wonderful to hear, we look forward to baking again for you soon. Best wishes, Elizabeth

Review Text:
I have fallen in love with EK Bakery. The Team's passion for baking is evident in the unbelievably delicious treats that they whip up in their gorgeous little kitchen near Broadway Market.
The chocolate sponge is phenomenal. Moist, rich and slightly salted. I also thoroughly enjoyed their lemon "tiramisu" cake which was wonderfully light and summery. If you're on the hunt for a super fudgy brownie, they have you covered on that front too! Lastly, I am not really a matcha kinda-gal but I sampled their matcha cookie and must admit, I was impressed.
Lovely people, lovely baked goods. I am so glad that that I have purchased from them and will continue to do so.
Response Text: Wow, thank you so much for this beautiful review!! We look forward to seeing you again soon

Review Text: I regularly order from EK Bakery, and they never disappoint! Whether you go for a slice of cake, a freshly-baked cookie or a rich brownie, EK Bakery always delivers the goods. Super fresh, indulgent - would 100% recommend.
Response Text: Thank you so so much, Emily!!

Review Text:
I highly recommend EK Bakery. I have ordered a few large cakes from them and they've always been so well made, pretty and, most importantly, delicious.

Only once have I been a little disappointed because I misunderstood the sizing of a slice of cake on their website. I questioned it with them and they rectified the wording immediately so others wouldn't be confused.

They are helpful over email and always very quick to respond. I also regularly order their letterbox specials for myself - delicious and always arrive quickly. I do find my preference is for the letterbox sizes to the packs of 4. The letterbox sizes are thinner, maybe this is a topping to brownie ratio thing for me?!
I don't mind the prices because I know they only use the best ingredients, which is a priority for me.

Anyway, love them and will continue to support an independent bakery.
Response Text: Wow, thank you so much for this review. Will send your feedback onto the rest of the team. We look forward to baking again for you soon, Elizabeth

Review Text: EK bakery always deliver! I always buy postal brownies when anyone I know is having a tough week, and they arrive indulgent, gooey and just beautiful! The team also go above and beyond with any cheeky requests I have after I place my order!

My brownies arrived on time and very carefully and lovingly packaged.
The black forest brownies are exceptional. The flavours are insane, especially to cut through dark chocolate. I am absolutely addicted, this being my third order in 2 weeks.
Highly recommend everything Elizabeth and the team does. Exceptional quality always.
Response Text: Ryan! Thank you so so much for this!

Review Text:
I send Brownies to my daughters and each time they are equally surprised and thrilled by the deliciousness and quality of this treat!
Their customer service is excellent too!
I will continue sending these treats as well as buying them for the occasional party.
Thank you ladies!
Response Text: Thank you so much, Jane! We love baking for you and your lovely daughters! Best wishes, Elizabeth

Review Title: Exceptional brownies and went down a…
Review Text: Exceptional brownies and went down a treat for my wife. Also had very good communication and will be using again in the future.
Response Text: Thanks so much Adrian, we look forward to baking again for you both soon, Elizabeth

Review Text:
I needed to send a thank you gift to some friends and I knew EK Bakery could help me out. Letterbox brownies meant no waiting in for the postman and therefore made my gift a nice little surprise! They included a hand-written note, and all the feedback I got from my friends was overwhelmingly positive.
The only hard part of ordering was picking a flavour!!
Response Text:
Thanks so much for your lovely review! We are delighted to hear your friends enjoyed their letterbox brownies.

Best wishes,
Elizabeth

Review Text: The brownies are phenomenal, I love trying out the monthly specials (my personal fave was the trick or treat edition)! I have made several orders and the service is top notch with quick delivery and great packaging, as well as a personal note in each delivery. Happy to support this great small business!
Response Text: Wow thank you so much Lena! Delighted to hear this and we look forward to baking again for you soon. I'll pass your feedback on to the rest of the team. Best wishes, Elizabeth

Review Text: EK Bakery is my go to for gifting - I ordered the vegan brownies for a friend and they were absolutely delighted. Said they were delicious and the perfect texture for a brownie - hard to get as a vegan option. Their cakes are also insanely good..and the cookies. Actually everything they do is perfection.
Response Text: Thank youuu xx

Review Text: I have bought exquisite,  moist and tasty brownies from this bakery before but these were a truly delicious gift. The recipient is very, very pleased but reports that her birthday cake experience was spoilt as she preferred the brownies!!
Response Text: Thanks so much Jenie! Appreciate the support, always x

Review Title: I ordered a cake for my boyfriend’s…
Review Text: I ordered a cake for my boyfriend’s birthday for the second year in a row and it did not disappoint! Thank you so much for putting so much time and effort into the delicious cake. You can tell a lot of good quality ingredients and love goes into baking. Thank you for being fantastic at what you do!

Review Title: One of the best cake shops in London
Review Text: Had to get a cake last minute in London, amazing customer service because they answered my email right away, didn’t charge me any extra and I got it the next day! We got the Sicilian lemon, and the cake was not only one of the prettiest cakes I’ve ever seen, it was absolutely delicious - my boyfriend and I couldn’t stop eating it. Even the packaging was gorgeous, I ordered a gift note with it (you can get like happy birthdays, thank yous etc) and I got the most beautifully hand-written note on gorgeous card (very jealous of their handwriting!). If I ever need a cake in London again, they’re going to be my first choice. For the price, in London, I don’t think you can get better.
Response Text: Wow, thank you so so much for this wonderful review! Thrilled to hear this and I've passed your feedback on to the team. We look forward to baking again for you soon. Best wishes, Elizabeth

Review Text: The highlight of my wedding! I have a couple of food intolerances and the EK Bakery team made the cake of our dreams with the best-tasting ingredients. I am so so happy with their coordination with me before my wedding, and they were just so kind and helpful with all my questions. I cannot recommend them more.
Response Text: Dear Priscila, a joy to read this and to receive your beautiful thank you note! Delighted we could be a part of your special day. Thank you, Elizabeth

Review Text: Ordered a birthday cake for a friend and it was amazing! Honestly one of the best cakes I’ve had. Wished I would have found you sooner so you could have done our wedding cake! Superb customer service as well, I had an additional request and you were so accommodating. Will certainly order again. Thank you so much!
Response Text: Wow, thank you so much Michelle! Delighted to read this and I'll pass on your feedback to the rest of the team. Sad we couldn't make your wedding cake but perhaps an anniversary cake?! We look forward to baking again for you in the future. Best wishes, Elizabeth

Review Title: Ordered cake from India for London!
Review Text: We ordered this cake from India for my brother-in-law’s birthday in London. It was delivered on time and in perfect shape. The delivery was very professional with the person in charge calling and confirming the address and the time and handing it over with care. The birthday boy was delighted with the service and also the flavour of the cake and its taste!
Response Text:
Hi Nikhil,

Thank you for taking the time to leave this review. We are delighted to read your brother-in-law enjoyed the cake! I will pass on your glowing feedback to the team, thank you!

Best wishes,
Elizabeth

Review Text: The chocolate brownies came within 2 days of dispatch and were absolutely delicious! The were rich and decadent with a great texture. I’m a big dessert person and this was by far my favourite brownie. The packaging was also excellent. Will definitely be a returning customer.
Response Text: Thank you so much for taking the time to write this review! We look forward to baking again for you soon. Best wishes, Elizabeth and the EK BAKERY team

Review Text: It was my 1st purchase & i was in Singapore ordering brownies in UK! It was like shooting in the dark, wasn't very sure what will happen after I've purchased BUT EK Bakery was a gem! I got the delivery mixed up, but they got it all sorted out for me in a snap of a finger! My brownies reached it's surprised recipient right on time! (And I was 8-hours ahead!). Amazing lovely helpful people at EK Bakery.. They get my very much recommendations
Response Text: Thank you so much for sharing this review, I'll pass your feedback onto the team. Always happy to accommodate last minute requests or changes wherever possible

Review Text: Beautiful options for those who need gluten free and vegan options combined (gluten free and lacto free diets). Tastes homemade but also luxurious with the finest ingredients and care put in to each slice.
Response Text: Thank you so much for the lovely review! We put a lot of care and testing into our vegan and no-gluten creations to ensure they match up to the rest of the menu!

Review Text:
Excellent company who were proactive with communication and make picking up the cake easy.

The cake was fantastic with many people who tried it saying it was the best they had ever tried (this was the standard chocolate cake). The large size ensured that there was plenty for 40 people to have a slice.
Response Text:
Thanks so much Tom, I will pass on your feedback to the rest of the team. Delighted to hear that you all enjoyed our double chocolate cake. It's had some rigorous recipe testing so it's always a thrill to hear that this has paid off.

Thanks for taking the time to leave a review,
Elizabeth

Review Text:
Delivery later than expected
Quality good but not exceptional for the money
Packaging great
Probably wouldn’t order again
Response Text:
Hi Harriet,

Many thanks for sharing your review and I'm sorry to hear the quality was not as expected. We would love to make this up to you and hear more about what happened with the delivery. I've sent you an email and hope we can surpass your expectations on your next box.

Best wishes, Elizabeth

Review Text:
had a cake from EK bakery for my friend's birthday party . dealing with the team was super quick, they had polite & kind responses; when I mentioned I would like to have bespoke cake they had no issues and offered plenty of options for flavours and personalisation.
cake was delivered on time, and it was delicious - everybody was asking about where we got it from.
10/10 , will come back to EK bakery next time I need a cake for party ! thank you
Response Text: Thank you so much Tereza! It was a pleasure to bake for the birthday party and we hope to bake for you again in the future. Best wishes, Elizabeth

Review Title: I live in Bermuda and my daughter is in…
Review Text: I live in Bermuda and my daughter is in the U.K. Doing some courses. Her 21st birthday was approaching and I told her to google bakeries in her area. She chose EK Barkery and the Sunshine cake. She loved it!! Said it was the best cake ever. Great customer service with the emails and delivery information when the cake was ready for delivery to when it was delivered. Thank you for everything and making her day special.
Response Text: Wow, thank you Kelly!! Delighted to hear this! I will pass on your feedback to the rest of the team. We look forward to baking again for your daughter in the future. Best wishes, Elizabeth

Review Text: Great company to order from, we ordered the hot cross bun blondie tasted and smelt delicious! Quick delivery and packaged well.
Response Text: That's great to hear, thank you. I'll pass your feedback on to the rest of the team!

Review Text: Vegan, small portion size & letterbox delivery is exactly what I was looking for for my friend's birthday! Friend loved the brownies! Arrived very quickly too, massive thumbs up!
Response Text: Delighted to hear this! Thank you, I will pass your feedback on to the rest of the team. Best wishes, Elizabeth

Review Text:
Letterbox Brownies are a perfect combination when you want to send a birthday card with a little surprise. My friend was delighted.
Her response, Thank you for the black forest brownies! Soooo delicious! ??
Response Text: Thanks so much!!

Review Text: Ordered chocolate brownies  by post as birthday gift. Arrived on date requested. Fantastic customer service. I did not try the brownies myself but I was told they were delicious
Response Text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review, Charlotte. We are thrilled to hear the brownies were enjoyed. Best wishes, Elizabeth

Review Title: I ordered the lemon & almond cake for…
Review Text:
I ordered the lemon & almond cake for 30 people for my partner’s birthday and it was the most delicious cake I’ve ever ordered in London & beautifully decorated too.
I would highly recommend 5stars! ??????

Review Title: The Best Baker that Ever Lived.
Review Text: I wish there were more stars available. Everything about EK Bakery is incredible, and I will forever be loyal to them. I have tasted a lot of brownies in my life, I have months without tasting Elizabeth's delights, and every time I order them again, I remember that hers are the best brownies on this earth - no exaggeration at all. The talent extends far beyond brownies too - if you've not tasted her blondies you also haven't lived, and likewise with any other baked goods that come out of that kitchen. I discovered EK Bakery many moons ago (pre pandemic maybe?) after asking her to custom bake me a Cherry Bakewell peanut butter brownie, and my all time fave, a Marmite Caramel Brownie. Since then I have asked for many a strange flavour combination, and she has yet to disappoint, allowing me to bend the rules on more than one occasion, and baking the weirdest of concoctions at my request. Thank you, Elizabeth - and you merry band of bakers. You make my baked goods dreams come true, and I salute you for it. Long may EK Bakery continue, and maybe one day I will cross the threshold in person. Until then, please continue to send me your chocolatey delights. They never fail to make me a very happy human!
Response Text: Ohh you are the sweetest, thank you so so much

Review Title: First time ordering and it was fantastic
Review Text: It was my first time ordering from them after finding out about them on the internet. The order was for a gift so I wanted to make sure that both the quality of the cakes the delivery would be promising. And they were. The recipients were happy and from the pictures they sent me, the cakes looked gorgeous. Would happily order from EK Bakery again.
The ordering and collection process was easy. Customer service was proactive, prompt and clear. I ordered a chocolate sesame cake that was loved by the whole family for both the look and taste!
Response Text: Thanks so much, Yi! We are delighted to hear you enjoyed the chocolate sesame cake. Thank you, Elizabeth

Review Title: cake was overall good but very small…
Review Text: cake was overall good but very small for the price and fell apart when slicing unfortunately
Response Text:
Hi Emily,

Many thanks for taking the time to leave a review. We offer cakes in multiple sizes and the mini size you had is our smallest one. It serves 2-6 people, depending on your portion preferences.

Additionally, we recommend storing the cake in the fridge and removing it around 1-2 hours before serving. The cake tastes best at room temperature but the refrigeration beforehand enables easy slicing and ensures a clean slice.

We'd love for you to try another cake with us, I'll follow up over email too.

Thanks and best wishes, Elizabeth

Review Text: Taste levels were ok, but had to wait a long time ( 7 days) before we received it.
Response Text: Thanks for taking the time to leave a review and I'm sorry your brownies were delayed on this occasion. We baked and dispatched your brownies with First Class shipping on the day of baking but there was a delay within the Royal Mail postal system. It's extremely rare and I'm sorry it occurred with your brownies. Thanks for flagging this with us on email, we sent you a replacement box and upgraded the shipping to 24H Tracked, sent these on 5th September and you received them on 6th September. Best wishes, Elizabeth
